title: Mugiranire imbabazi kugira ngo uronke ivyiza vyo kubabariranira.
content:
IVYIZA VYO KUBABARIRA.

“Umunyakigongwe agirira neza umutima wiwe ubgiwe,Ariko ruburakigongwe agirira nabi umubiri wiwe ubgiwe.”[Imigani 11:17]

Kenshi usanga umuntu agenda abihiwe mu mutima, kubera ivyo yakorewe, ugasanga ntiyatanze imbabazi (ikigongwe), kandi akumva birumvikana kuko yumva yahemukiwe cane.

Ariko dusomye ngo umunyakigongwe agirira neza umutima wiwe ubwiwe. Kubera iki?

Kubera ko kubabarira birabohora uwakosherejwe, akumva ubuzima bw’umunezero buragarutse,akidegemvya.

Rero umubabariye ni wewe ubwawe uba wigiriye neza, kuko bituma ubohoka kumubabaro yaguteje.

Ikindi cerekana ko uba wigiriye neza wewe ubwawe, n’ uko Bibiliya ivuga ngo ni mwabarira abandi, na Data wo mw’ ijuru azobababarira namwe. Muyindi mvugo, iyo ubabariye uba wishize mu kibanza aho ubwira Imana integenke zawe, nayo ikakubabarira.Utababariye naho, ntubabarirwa .Kubabarira rero ni ku nyungu zawe.

Kandi twasomye ngo « ruburakigongwe agirira nabi umubiri wiwe ubwiwe ».

Umuntu atagira ikigongwe (adatanga imbabazi), bimuvyarira inzika, umubabaro udahera(bishobora gutuma kandi agira ingwara zivuye ku mubabaro),bikongera bigatuma aguma yiyumvira ku kibi yakorewe aho kwiyumvira ivyomuteza imbere mu Mpwemu no mu mubiri, kandi biba n’ inzitizi mu migenderanire yogirana n’ Imana, ndetse n’abantu. Kutababarira n’ ukwigirira nabi rero.

Kandi ikindi tutokwibagira, Bibiliya ivuga ngo ico umuntu abiba nico azokwimbura.Niwababarira, Imana izotuma n’ abandi ugirako intege nke bakubabarira vyoroshe kuko uzoba wabivye kugira imbabazi.

N’ubwo woba ubona ivyo wakorewe biremereye utovyishoboza kubabarira, uzosabe Imana igushoboze kubabarira, iyashoboje Yosefu kubabarira bene se bamugurishije, nawe yogushoboza.

Dukwiyekwigakubabarira,bizotumatubahotwishimyekandininacoImanaidushakako.Umuntu wese ni yitegure kwama agira imbabaze ku neza yiwe.

title: Abarundi baremeza yuko hari ba Bulamatari bafise imigambi yo gusamaza abenegihugu.
content:
Désiré Minani Buramatari w’intara ya Ngozi ati: « Mu mwaka 2030, intara ya Butanyerera izoba yaguze indege 5 kandi n’umugambi tuzoshikako »

Mu kumufata mu mugongo Rémy Cishayo ayoboye intara ya Kayanza avuga ko uwo mugambi wo kugura indege mu Kayanza bawuhagaritse kugira ngo bifadikanye n’abo mu ntara ya Butanyerera kubandanya umugambi wo guteza imbere iyo ntara nshasha

Aho hari kuri uyu wa 3/2/2024,aho intara ya Ngozi yari iramutse ishikiriza ivyaranguwe mu ntara ya Ngozi mu mwaka w’2023Buramatari w’intara ya Kayanza akaba yashikirije ko ahimiriza abavuka mu ntara arongoye kuja kwubaka amazu akomakomeye kandi agerekeranye nk’igorofa 20, barime imyonga yose, bubake amabarabara meza kandi akomeye eka n’ibindi

Abo bayobozi bavuga ko ata yindi ntara n’imwe muri nshasha buca zijaho izobaca imbere mw’iterambere kuko Kayanza, kubw’ivyo bahamagarira ababa muri izo ntara gufatana mu nda bakorere hamwe

Si ubgambere Abarundi bumva imvugo ya Leta y’Uburundi imeze nk’iyo kubashimanga.Umukuru w’igihugu yavuze yuko Abarundi badashonje kuko batararya ibitaribga, yongeyeko ngo ntashobora kumenya yuko banashonje kuko we n’umuryango wiwe bimbura umurengera n’ibigega bakaba baruhuke. Akaba yirurwa arigisha ivy’imbona kazoza ya 2040 na 2060 mu gihe igihugu kiguma kija mu bukene ntangere. Abo ba bulamatari nabo ngo bagira bagure indege zitanu mu gihe igihugu c’Uburundi ata ndege n’imwe ikora gifise. Ivyo vy’intara z’igihugu zibiri kugura indege zitanu babivuga mu gihe izo ntara arizo zifise abana benshi baheba ishure kubera inzara no mu gihe abayobozi b’amashure bamaze iminsi batabaza yuko abana bari mu kwicwa n’umwanda kubera yuko amashure adafise utuzu twa surwumwe. Duhanura abategetsi b’igihugu kutaborerwa ubutegetsi ngo bakinishe amabanga bahawe mukwama bavuga ivya kazoza gusa mugabo nyabona bakamenya yuko bashiriweko gutorera umuti ingerane z’abenegihugu uyu munsi no kwitaho iterambere ry’uyu munsi.

title: Hari igihe udashobora kwiryamira kiretse Imana yo nyene.
content:
« Uwo mugore asumira impuzu yiwe, aramubgira, ati Ngo turyamane. Amutana impuzu yiwe, arahunga, arasohoka. Maz’ abonye kw amutanye impuzu yiwe agahunga agasohoka, atabaza abagabo b’abanyarugo, arababarira, at’ Ehe raba yatuzaniye Umuheburayo wo kudukengera! Yaje iyo ndi ngw aryamane nanje, ndaheza ntabaza n’ijwi rirenga: maz’ abonye nshize ijwi hejuru ntabaje, antana impuzu yiwe, arahunga, arasohoka.Itanguriro 39:12-15″

Iyi ni inkuru ya Yosefu nibaza ko benshi muyizi.Yagurishijwe na bene se, ageze kwa Potifari agira ikiganza ciza, muka potifari yipfuza ko baryamana,Yosefu aranka. Amaze kwanka muka potifari aca ahengera atanumwe ari munzu,aca afata Yosefu ngo baryamane, nawe ariruka amutana impuzu yiwe,arasoka.

Muka Potifari niko kugumya iyo mpuzu ya Yosefu, aca atabaza abo murugo amwagiriza ko ashatse kumufata kunguvu. Abibwira n’umugabo wiwe Potifari ashitse, uburake buraziriringa, aca ata Yosefu mumunyororo.

Aha ntaco Yosefu yari gukora ngo yivugire. Uretse Imana yonyene ntawundi yar’azi ko Yosefu atashatse gukora ivyo yagirijwe, kuko hari n’ikimenyamenya(impuzu yiwe mumaboko ya muka potifari).

Benedata, hari igihe umuntu ashikamwo ntashobore kwivugira,abantu bakamumenya ukutari ko, akitwa izina ribi kandi muvyukuri atari mubi. Bihora bishika kandi abantu bagacafuza umuntu, kurugero aho n’abavyumva hagera igihe bavyizera ko ari ukuri ijana kw’ijana. Ivyo nivyo Yosefu yariko aracamwo.

Gusa, n’ubwo bigoye kwakira, burya navyo biba biri mumugambi w’Imana. Imana iratangaje, kuko irakoresha na Satani mugushitsa umugambi wayo. Aho niho tugera tukavangigwa,iyo tubonye Satani yitijije abantu, akabakoresha mukwonona ivyacu.

Iyo uri mugihe udashobora kwivugira, ukwiye gusenga Imana ikaguha inkomezi z’umutima, kuko nizo uba ukeneye ako kanya. Izo nkomezi nizo zizotuma ugira inyifato nziza mugihe nkico.

Vyarangiye Imana ivugiye Yosefu, ariko biciye kure. Yosefu aba uw’icubahiro kurusha n’abamutaye mumvuto bamubeshera.

Iyo duciye mugihe nk’ico ca Yosefu co kubesherwa, co kutaronka uwutuvugira(mubibazo vyacu), rimwe na rimwe biratugora kwiyumvisha ko Imana izotugirira neza mbere kurenza ivyokorwa n’abo nyene banse kutuvugira, ariko ukuri n’uko Imana ibona ibiri imbere iba izi ingene izobikora bikarangira dutabawe.

Mur’ico gihe, dukwiye kubera maso inyifato yacu, kugira ngo ibihe nk’ivyo bigoye ntibidukure mumugambi w’Imana.Kwiherezo,Imana izotuvugira ikoresheje abo yahisemwo, canke izoca muzindi nzira zayo, itumare umubabaro twatewe n’ivyo bihe.

Iyo Imana igufiseko umugambi, iyo udashobora kwiryamira ica iseruka ikakurwanira kuko iguhozako ijisho mu gihe ugororotse. Yosefu amaze kuronka isezerano mu nzozi maze akazibarira umuryango wiwe, abo bavukana bose baciye bamwanka mbere na nyina na se n’abo barabigaya. Yaciye mu nzira itoroshe benewabo bamuta mu gisumanyenzi, bamukurayo baramugurisha, iyo agurishijwe, umugore aramubeshera atabga mw’ibohero maze Uhoraho Imana ikoresha uburyo butangaje kugira ngo imushitseko ivyo yamusezeraniye.

title: Wirinde ingaruka zo kwiyoberanya.
content:
« Maz’ umwami w’Abisirayeli abarira Yehoshafati, ati Ngiye kwiyoberanya, nje mu rugamba; ariko weho ni wambare imyambaro yawe y’ubgami. Nuk’ umwami w’Abisirayeli ariyoberanya, aja mu rugamba.1Abami22:30″

Iki gihe umwami w’Abisirayeli yitwa Ahabu be n’umwami w’Abayuda yitwa Yehoshafati bafatanije muntambara kurwanya umwami w’i Siriya. Ahabu aca agira amayeri yo kwiyoberanya ngo ntiyambare nk’umwami, ahubwo yambare nk’umusoda asanzwe, kugira bitume abo barwana batamumenya.Niko yabigenje ariko ntivyaje kumuhira, kuko iyo ntambara yayiguyemwo.

Kwiyoberanya munzira ija mw’ijuru ni bibi. Bituma umuntu adashingira intahe Imana kuko kubwo kwiyoberanya hari abatamenya ko atinya Imana. Kandi kuba batabimenya bimukwegera ibishuko atogize iyo aba ari umuntu adatinya kwerekana uw’ari we. Kandi akenshi ben’uyo muntu ntaragama mugakiza.

N’ubwo Ahabu yari yiyoberanije, bibiliya ivuga ngo « Maz’umuntu umwe wo mu rugamba apfa kurasa, agema umwami w’Abisirayeli(Ahabu) ah’ivyuma bimukingira bihurira;.[1abam22:34]

Benedata, iy’umuntu yiyoberanya yiyumvira ko aba yabitoye, ariko uwumugema umwampi ntamenya n’aho avuye(uwumukura mugakiza akamusubiza mw’isi). Abantu bazokwubahira agakiza wabagaragarije ko wakiriye mukubashingira intahe, ariko niwiyoberanya,ukibwira ngo gikuru n’umutima, kuko abantu umutima batawumenya,bazokwama bakuzanira ibishuko,kandi babikore ataco bikanga kuko n’ubundi ntiwaberetse ko utameze nkabo.Muri benshi bazokugerageza ntihazoburamwo n’umwe azokugema umwampi. Nico gituma atari vyiza kwiyoberanya.

Ikindi,iyo umuntu yiyoberanya abuza uburinzi bw’ingabo zo mw’ijuru kuza kuri we. Kuko Abamarayika bo mw’ijuru babera maso intambuko z’umuntu yagaragaje koko ko atari uw’isi, bakagenda bamukingira kandi bamugwanirira intambara yohura nazo kubwo gukurikira Imana. Nico gituma abantu biyoberanya badashikama muvyizegwa, inyuma y’igihe runaka baca babivamwo.

Abizera twese,dukwiye gushingira intahe abo turi bo, kuko ni kimwe muvyo twashiriweho, kandibizotuma no kuri wa musi Yesu atagira isoni zo kutwemangira imbere ya Data.

No mu buzima bga minsi yose umuntu wese akwiriye guhagararira ico ari, ico yemera n’ico akora maze hari impanuro, impinduka cane ubufasha bukenewe akabuhabga. Ba nyamwiyoberanya usanga bagoye kandi bagowe kuko usanga buzuye uburyarya n’ubugunge, usanga ari ba ntahomfatwa kandi ata kintu na kimwe bakora mu kugororoka. Iyo bafise amabanga bata abantu mu kaga kuko iherezo ryabo riba ribi. N’uko mwana w’umuntu, wame uvuga ukuri kandi ugendera mu kuri kuko bizomurikira abandi.

title: “Ico ubiba nico wimbura” Uzirikana iri jambo.
content:
IHAME RYO KUBIBA NO KWIMBURA.

« Umubarire, ut’ Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, ngo Non’ urishe, utak’ ushikira imyandu? Uheze umubarire, ut’ Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, ngw Ah’ imbga zarigatiye amaraso ya Naboti, ni ho zizorigatira n’ayawe.1 Abami 21:19″

Ibi vyabwiwe umwami Ahabu,kuko umugore wiwe Yezebeli yari yishe Naboti,kugira ashikire uruzabibu rwa Naboti kuko yari yarwimanye.Imana rero ica imutumako Eliya,ati umubwire ati …ah’imbwa zarigatiye amaraso ya Naboti,niho zizorigatira ayawe.

Ibi bisa nivyo bibiliya ivuga ko ic’ umuntu abiba arico azokwimbura.Yesu we yavuze ko uwicisha inkota azokwicishwa inkota.Musi y’izuba rero,ihame ryo kubiba n’ukwimbura ni ury’ukuri,ivyo umuntu abiba,ari vyiza ari bibi,biba bizomugarukira.

Ariko rero,hari uburyo umuntu yokoresha akabiburizamwo kurugero runana.Nivyo ahabu yaciye akora amaze kwumva ivyago bizomushikira n’ibizoshikira umuryango wiwe kubw’ico yakoze.

« Maze ahabu yumvise ayo majambo,aca yitantamurirakw’ impuzu ziwe,aryama mu magunira nyene,agenda yifumbereje.1abami 22:29″

Iyi ni inyifato ahabu yagize yo guca bugufi,yo kwihana.Vyakoze kumutima w’Uhoraho,aca abwira Eliya ati « mbega wabonye ingene Ahabu yicishije bugufi imbere yanje?ko yicishije bugufi atyo…,sinzozana ivyago kungoma yiwe,…1abami21:19 ».

Iyi niyo nyifato ikwiriye imbere y’umuntu yisanze muvyo yakoze bibi,ni « ugucabugufi,akihana ».Atabikoze uko,aba abivye imbuto mw’isi y’impwemu,iba izomugarukira vuba canke kera.

Uwurenganya,igihe kiba kizogera bakamurenganya.Uwiba,aba abivye imbuto mw’isi y’impwemu,nawe baba bazomwiba,kandi bikaba ingaruka z’ivyo yakoze.Uwusambana,aba abivye imbuto mw’isi y’impwemu,azokwisanga n’abana biwe iyo mpwemu yarabakurikiranye(nk’uko vyabaye kuri Dawidi amaze gusambana na betisheba,iyo mpwemu yaciye yinjira no mubana biwe).Kwihana nirwo rupfunguruzo rwo kubiburizamwo kurugero runaka.Kwihana nikwo kwatumye mugishingo c’ivyago vyagira bishikire ninewe,Imana ibagwizako ubuntu bwayo,ntiyabarandura.

Benedata,twese dushobora kugira integenke muburyo bumwe canke ubundi.Ariko dukwiye kumenya ko ico dukoze,ari ciza ari kibi tuba tubivye imbuto mw’isi y’impwemu.Iyo bishitse Mpwemu yera akatwemeza ico twakoze kitari ciza,dukwiye gucabugufi,tukihana,bizotuma mw’isi y’impwemu tuburizamwo ingaruka zavyo kuruhero runaka.

Igihe cose ugomba kugira ico ukora canke uvuga, igihe cose uriko ushaka gukora umugambi canke ugomba kugira ico ukorana n’abandi, urame uzirimaka yuko ivyo mukora vyose bifise n’ivyo muvuga vyose bifise ingaruka ari nziza canke ari mbi. Nta gikorwa na kimwe kitagira ingaruka nziza canke mbi. Ni wame urondera ibikorwa bivyara umusaruro mwiza kuri wewe, ku muryango wawe no kubandi, amen!

title: Imvugo y’Imana ku bantu bayo n’iyo kubaremesha, kubatera intege no kubirura.
content:
IMVUGO Y’IMANA KUBANTU BAYO.

« Hinge numve ivyo Imana, Uhoraho, igira ivuge:Kukw izobgira abantu bayo n’abakunzi bayo ivy’ amahoro;Ariko ntibaze basubire mu bupfu.Zaburi 85:8″

Imana irafise uko ivuga kubantu bayo(abayubaha) canke kubatayubaha.Imvugo yayo iratandukanye,biterwa n’umurwi umuntu arimwo.

Twasomye,ngo kukw’izobwira abantu bayo n’abakunzi bayo ivy’amahoro ».

Muyindi mvugo,Imana ntamajambo y’agacavutu canke y’ibicantege ivuga kubayubaha.

Ariko rero,turi murugendo rw’amajwi,aho umuntu yumva vyinshi inyuma canke imbere muri we.Amwe mumajwi avugira mumuntu ashobora kuba ari « naragowe,ntibizokunda,abantu ntibankunda,sinzokira,ntakazi nzoronka,ba naka bo barahiriwe,… »Mur’ayo majwi yose, ntanarimwe riva ku Mana ririmwo,ayo ava kuri satani,kuko Imana yo « izobwira abakunzi bayo ivy’amahoro ».

Kubantu bayo Imana irabaremesha,ibatera intege,ibabwira amajambo y’ivyizigiro.

Bitewe n’amajwi rero umuntu yumva,bishobora kumuhushisha inzira,canke bikamugumiza munzira.Amajwi iyo atari meza ashobora kukubuza kubaho wishimye,iyo ari meza atuma unezererwa ubuzima uko bwoba buje kwose.

Mukugira umuntu aneshe intambara y’amajwi biramusaba kuba azi ijambory’Imana,iyo haje ibicantege akaryifashisha akongerwa intege.Imana idufitiye imigambi myiza,ivyo abayubaha nivyo dukwiye guhora dushirako umutima no mugihe twoba twumva amajwi atari meza aduteye.

Turangirize kur’uyu murongo:

« Kuko nzi ivyiyumviro mbiyumvirako,ni jewe Uhoraho mbivuze,kw’ari ivyiyumviro vy’amahoro atari ivy’ivyago,kugira ngo mbahe ivyizigiro vyo mw’iherezo ryanyu.Yeremiya 29:11″.

Kukow’ihanyeivyahavyaweukezwaubuukabaubandanirakwamaugororokeraUhorahoImanaatarimumajambogusacankemunyigishozibeshaabantungouragororotsekukowizeye, Imanaigufitiyeimigambimyizaremakandiutekane.

title: Amasezerano Imana yahaye ihanga ry’Abarundi aregereje.
content:
Iyo tuvuze yuko Uhoraho Imana agira ashitse Isezerano ry’igihugu c’Uburundi, ntituba tuvuze ca civugo ca leta y’uBurundi ngo “Imbonakazoza y’Uburundi yo mu 2040-2060” bahavuye bavuga ngo ni umugambi w’Imana. Birya bavuga ni ibihendwabana kuko igihugu cifashe mu 2040, ubu mu 2024, abantu baba babona amabarabara n’amahinguriro biriko birubakwa. Kubera iki abategetsi bahitamwo imvugo y’urusinziriza ku Barundi mu kubereka ibicapo vyo muri kazoza kubereka ivyo bariko barakora ubu kugira ngo igihugu kive mu bukene kirimwo!

Tuvuze yuko Imana igira ishitse Isezerano ku gihugu c’Uburundi, tuba tuvuze ivyo Imana iriko iratubarira aho umugambi wayo ku gihugu c’Uburundi igira uve mu buhanuzi wambare umubiri. Imana igira ikoreshe abo yatoranije kugira ngo ishitse ico yasezeranye. Ivyo yasezeranye kugira ngo ubumenye wandika ngaha nyene uti “Amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Uburundi”, uca uvyisomera vyose nkuko twagiye turabibashikiriza kuva mu 2016.

Ku bantu batizera yuko Imana ivuga kandi igakora, n’uko kumbure batizera inkuru zanditse muri Bibiliya Yera canke batarumviriza ibishingantahe tubashikiriza vy’uturorero tw’ivyo Imana yadukoreye. Yarabanje iravuga hanyuma irashitsa. Tubahe akarorero kamwe kabaye kandi abari ku butegetsi uyu munsi barashobora ku kamenya. Petero Nkurunziza akiri mw’ishamba yinjiye mu masengesho y’indwi zibiri mu gihugu ca Tanzania i Bihalamuro. Mur’ayo masengesho niho yabaririwe yuko intambara igiye guhera kandi yuko azoba umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi. Ico gihe nyene niho yabarirwa yuko niyagamburukira Imana akayihesha icubahiro mu gihugu yuko izomuha kuramba kandi yuko n’igihugu kizogira impore kandi gitere imbere. Yaranagabishijwe yuko n’atakora ivyo Imana igomba yuko itazobura kubimuhora. Mur’ico gihe nyene Petero Nkurunziza yahabga ayo masezerano, Denise Bucumi Nkurunziza, aho yasengera ku rusengero mu Bwiza, umukozi w’Imana yahaje ava mu gihugu ca Camerouni yaramuvugishijweko ati: “witwa nde?” Uwundi ati: “Nitwa Denise Bucumi Nkurunziza.” Wa muvugishwa nawe ati:”Mbonye umuntu yitwa NKURUNZIZA abaye umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi.” Ivya nta muntu yari kuvyiyumvira yuko vyobaye ukuri. Nti vyatevye muri 2005 ivyari ubuvugishwa vyarambaye umubiri abantu bose barabibona. Ico gihe bikivugwa niho twari kandi vyari bigoye gutahura yuko ipfuvyi yi 1972 izoshika ku butegetsi biciye mu matora mu gihe yari mu migwi irwana itigeze ifata n’agasozi na kamwe mu gihugu ngo ikamareko indwi ikagwanira. Ico Imana yivugiye iragishitsa, ntawukizibira naho yoba yitwaje ibingana gute.

Tukiri ku vyerekeye Petero Nkurunziza nyene, mwibuke yuko kubera ingene yatanguye neza hanyuma bikamugora kubandanya inzira basezeranye n’Imana, twarabashikirije ingene umuvugishwa yeretswe yaguye i Karuzi mugabo akajanwa guhambwa i Gitega. Inyuma y’imyaka 7 ivyo vyashitse uko yavyeretswe. Dufise ibishingatahe vyinshi vy’uturorero tw’ingene Imana ivuga hanyuma igashitsa ivyo yasezeranye, ni naco gituma n’uyu munsi tubamenyesheje yuko Uhoraho Imana yo mw’ijuru igira ishitse amasezerano yose yahaye Ihanga ry’Abarundi.

Ni mwitegurire kwakira ivyo Imana yavuganye namwe. Mu kuvyitegurira si ukundi, ni umwe wese yihana ivyaha vyiwe, akezwa hanyuma uwariwe wese agakora ico yahamagariwe gukora. Amen!

title: Ugire ukwicisha bugifi bizotuma ushirwa hejuru
content:
« Nuko mwicishe bugufi muri musi y’ukuboko kw’Imana kw’ubushobozi, kugira ngw’iz’ ibashire hejuru mu gihe gikwiye.1 Petero 5:6″.

Mubushake bw’Imana yipfuza gushira abantu hejuru.N’uko twavutse biratwigisha,umuntu avuga ari muto,agakura gahorogahoro,kugeza igihe aba umuntu wo gutumwa ijambo.N’ubwo nabwo ni bumwe muburyo bwo gushirwa hejuru.

Ariko rero,n’ubwo Imana yipfuza kudushira hejuru(kuduteza intambwe),guca bugufi vyo n’amahitamwo y’umuntu.Ikitari amahitamwo,n’ugushirwa hejuru,kuko ni Imana ibikora,niyo womenga n’abantu baba babikoze,burya aba ari Imana.

Bibiliya ivuga ko Yesu yicishije bugufi,araganduka mbere gushitsa no kurupfu rwo kumusaraba,ngo nico catumye Imana imushira hejuru.Imana rero niyo ishira hejuru,uruhara rw’umuntu n’uguca bugufi.

Gusa,benshi batahura ugucabugufi ukutariko.Gucabugufi kwiza kugizwe no kwumvira Imana,canke abantu(iyo batagusavye gukora icaha).Gucabugufi kwiza s’ukureka abantu bakaguhonyorako,s’ukugenda wunamye,si nokwigira umunyantegenke canke guhakana ubuntu Imana yagushizemwo.

Gucabugufi kwiza harimwo kwemera ivyo ushoboye,ariko ukagaragaza ko vyose ari ubuntu bw’Imana,atari wewe wabikoze.Gucabugufi kwiza harimwo kurwanirira uburenganzira bwawe,ariko utarengeye akarimbi abandi canke ngo uve mumurongo w’ijambo ry’Imana.

Umuntu aciye bugufi ntiyerekana ko ari igitangaza,ko arenze abandi mukintu ico arico cose.Ntarondera gukora ibintu ngo abantu bamushireko amaso,bamubone,bamushime.Umuntu aciye bugufi arondera icubahiro c’Imana muvyo akora vyose.

Ben’uyo muntu rero aciyebugufi,aba ari munzira imuganisha mucubahiro.Igihe gikwiye kigeze,Imana iba izomushira hejuru.Nibaza ko umuntu wese akeneye icubahiro akwiye gusenga ngo Imana imuhe umutima uciye bugufi,kuko Imana ishira hejuru abaciye bugufi.

Igitangaje,hari abantu umenga ntibaciye bugufi,ariko waraba ugasanga Imana yarabahaye icubahiro.Ariko burya iyishira hejuru ninayo ishobora no gucisha bugufi.Imana ishobora gucisha bugufi n’abakomeye.Yarabikoreye umwami Nebukadineza,kubw’ubwibone amara imyaka indwi yarirukanywe mubantu,arisha ivyatsi.Yarabikoreye kandi Herode,kubw’amajambo yavuze arimwo ubwibone,vyatumye umumarayika amukubita aca apfa ako kanya.Umuntu wese w’ubwibone,aba ariko agana mugucishwabugufi atabizi.

Ntakintu ciza nko gucabugufi.Abantu baciyebugufi uzosanga babana neza n’abandi,bafise igikundiro,uzosanga bipfuriza ivyiza abandi,…kandi gucabugufi ni kimwe mubimenyetso bidahara vyerekana ko umuntu aba yarahuye na Yesu.Dukwiye gusenga,kugira ngo Imana iduhe kubaho dufise umutima uciyebugufi,hanyuma nayo ize idushire hejuru mugihe gikwiye.

Iyo uca bugufi ntaco uhomba uretse inyungu z’umutengera.

title: Uburundi, uravye uko abenegihugu babayeho, burakeneye umukiza.
content:
UBURUNDI BURAGWAYE INGWARA KANDI BURAREMVYE BUKENEYE UMUKIZA.

Maze iminsi nitegereza ibibera mu butegetsi, ibibera mu migambge, ibendera mu madini n’amashengero n’ibibera mu bantu hagati yabo ubgabo, nasanze uburundi bukeneye umukiza.Umutegetsi ariba igihugu ajejwe gukingira, akanyaga akarenganya n’abene gihugu ajejwe kurenganura atacamira. Niwe agaruka akikomesha induru yagiriza abandi yuko ari ibisuma kandi yuko arenganya abantu kandi ntihabura n’abahagwa bagakurwa mu kazi bagapfungwa.Abanyamigambge bararenganya, bakarenganya gushika naho birengagiza ukuri kwose bakavuga yuko amashure ataco amaze kugira ngo bakoreshe urwaruka ku nyungu zabo gusa. Aho gutegura kazoza keza k’igihugu bategura kwirundanirizako ibintu vyise kugira ngo bategeke bose atawuryogora. Ivyo bigiye gukwega akarambaraye mutaravye neza.Abanyamadini n’abanyamashengero binyegeza mu nyigisho z’Imana kugira ngo bakore ivyo bigisha abandi kudakora. Ivyaha vyiraye mu bigisha abandi guheba ivyaha. Umuntu atanga ico afise.Ingeso z’arononekaye, ubu ntukigira uwo wokwizera kuko n’iwo muvukana arakuryaruka ni naco gituma huzuye imanza nyinshi z’amatati mu gihugu.Abagabo, abashingantahe n’imvuga kuri urazibura aho wazibonye kuko bose batinyira ubuzima bgabo. Ababi n’ikibi kiriganje mu Barundi. Uwugize ngo aravuze atera amashurwe abaganza naho boba aribo nyanduruko y’ibibi vyose, uwitwa nawe ngo akoresheje urwenge arihorera, akayinga maze agacika ntirumveko. None igihugu kizokizwa na bande!Igihugu c’Uburundi n’abarundi, bavyemera batovyemera, bararwaye kandi bararemvye kandi bakeneye umukiza budatinze!

Ni musenge, mubiroge kandi mwicishe bugufi Imana itabare.

title: President Evariste Ndayishimiye avugwako ibintu vyinshi.
content:
Umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye avugwako vyinshi bitari vyiza n’abamwegereye uretse abasanzwe bagwanya ubutegetsi bgiwe. Muvyo yagirizwa harimwo yuko asanzwe aganzwa n’umukenyezi wiwe, uwo nawe akaba ariwe afata ingingo mbi z’igihugu, akaba anyuruza n’itunga ry’igihugu mu gihe Président Evariste Ndayishimiye kenshi yoba avuga amajambo menshi n’ivyo akora kenshi abitumwa n’ivyo aba yanyoye.

Umwe mubo bama bari hafi na hafi mu bikorwa vya minsi yose yoba yagize umwihwezo ati: “Nta mutegetsi n’umwe  mu Burundi ataratabwa mu rudubi n’amajambo NEVA yavuze. Wewe wibwiyeko ugomba gushira mungiro ivyo yavuze uba wishize mu vyago kuko bukeye arakwihakana akagutuka akakugotsa kandi mutari buharire ng’umutsinde. Ni wumva ijambo avuze ntuzotwarwe n’ibishobisho, uzabanze wiyumvire uti abivuze ahejeje kwihereza amacupa angahe? Ivyavuze mu kanya gato aba yavyibagiye, wongeye kubimubaza canke kumwishuza, ntabura ingene yigovyora nka President ariko ufise ubwenge uba wumva nyene ko ataco wokwitega.

Reka nguhe uturorero, kuri birya vy’abadandaza mu masoko yabivuze yururutse indege avuye mu mahanga.  inzira yose twarikumwe yaje yihereza amacupa ya champagne mu ndege twashitse amaze kunywa kuma whisky 3 y’ubgoko butandukanye ngo ariko arahonja yumve ubudasa yongere yige difference irihagati yizo njabuka, Twururutse abamenyeshamakuru baca bamubaza birya bibazo. …Rero twebwe nk’abanugendanira, tuba tuziko ivyo agire yishure bizakuba urudubi. Niyo mpamvu dutangura kwiyumvira ingene duhava tuza gusigura Ivyo yavuze kugira ntibiteze scandale mu gihugu.

Harya abavugizi n’abahanuzi n’abashikiranganji dufise igikorwa kitoroshe co kwama turondera insiguro tuza gutanga ahejeje kuvuga kuko iyavuze yagasomye avuga ibintu bigoye kwemera no gushira mungiro bitaba vyizweko niyo mpamvu tugumana insiguro hafi kuvyo yavuze, ubundi siko vyarikumera niwe yari kuduha intumbero ariko noneho nitwe duha intumbero ivyavuga.

Kuri birya vya pension, birya yabivuze avuye muri dîner yarahejeje gusoma kuka vinyu ka 45% d’alcool yanyoye uturahure 2, acazagutanga kirya kiganiro. Urabonako haciye hafi plus de 2ans abivuze n’ubu ntimwitege ngo bizoja mu ngiro vuba kandi harya yarahejeje kwigovyora ko yavuzeko yasanze bigoye akaba yarashizeho umurwi uriko uravyiga. Harya ni kurya nyene vyaraheze ni mpaka mandat irangire.

Muribuka ivya mpanda, avuga abanyuruje 53milliards nahone yabivuze yasomye ku gacupa. Muribuka mu kiganiro n’abenegihugu,  mu mwaka uheze ingene yatukana kukibazo bamubajije, n’ubu yarabisubiriye haribibabazo umubajije kubera aba yarunyoye, ishavu rigaca riduga vuba n’imwe muma effets ya alcool. Burya twebwe abagabo iyo dusomye agacupa har’amajambo amwe namwe dushobora kuvuga tukayumva ukundi ndetse igahinduka dossier ndende ariko zikuvuyeko bikaba biheze. Rero harya n’ubgo atukana iyo zimuhezemwo yimereye neza murasubira mugatwenga akanibagirako yagututse imbere y’abantu.

Ni vyinshi nti two heza ikiyago ni vyinshi. Muri make uzokwemere ijambo rya Neva niyarivuga mu gatondo ataranywa canke bivuzwe n’umutambukanyi wiwe kuko ubu niwe mukoresha dufise muri présidence. Ivyo avuze n’ivyo bifise agaciro gusumba ibivuzwe na président! Njerina akubwiye ikintu nico ukora ubwambere ugahagarika ivyo wabwiwe na président kandi iyagarutse kukubaza ahugejeje ivyoyaguhaye ukamwishurako utabikoze kubera iyindi ndinganizo wahawe n’umutambukanyi wiwe ntakindi asunizamwo, aca yishura ati sawa bigire ukonyene. Ariko wihende wanke ivya Njerina ukurikize ivya Neva, buca kabiri ukumva hasohotse decret igukura mu mabanga kandi yasinyweko na Neva ubwiwe wibaze wariko urakora ivyo yagusavye gukora, atakosa washizemwo ukumirwa. Niyo mpamvu ubona président avuga abategetsi tukitwengera ariko Ngelina umugore wiwe avuze ntawutwenga biba biri serieux »

Abantu benshi basomye iki kiyago uwo mugendanyi wa President Evariste Ndayishimiye yakoze baremeza yuko ari ivy’ukuri igihugu ar’uko gitwawe babonye ingingo zifatwa, abakurwa mu kazi, abapfungwa n’ibindi. Kuvyerekeye ingingo zihambaye z’igihugu hariho ingingo ikarishe y’ivyerekeye ivyo intambara Abarundi barimwo muri RDC kuvyerekeye amafaranga umukuru w’igihugu yahawe n’ico gihugu n’ingene abasirikare barungitsweyo bafashe, hariho n’ibindi vyerekeye ingene umuryango w’umukuru w’igihugu uriko urihagira amatongo yo mu gihugu hagati, ukugura amazu munshi mu bisagara harimwo n’ihoteri yitwa panoramique yoba yaguzwe miliyaridi 34 bivugwa yuko yoba yasohowe mu kigega c’igihuguBRB,ivyo bikaba vyarateye icuka mu bantu, mu gihe igihugu cose kiri mu bukene nta ngere.

Duhanura Abarundi kumenya ingene bifata mu bihe bigoye na cane cane guhagararira ukuri. Igihugu cubakiwe ku binyoma kirasenyuka kandi gihitana beneco kuko banse kugisegura.

title: Abantu benshi binyegeza muvy’Imana bakihuma amaso ngo “Imana izobaha igihugu” bakiyibagiza yuko kirwanirwa.
content:
Kenshi turumva abantu biyita abahanuzi abandi bagahagarara ku buhanuzi maze bakiyimikira kuba abami n’abigira abaherezi. Mwarumvise ivyo abagabo biyimitse bitwa ba Muhimpundu Lambert, ba Katikati ubu bapfunzwe mw’ibohero rikuru rya Bujumbura. Mwarumvise n’uwundi ari mu gihugu ca Australia yitwa Nicolas Bigirimana nawe aherutse kwiyimika ngo akarahirira n’ubuherezi bukuru. Burya hariho n’abandi babigera amajanja bagaca batinya ingaruka vyobagirako kuko bari mu gihugu. Abo bose binjiye mu vy’Imana maze bumva Imburi n’ubuhanuzi birabasosera ariko ijambo ryayo no kurongorwa na Mpwemu Yera bica birabasiga.

Bumvise yuko Imana itanga igihugu maze babifata nk’umukino w’akamari aho utomboza ugaca utwara ivyo utomboje. Ubutware bg’igihugu Imana irabutanga mugabo buva kure bukarwanirwa kandi Ingabo indiri zikaharwa. Kugira ngo ushike mu gihugu Imana yagusezeraniye si utujambo jambo kandi si amasengesho menshi. Aho woruhira ubusa.

Imana kugira ngo ikize isirayeli yabanje kuvukisha umurongozi, Mose anyegezwa murufunzo kuri Nil, ajanwa kurererwa ibgami kwa Farawo, yiga amashure menshi hanyuma ahungira mu bugaragwa kuragira intama imyaka 40 yose. Kandi aho ntiyashitse mu gihugu c’isezerano, yakirabiye kure mugabo cashitsemwo abandi.

Kugira ngo bashike mu gihugu c’isezerano, bamaze imyaka 40 mu bugaragwa, bamwe bariwe n’inzoka barapfa abandi isi yarasamye irabamira. Abantu benshi iyo bigisha inkuru ya isirayeli bavuga ibitangaza gusa babonye. Kugira ngo baneshe ibisagara bararwana ijoro n’umurango benshi muribo bakicwa abandi bagakomereka. Imana yaguhaye Isezerano ry’igihugu nti wicara ngo uriko uravuza inanga canke ngo uriko urasenga gusa. Umwami Dawidi arabizi kuko akiragiye intama yahora arwana n’ibikoko. Amaze gushika ku kirimba naho Sawuli yagerageza kumwica incuro nyinshi. Uretse na Sawuli, kugira ngo abe Umwami, yategerejwe kubanza kwica ikigatanya cari caragesheje Ingabo zose za isirayeli. Yanesheje Goliyati bose bumva bakadegedwa. Ntuba uwatoranijwe ngo uja kwabira ivyagusa, hariho intambara ubanza kurwana.

Igihugu c’isezerano ntibagitora mu nzira kandi si kubgo amashure, ubuhizi canke akaranga. Uretse kugitoranirizwa, urakirwanira, ukagiteramira kandi ukama ugikingira. Ntuba mugaboniryo, sa tuntu twanje, mpenuke ndamuke canke ngo wifatanye n’inkozi z’ikibi. Utegerezwa kugira umutima nk’uw’Imana igwishiriza imvura abeza n’ababi. Abanya isirayeli barabizi kuko kuva bagishitsemwo, batwawe nk’inyagano incuro nyinshi, baragwanye baraneshwa kenshi, barakorewe ihonyabgoko, amakungu yose arabanka kandi n’uyu munsi baracari mu ntambara.

Imana iyo ivuze irashitsa mugabo ishitsa ku bafise imitima n’imibiri yiteguye, ishitsa ku bantu bafise ico bazoyimarira kuko iyo bayitaye bakanjajwa, bahura n’ivyago, babura vyose bakaba inyererezi. Tegure ingabo z’igihugu cacu zame zigavye kandi zigabirije kurwanira Uburundi bg’Isezerano.

title: Ishirahamwe ry’Abarundi baba mu makungu “Diaspora Ndundi”ryidogeye umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire y’Uburundi n’ayandi makungu.
content:
Mu rwandiko rw’impapuro zine iryo shirahamwe ry’Abarundi baba hanze, baneguye umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire n’ayandi makungu yuko atabakoresha inama, iyo yakoresheje yo ku mihora nayo yabaye imvo yo kwikurayo kuko itagira intumbero.

Mur’iryo kete ryateweko umukono n’indongozi 8 ziserukira Abarundi b’ishwi bari muri Amerika, Ubgongereza, ubutaliyano, Kenya, Ubufaranda, Ubu swedi, mu Scotland na Canada; bavuga yuko (1) abima ijambo; (2) ahonyanga amategeko y’ishirahamwe ryabo kandi akabaryanisha.

Ubushikiranganji bg’imigenderanire no gufashanya n’ayandi makungu burakwiriye kugira akigoro ko guhuza Abarundi bose baba mu mahanga no kubakundisha igihugu cabo c’amavukiro kugira ngo bose bahurire kw’iterambere ry’igihugu.

title: Leta y’uburundi aho kwihutira guta abantu mu mvuto irakwiriye kwiga ikamenya igituma abantu bakora ubusuma.
content:
Abo bapfunzwe ni uwuserukira ishirahamwe #KIJSCO yadandaje imifuko 346 (umufuko umwe upima 60) n’ibiro 45 vy’ikawa yose hamwe bikaba ari ibiro 20.805 nk’uko biboneka ku masezerano yo kudandaza (Accord de vente) ya ODECA (Office pour le Développement du Café du Burundi) n’uburenganzira (Licence) vyemejwe na Banki nkuru y’igihugu BRB hamwe na n’uruhusha rwo gushora (Mise à l’export ) rwa ODECA avyerekana no ku cegeranyo ca OBR co kuwa 22/12/2023. Ico cegeranyo kikaba catanga uburenganzira bwo gupakira iyo kawa mw’ishirahamwe HORAMAMA

Vyose biri mu vyemezo Jimbere ifise vyerekana ko amadorare y’abanyamerika 51.240,5 yinjiye muri BRB. Amafaranga angana n’imiriyoni 145.785.933 Fbu akaba yarinjiye kuri compte ya KIJSCO

Impusha zitanga uburenganzira bwo kudandaza no gupakira izo kawa zose zirakwiye nayo iza ODECA zitanga uburenganzira bwo gupakira no gushora ikawa mu gihugu ca Uganda zose zateweko igikumu n’abayobozi batandukanye harimwo n’aba ODECA nk’uko impapuro zibandanya zivyerekana

Icateye amadidane abapfungiwe iyo dossier kuva kuwa 13/01/2024 kandi badandaje ikawa zikarihwa nk’uko bigenda ama dorari akinjira mu kigega, umuguzi agahabwa uburenganzira bwo kuzipakira (mise à l’export) abuhawe na ODECA, ikawa zarafatiwe k’urubibe rwa Gasenyi – Nemba igihe zari zijabukanywe mu gihugu c’Uuganda uwadandaje akaba apfunzwe

Uwuserukira ishirahamwe KIJSCO atabaza avuko ko nimba hoba harabaye kwihenda mu gupakira izo kawa yaguze atobibazwa na rirya atariho yarari aho zapakirwa. Abakozi 2 bo mwishirahamwe HORAMAMA mu ntara ya #Kayanza risanzwe ribika izo kawa nabo bati: « Ikawa zanditse ku mpapuro wagurishije (KIJSCO ) nizo twahaye umuguzi( wo muri Uganda) yaguriye KIJSCO nk’uko impapuro zemewe n’amategeko zivyemeza »

Mu butungane muri parquet ya Kirundo bati: « Ikawa zafashwe zararenze ibitigiri vyanditse ku mpapuro. Izo kawa zirenga kuzo KIJSCO yaguze zari zavuye mu ntara ya Gitega ziguzwe n’ishirahamwe JIGEBUCO ishirahamwe naryone ridandaza ikawa .izo kawa zikaba zapakiwe mu modoka (camion) ari imifuko 280 hamwe n’ibiro 29. Umuguzi yaguze n’ishirahamwe JIGEBUCO rizikura mu ntara ya Gitega niwe yazipakiye . Iyo modoka ihitana izagurishijwe n’ishirahamwe KIJSCO mu Kayanza izijanira hamwe mu gihugu ca Uganda

Abapfunzwe uko ari 9 bagizwe n’abagwizatunga 2, abakozi 2 b’ishirahamwe HORAMAMA, abakozi 3 ba OBR, umunyagihugu ava mugihugu ca Uganda, n’uwafashije Abo bagwizatunga bagatakamba bavugako batabona ico bazira kuko bafise uburenganzira bwo kugurisha izo kawa, bakaba bararishe izavuye i Gitega no mu Kayanza nk’uko amasezerano abivuga kandi biboneka ku vyegeranyo vyose kandi biteyeko ibikumu n’abegwa n’igisata c’ikawa

Umushikirizamanza wa Repuburika mu Kirundo akaba akibandanya amatohoza mu gihe izo kawa zibitswe ku rubibe rwa Gasenyi-Nemba muri komine Busoni intara ya Kirundo.

Si irya mbere kandi si irya kabiri abujejwe kwubahiriza amategeko aribo bayahonyanga mu kwiba, kunyuruza, kurenganya canke gukorana n’inkozi z’ikibi mu gukora ivyaha. Mwene abo uko ubapfunga niko bamenya amayeri yo kwiba kandi niko bamenya n’inzira zo gupfungurwa. Ikintu gikuru leta ikwiriye kumenya kugira ngo itorere umuti ikibazo c’igiturire n’ibindi vyaha bikorwa n’abari mu nzego z’igihugu ni ukubanza kubenya igituma bakora ivyo vyaha hanyuma ugatorera umuti ako karanda.

title: Kigwena: nk’ayandi mashure ariko araraba intererano yo kwubakirwa utuzu twa sugwumwe naryo n’uko!
content:
Utwo tuzu twa surwumwe dukenye kw’ishure shingiro rya kigwena ya kabiri. Ni muri komine na Rumonge Province .Hari utuzu twa surwumwe tubiri, kamwe muri bwo karabomotse. N’agasigaye biboneka ko umwanya n’umwanya gashobora gusiduka na ko nyene.

Samuel NTIBAKUNDWA, umuyobozu w’iryo shure avuga ko ku ruhande rwabo bakoze ico bashoboye ariko birabananira kubwubaka kubera uburyo buke iryo shure rifise.Uwo muyobozi avuga ko ico kibazo yagituye abamukurira ariko kugeza akaba ata kiravamwo.

Samuel NTIBAKUNDWA arasaba ababijejwe gufasha kugira abanyeshure bangana 750 biga kuri iryo Shure baronke ubwiherero.

Mu buyobozi bw’indero muri komine Rumonge bamenyesha ko mu bihe nk’ivyo, ishure rishobora gutunganya inama n’abavyeyi kugira ngo bige ico kibazo.

Abantu bagenwa mu mabanga yo mu ndero co kimwe no mu yandi mabanga y’igihugu bakwiriye kuba ari abantu babikwiye, bakunda umwuga bakora kandi bawunezerererwa, abantu iyo hadutse ikibazo cose barondera kugitorera umuntu bari kumwe n’abo basangiye ibikorwa.

title: Umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi Ndayishimiye Evarite yigishiriza abanyamigambge ku mirima yiwe
content:
Umukuru w’Igihugu c’Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye mu rugendo arimwo mu ntara zo hagati mu gihugu, kuri uyu wa gatatu yagirishije urugendo shure abarongoye imigambwe itandukanye kugira bigire ku migambi y’uburimyi n’ubworozi ariko ararangura mu ntara za Gitega na Karusi.Mu ntara ya #Gitega yaberetse umugambi ujanye n’ubworozi bw’ibizinu , ubw’inka n’ingurube aho akoresha amase y’ivyo bitungwa mu guhingura umuyagankuba ivyo bita biogaz, ahakorerwa igikorwa co kugwiza imbuto zirobanuye z’ibiraya. Yabasiguriye ko ivyo bikorwa bituma hatangwa ubuzi ku benegihugu kandi bikabateza imbere. Abo barongoye imigambwe yabagabiye inka icenda maze abasaba gushinga Ishirahamwe ryabo kugira zibabere umutahe maze bereke abanywanyi babo akarorero mu bikorwa vyo kwiteza imbere.Umukuru w’Igihugu yabashikanye no mu ntara ya Karusi ahariko habera ubworozi bw’amafi. Aho hose abo barongoye imigambwe basigurirwa ingene iyo migambi irangurwa, uko yatanguye gushika ku ntambwe basanze ibikorwa bishitseko.

Abavyumva n’ababirorera bavuga yuko bisa neza ivyo akora n’izo nyigisho yatanze ariko ababizi bemeza yuko ari ibintu vyo gusanaza Abarundi kubera imvo zikurikira:

1. Ayo matongo aranguriramwo iyo migambi y’uburimyi n’ubgorozi yayanyaze Abarundi bato bato bariko bariteza imbere, arahabimura kugira ngo ahakorere ivyiwe. Amarira sayo abanye Karusi bonyene no muzindi ntara baridoga batari bu ryogore.

2. Mu buryo yakoresheje kugira ngo arangure iyo migambi harimwo imiduga, igitoro n’abakozi ba leta. Asukiranije uburyo bga leta n’ivyiwe bica vyitwa… itunga ry’igihugu. Aho hari utuburungu nawe n’uhuzuze kuko ivya leta birakwiriye gutandukanywa n’ivy’umukozi wa leta. Ahubgo ababikora bose barakwiriye kubiheba.

3. Ingingo y’ijana na rimwe y’ibgirizwa shingiro rigenga leta y Uburundi rirerekana neza imirimo idafadikanywa no kuba umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi. Iyo mirimo nayo harimwo uburimyi n’ubgorozi, urudandazwa n’ibindi. Aho rero n’ukuvuga yuko umukuru w’igihugu yakoze icaha co guhemuka mu guca kubiri n’ibgorizwa shingiro ry’igihugu.

4. Abihweza utuntu n’utundi bavuga yuko agomvye kugira urugendo shule, yorugiriye ku murimyi n’umworozi wa kijambere atorugiriye mu rugo iwe ngo yereke abo yigisha yuko abaruta mugabo yari kwerekana yuko Abarundi bateye imbere.

Urashobora kuba nawe ufise ico wiyumvira kur’ivyo umukuru w’igihugu yakoze gitandukanye n’ico abandi bashikirije, vyose ni vyiza yuko abantu bungutana ivyiyumviro, iciza kikitwaciza, ikibi kikitwa izina ryaco ariko rero aho itunganywa ry’igihugu cose ripfira, umuntu wese yomenya yuko ari mu kutubaha amategeko.

title: Patirisi Ntafatiro: Umurundi canke umunyamahanga akwiriye kwubaha ibintu vy’uwundi ntavyitiranye na rwiwe.
content:
Umuronzi w’ikirundi Patrice Ntafatiro arasaba abakoresha ibintu aronga kuza baravuga aho babikuye.Kuri we ivyo yemeza ko amaze kuzana bironze bisigaye bikoreshwa n’ibi:

-Ijambo « Umwubahwa »avuga ko ariwe yaritanguje, mu gukosora ijambo « Nyakwubahwa »ridaha agaciro umuntu yubashwe arikwiriye,kuko umwise Nyakwubahwa ntuba umwubashe uba ubimwipfurije.

-Ijambo « Abarundi b’Ishwi »risigura abarundi baba mu mahanga bakunze kwita aba Diaspora naryo nyene ngo niwe yaritanguje.

-Ijambo « Nyeninganji » rikwiye kwitwa umukuru w’igihugu kuko « Nyenicubahiro » basanzwe bamwita arisangiye n’icegera ciwe, umutambukanyi wiwe ndetse n’umushikaranganji wa mbere, Ntafatiro akabona ko akwiye kwitwa izina yisangije ariryo « Nyeninganji ».

Ntafatiro arashavuzwa n’abantu baza barihagira ibintu vyiwe bakavyiyitirira, kandi ko bamwe mu barundi bafise ingeso yo kwihagira ibintu vy’abandi akabasaba kuvavanura n’iyo ngeso.

Ntafatiro Patrice aherutse gusohora igitabo yise « UBUSUMA BUGUSIGA AHO BUGUSANZE » akazogishira ahabona icese italiki 24/02/22024.

Mwari muzi ico arico Umuronzi?

UmurōnziniUmuntu aronda (arondera) ivyo avuga, akagira uburonzi.Umuntu aronga ivyo yarondeye ngo abiguhe bironze!

Abantu bafise canke bakora ibikorwa bisangije bakwiriye kwubahirizwa muvyo bakora canke mu mwuga wabo mbere bakanunganirwa n’ubutegetsi bg’igihugu.

title: Ugire inyifato nk’iyumwami Dawidi imbere y’abakuvugako ivyo bishakiye vyose
content:
INYIFATO YA DAWIDI IMBERE YA SHIMEYI.

« Maz’ umwami Dawidi ashitse i Bahurimu, hasokoroka umuntu wo mu muryango wa Sauli yitwa Shimeyi mwene Gera, agenda aramutuka inzira yose. Agenda aratera umwami Dawidi amabuye, n’abantu biwe bose; kand’ abantu bose n’abahizi bose bari bamuhagatiye i buryo n’i bumoso. Uku ni ko Shimeyi yagenda aramutuka, ati Genda, urakagenda, wa mwicanyi we, wa mugesera we!2 Samweli 16:5-7″

Iki gihe Abusalomu umuhungu wa Dawidi yaramugararije,Dawidi atinye ko ahava amwica amutembagaje kungoma,aca arahunga.Niko guhura n’umugabo yitwa Shimeyi,aca agenda aramutera amabuye, amutuka ibitutsi biremereye atawokwubahuka kubibwira umwami acunzwe n’ingabo,kuko Dawidi yari arinzwe.

N’iki catuma Shimeyi ahangara umwami?

Wewe usoma iri jambo Uwo uri we sindakuzi,ariko rimwe canke kenshi uzohura n’umuntu icubahiro cawe atagiha agaciro,agufate uko utari ukwiriye gufatwa.Uko ninako vyagendeye Dawidi.Umwami nyakubahwa,yahuye n’umuntu agenda aramutuka avuga ko ari umwicanyi,umugesera.

Shimeyi ntiyatinye ingabo zari zicunze Dawidi.Mbere umwe muri bo yasavye Dawidi ko yomureka akamuca umutwe kuko yarahangaye umwami,ariko Dawidi aramubuza.

Ba Shimeyi n’ishusho y’abantu bavuga ibintu bidakwiriye kubabaruta batitaye kungaruka mbi vyobazanira.N’ishusho kandi y’abantu bafatira kubibazo wahuye navyo (nk’uko Dawidi yari yahagurukiwe n’umuhungu wiwe),kugira bagutuntuze muvyo bavuga canke munyifato yabo.Ariko rero,waba woroheje,waba ukomeye,Shimeyi uramukeneye.Uti gute?

N’uko Shimeyi Imana imukoresha mukukwigisha kudakoreshwa n’ibigumbagumba.

Imana irashaka ko tuba abantu badategekwa n’ibigumbagumba(n’amarangamutima).Irashaka ko dufata icemezo ciza,ko tuvuga amajambo mazima,no mugihe tutaba turiko twiyumva neza.Imana rero irareka umuntu nka Shimeyi,kugira ikwigishe kwigumya.

Ikindi,iyo witwaye neza,biciye kuri Shimeyi Imana irakwigisha kutarwana intambara z’amajambo.Kuko iyo ugiye ngo muhangane mumajambo uba umushiriye aho ashaka,kuko we ntaba yiteguriye gutsindwa.Dawidi rero yar’azi igikwiriye kuri Shimeyi,yaravuze ati nimumureke antuke,…,kumbure Uhoraho azoraba ayo mbonye,ampe ivyiza mugishingo ciyo mivumo mvumwe uyu musi »2sam16:11-12″.

Umuti wa Shimeyi n’ukumwinumira,ukibandaniriza urugendo.kuko Shimeyi ntaco agufasha iyo umuhaye amatwi,ntan’ico agutwara iyo umwimye amatwi ukikomereza urugendo.

Iyo urenganye amahoro abantu bafise inyifato nk’iya Shimeyi,uhinduka umuntu azi kuvuga amajambo arobanuwe,adakoreshwa n’ibigumbagumba munyifato yiwe canke mumvugo ziwe imbere y’abomwibasira abaribo bose.

Gusa,Shimeyi si imisi yose yama yererwa n’iyo nyifato,kuko igihe kiragera akimbura aho yabivye.Kandi niko vyagenze, vyarangiye yishwe kungoma ya Salomo,azize kutumvira,ariko umuzi wavyo vyavuye kuri iyo nyifato nyene. Niwahura n’umuntu afise inyifato nk’iya Shimeyi,uze ubere maso inyifato yawe,Imana irazi uko izobigenza uko igihe kizohaca ntabe akikubangamira ukundi.Ikindi,ntawubizi,kumwamira ivyamwa kumbure nivyo bizomurokora,akava munzira mbi yazimiriyemwo.Nico gituma atari vyiza kureka ngo inyifato yiwe itume witwara uko bidakwiriye,kuko har’aho yokira biciye kuri wewe.Amen!

title: Abanyamanyanga batandukiriye imitwe yo kujuragiza abasenga mukwigana umukono w’umushikiranganji.
content:
Amasengesho arababaza abantu benshi kandi nta n’amahoro abaha kuko benshi bafadikanya ivy’Imana n’ivya satani. Iri kete ririmwo amahinyu yerekana yuko atari umushikiranganji ya ryanditse mugabo bakaguma barikwiragiza nk’ubutumwa bgatanzwe na leta.

(1) ingene umushikiranganji asinya ikete bitandukanye n’urwo rwandiko. (2) ntakoresha ikaramu itukura mu gutera umukono, (3) ntiyandika ikete ritagira inomero, (4) kandi ntarungika ikete ritagira aba rimenteshejwe nk’abapolisi, aba bulamatari bajejwe intwaro n’umukuru w’igihugu. (5) Inyandiko irimwo amakosa, ntiyokwandika Imana na i ntoya kandi afise indome akoresha mu kwandika amakete yo mu bushikiranganji arongoye. Iryo kete mwabonye ni igihuha c’iciganano c’abagomba kujuragiza abasenga.

title: Akamaro k’isukari abantu benshi batari baze.
content: Abantu bazi yuko isukari iryosha ibinyobga n’ibifungurwa gusa nkuko bogirwa mu bihugu vyose vyo kw’isi. Ubushakashatsi mu buhinga bgo kuvura ibiguma vy’abantu, bgasanze abantu bakomeretse cane nk’abakomerekera mu ntambara bakoresha isukari mu kuvura ibiguma. Isukari ku gikomere gituma uwakomeretse atababara kandi igatuma ikiguma gikira n’ingoga.

title: Amabarabara amabanga iwe mur’ibi bihe vy’imvura mu gihugu hagati.

title: Abarundi barazinzwe n’impwemu yo gusabiriza no kurondera ubufasha kuvyo dushobora kwikorera
content:
Aho ni kw’ishure ryisumbuye #KABANGA muri Komine #BUSONI y’intara ya Kirundo.Umuyobozi w’iryo shure amenyesha ko utuzu twa surwumwe iryo shure ryari rifise twuzuye twongera turasambuka kubera dushaje.

Jean Marie NTIRANDEKURA avuga ko uburyo bukenewe kugira hubakwe ubwiherero bushasha iryo shure ritoburonka kuko hasavwa imiriyoni zirenga zibiri. Amemyesha kandi ko n’aho yoterereza abavyeyi b’abana barereye kuri iryo shure ubwo buryo butokwira.Abana biga kuri iryo shure basanzwe ari bake, umuvyeyi akaba yotanga amafaranga arenga ibihumbi 40 vy’Amarundi, akibaza ko batobyemera.

Umuyobozi w’ishure ryisumbuye rya KABANGA atabaza abagiraneza n’intwaro gufasha kugira ico kibazo gitorerwe inyishu kuko ata gikozwe vyihuta bashobora guterwa n’indwara ziturutse ku mwanda.Ishure ryisumbuye rya KABANGA rikaba rifise abanyeshure 55 biga mu bisata bibiri ari vyo ic’ubutunzi hamwe n’ic’ubuhinga.

Amasure arakwiriye gutunganywa ku buryo ari abarezi, abarerwa n’abavyeyi bose bumva yuko amasure ari ayabo kandi yuko ari ikibuze canke icononekaye bashobora ku gikora batarinze gusaba ubufasha bgo hanze. Akarorero amatafari barashobora kuyikorera bo nyene ubgabo, babuze amabati bakikorera n’amategura. Ukwimba ibinogo no kurondera ibiti bakoresha barashobora kuvyironfera hagasigara isima, imisumari n’utundi twa nkenerwa dushobora gutererwa n’ubutegetsi bga commune, ubgintara, abadandaza ku giti cabo kandi vyose bigakorwa arama tangazo arinze gutangwa kuko utwo ni utuntu duto dukorerwa nko mu muryango. Kwubaka utuzu twa sugwumwe ntibisaba guterereza birebire!

title: Leta y’Uburundi yategerezwa kuba yarafashe ingingo yo gukingira abenegihugu n’ivyabo
content:
Hariho ibintu vyinshi biboneka yuko bibangamiye abantu n’ibintu mugabo inzego zibijejwe ntizifate ingingo zibereye hakiri kare ukamengo leta siho iri canke inzego zihari ntizigira uburongozi buzikuriye. Uturorero n’umuyagankuba uguma wiha inkumbi mu gihugu, akarenganyo wumva hirya no hino mu matongo n’ayandi matati atandukanye, n’ibindi. Ubuho hinjiyemwo ikibazo c’amazi ya Tanganyika ariko araduga mu mazu abantu bakidoga mugabo ntihagire ingingo zo gukingira abantu n’ibintu zifatwa. Abanyakibenga ngo:

batewe umutima uhagaze n’iduga ry’amazi y’ikiyaga tanganyika.

Bamwe mu banyagihugu baba mu Kibenga mu bumanuko bw’igisagara ca Bujumbura bavuga ko batewe umutima uhagaze n’amazi y’ikiyaga Tanganyika yasubiye kuduga akirara mu mpangu babamwo naho bagerageza kuzitira n’imifuko y’umusenyi ariko bikaba impfagusa.

Hamwe bamaze guterwa usanga bariko bagerageza gukura ayo mazi bakoresheje imashine ziduza amazi moto pompe aho bavuga ko mbere bibatwara uburyo bwinshi.

Abo banyagihugu bavuga ko ibintu vyunyurwa n’amazi y’imvura atagira imigende iyatwara ntatembe.basaba reta gufasha kugira ngo bakingirwe ntihagire ibibandanya kononekara.

Bernard Sindayihebura umuhinga mu bidukikije akaba n’umwigisha wa kaminuza mu cirwa yakoze yerakanye ko amazi y’ ikiyaga Tanganyika ashobora kuduga ku rugero rwo hejuru, akabangamira ibintu vyegereye inkombe z’ico kiyaga, na cane cane mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2024 kurusha urugezo ataribwashikeko kuva mu 1964.

uyo muhinga asigura ko abenyagihugu bo muri iyo micungararo bokwitegura kuko bashobora kuzohava bahunga, mbere ko n’abajejwe intwaro bobibamenyesha hakiri kare. Hategerezwa kuba hariho ivyigwa biriko birakorwa vyo kwiga ingene abenegihugu botegura ingene bazifata n’ico leta izobafashamwo igihe amazu yabo azoba yarengewe n’amazi.

Hariho n’imetero 150 umuntu wese yategerezwa kwigirayo ikiyaga uhereye aho umusenyi ukora ku kiyaga uri. Ariko vyose ntivybahorijwe bigatuma abasinzikazwa n’iduga ry’amazi baba benshi.

title: Ikigeragezo cose kirafise umwanya kumara ariko iyo kirangiye hakaba ingororano itagereranywa.
content:
« Baramubamba, bagabura impuzu ziwe, barazipfindira, ngo bamenye iyo umuntu wese atwara. Igihe bamubamba zar’ isaha zitatu.Mariko 15:24-25″

Uyu yari Yesu bafashe, baramubamba,dusomye ngo igihe bamubamba zari isaha zitatu.Rero ntiyaciye apfa ako kanya,ahubwo yapfuye sacenda.Yamaze kumusaraba amasaha atandatu,imisumari imurya,ari mumubabaro urenze uko wovugwa.

Burya ikigeragezo cose kigira igihe.Womenga Imana yari gutuma Yesu aca ashoka apfa,kugira ngo imurinde kuguma ababarizwa kumusaraba amasaha nk’ayo yose,ariko yaramuretse,arakubitika nk’abandi bose bari babambanywe,apfa hageze nyene ko apfa.

Hari igihe duca mubigeragezo,tugasenga twibaza ngo buca Imana ibikuraho,ariko ikabireka,bikahaguma umwaka wambere,uwakabiri,…,gushika igihe yo nyene ibonye ko bikwiriye ikadutabara.

Nka Yosefu muri Egiputa,ntawari kumenya impamvu Imana yamuretse akamerererwa nabi mumvuto,ikamwibuka akwije imyaka mirongo itatu.

Na Aburahamu,ntawari gutanga impamvu Imana yamuretse agakwiza imyaka ijana atararonka akana.Kandi abo bose hamwe n’abandi benshi bayubashe,hari igihe yabarekera mukigeragezo kandi basenga,igaseruka mugihe yo nyene yashinze.

None gusenga bimara iki no mugihe Imana itaciye iseruka ako kanya?

Inyishu n’uko n’ubwo idashoka iducemurira ikibazo,mur’uko gusenga nyene iduha inkomezi zo kucihanganira.Iyo tudasenze naho,turacika intege,kandi bikaba vyokworohera satani kudutera ivyiyumviro vyinshi bibi,bikaba vyonadukura mubuntu bw’Imana.

Rero hari ibigeragezo ducamwo,dusenze Imana ikadusubiza idatevye,ariko hari n’ibindi ireka,ikazobidukura imbere igihe cayo kigeze,kandi n’ubwo bitubabaza irabikoresha mukuduhingura,mukutwigisha kwizera,kuturemwamwo intahe,…dukwiye rero kuyigirira icizere,kuko uko vyoba bimeze kwose Yo iba izi ko iyo iriko iratuganisha ari heza.

Abari mu bibazo mwihangane murabe imbere kuko ni heza.

title: Le cerveau des gens de 60 ans et plus est performant.
content:
LE CERVEAU DES RETRAITES:NOUVELLE DECOUVERTE SCIENTIFIQUE

Le directeur de la faculté de médecine de l’université George Washington affirme que le cerveau d’une personne âgée est beaucoup plus pratique qu’on ne le croit généralement. À cet âge, l’interaction des hémisphères gauche et droit du cerveau devient harmonieuse, ce qui élargit nos possibilités créatives. C’est pourquoi, parmi les personnes de plus de 60 ans, on trouve de nombreuses personnalités qui viennent de commencer leurs activités créatives.

Bien sûr, le cerveau n’est plus aussi rapide qu’il l’était dans sa jeunesse. En revanche, il gagne en souplesse. Par conséquent, avec l’âge, nous sommes plus susceptibles de prendre les bonnes décisions et moins exposés aux émotions négatives. Le pic de l’activité intellectuelle humaine se situe vers 70 ans, lorsque le cerveau commence à fonctionner à plein régime.

Avec le temps, la quantité de myéline dans le cerveau augmente, une substance qui facilite le passage rapide des signaux entre les neurones. Grâce à cela, les capacités intellectuelles augmentent de 300 % par rapport à la moyenne.

Il est également intéressant de noter qu’après 60 ans, une personne peut utiliser deux hémisphères en même temps. Cela permet de résoudre des problèmes beaucoup plus complexes.

Le professeur Monchi Uri, de l’université de Montréal, estime que le cerveau âgé choisit le chemin qui consomme le moins d’énergie, élimine le superflu et ne laisse que les bonnes options pour résoudre le problème. Une étude a été réalisée à laquelle ont participé différents groupes d’âge. Les jeunes étaient très confus lors des tests, tandis que les personnes de plus de 60 ans prenaient les bonnes décisions.

Maintenant, regardons les caractéristiques du cerveau entre 60 et 80 ans. Elles sont vraiment roses.

CARACTÉRISTIQUES DU CERVEAU D’UNE PERSONNE ÂGÉE.

1. Les neurones du cerveau ne meurent pas, comme tout le monde le dit autour de vous. Les connexions entre eux disparaissent simplement si l’on ne s’engage pas dans un travail mental.

La distraction et la perte de mémoire sont dues à une surabondance d’informations. Il n’est donc pas nécessaire de consacrer toute sa vie à des futilités inutiles.

A partir de 60 ans, une personne qui prend des décisions n’utilise pas un seul hémisphère du cerveau, comme les jeunes, mais les deux.

4. Conclusion:si une personne mène un style de vie sain, est mobile, a une activité physique viable et est pleinement active mentalement,les capacités intellectuelles NE baissent PAS avec l’âge, elles augmentent simplement,atteignant un pic à l’âge de 80-90 ans.

CONSEILS POUR LA SANTÉ:1)N’ayez pas peur de la vieillesse.2)Efforcez-vous de vous développer intellectuellement.3)Apprenez de nouveaux métiers, faites de la musique, apprenez à jouer des instruments de musique, peignez des tableaux ! Dansez !4)Intéressez-vous à la vie, rencontrez des amis et communiquez avec eux, faites des projets d’avenir, voyagez autant que possible.*N’oubliez pas d’aller dans les magasins, les cafés, les spectacles.6)Ne vous enfermez pas seul, c’est destructeur pour tout le monde.7)Soyez positif, vivez toujours avec la pensée suivante :toutes les bonnes choses sont encore devant moi_!

SOURCE : New England Journal of Medicine.

Merci de transmettre ces informations à vos proches et amis de 60, 70 et 80 ans afin qu’ils puissent être fiers de leur âge 😉.

title: Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana n’iki ko hariho abantu bazazanirwa n’amadini n’anashengero.
content:
Abafise ibanga bibiwe n’ijuru nibo bonyene batahura Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana icarico. Ni abantu bagiriwe ubuntu bahamagarwa n’Uhoraho Imana, abatuma kwitandukanya n’amadini n’amashengero, imigambge n’imihari, ivyaha n’utwaha kugira ngo bihane neza bezwe maze mbakorere Uhoraho Imana.

Ni abahawe isezerano n’Uhoraho Imana, ibatuma (1) Kuzigama no Kwigisha ukuri kwose kw’ijambo ry’Imana, (2) Gukangura no Gutunganya Umugeni Yesu Kristo azoza gutora, (3) Kwerekana no kugaruana igitinyiro c’Uhoraho Imana mu bantu, (4) Guteramira amasezerano y’Ishengero n’ay’igihugu.

Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana ribarira ubutumwa umuntu umwe ku giti ciwe kandi rikamukurikirana mu kumurera mu gakiza, ntirifata abantu mu kivunga canke ngo rimuremereze amabgirizwa y’abantu. Rimudhikana ku kurongorwa na Mpwemu Yera no gushika ku musaraba.

Tzizere yuko abazazaniwe baronkejwe umuco kuko baravye ivyo Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana rikora baca batahura ingendo yaryo.

title: Leta y’Uburundi isabga kwitaho agateka k’abanyororo
content:
Abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu i Bururi basaba abajejwe amagara y’abantu mu mabohero ko babonye umunyororo atera aremba kumurungika ku bitaro bikuru. Bafatira ko urwo rupfu rutabaye giturumbuka.

Uwo munyororo avuka ku mutumba Taba muri komine Mugamba yari apfungiwe muri iryo bohero ikiringo kidashika ukwezi. Yariko abazwa ku bijanye n’umuntu yishwe kuri uwo mutumba, nk’uko inkuru ziva i Bururi zivyemeza.

Si uwa mbere apfiriye mu munyororo kubera kubura ukwivuza neza. Hari abidoga yuko n’agateka k’abidegemvya katubahirijwe kubera ubutungane bugoyagoya.

title: Ibikorwa vy’amasengesho bikwiriye gutandukanywa n’ibikorwa vy’imigambge kandi bikagira intumbero itomoye.
content:
Nk’uko wama ubikora mu ntango za buri mwaka, umugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi « CNDD-FDD Abagumyabanga » uzotunganya igikorane c’amasengesho.

Ico gikorane kizobera i Gitega muri Quartier Magarama, kikazotangura ku wa 25, gihere ku wa 27 Nzero 2024.

Ico gikorane kikazoba kigamije kwereka « Imana ibikorwa ibikorwa vy’abagumyabanga ngo ihezagire yongere ishikane Uburundi kw’ihangiro rya 2040-2060 » nk’uko tubibona mu civugo catangajwe n’uwo mugambwe.

Kugira ngo abantu batumbere Imana y’ukuri bayisenge nayo ibahezagire bategerezwa kubanza kuba bafise ukwemera kumwe, n’ukuvuga bahuje umutima n’inama. Umu Katolika, umu Islamu, Umu poroti, Umu pfumu n’abandi bemera ibindi bakoranye bohamagara Uhoraho Imana ikabahezagira canke yururutse yobakorera ikindi kintu!

Abantu biba, barya ibiturire, basambana, bica bakabesha, bankana bagakora ibizira ntibaja hamwe ngo basenge Imana bataravyihanira kureka. Kenshi aho gukura umuhezagiro imbere y’Imana bahakura umuvumo igihugu cabo kikarangwamwo ubukene n’inzara, ubusuma n’urwanko, akarenganyo n’igikenye. Tuzohore twikebuka iyo tuvuze yuko tugiye gusenga.

title: Ubuhinga bgo gushira imbuto mu muvyeyi hakavuka ikibondo buriko buratera imbere mu Burundi
content:
IMBONEKARIMWE  mu Burundi.

Umukenyezi w’umurundikazi w’imyaka 60, ahejeje kwibarukira ikibondo. Uko ni ukuri kwamye!

Carine Barantwaririje, akaba yibarutse babanje kumubaga ku bitaro Tanganyika Hospital vyo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Vyandikwa n’ikinyamakuru Le Renouveau.

Barantwaririje akaba yibarutse umwana w’umuhungu w’ibiro bibiri n’amagarama indwi(2,7kg). Ico twomenya : Uwo mukenyezi akaba yatwaye iyo mbanyi habanje gukoreshwa bwa buhinga bwo guteraniriza intanga hanze y’imibiri (fécondation in vitro) hanyuma zimaze gufatana zikaba urubuto rumwe rugaheza rukarungikwa mu gitereko c’umukenyezi hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwo kwa muganga.

Uwo mukenyezi yari yarongowe mu mwaka wa 1992, akaba atari bwaronke umwana n’umwe.

Léonard Rubangara, umugabo w’uwo mukenyezi akaba ashimira Imana kuba umuryango wiwe uronse ikibondo ku buryo butoroshe.

title: Abakozi b’Imana barongeye intama bategerezwa kwigisha abantu kutarya ibiturire nk’ibindi vyaha.
content:
« Ibintu vyo kuba abakirisu ku munsi w’Imana, ku wa mbere abantu bagaca batangura kurya ibiturire bihagarare… »

Abarongoye amashengero nabo nyene basabwa kuza barafata imyanya yo guhanura abayoboke babo bafise ubuzi, bakumvishwa ko kurya no gutanga ibiturire, kurenganya n’ibindi ari icaha kandi bakabigarukako kenshi ntibaze barasangira bwaca bagaca barya canke batangisha ibiturire…

⛪ Emmanuel Sinzohagera, umukuru w’inama nkenguzamateka, ahamagarira abayoboye amashengero guterera umuganda muri iki gikorwa kuko gutunganya igisata c’ubutungane ari igikorwa c’Abarundi bose… »

Ikindi umukuru w’inama nkenguzamateka asaba n’uko abacamanza bagurirwa imashini zibika amajwi y’ababurana…

« Iki ni kimwe mu vyofasha mu kugabanura imyidogo y’abenegihugu, kuko hari ababurana usanga bidoga ko ivyegeranyo bikorwa ku mburano usanga atari vyo, hanyuma hakabura ababavuganira »

Domine Banyankimbona, umushikiranganji w’Ubutungane: « Niko ko hari ababikora nkana, bagakuramwo ivyotuma umuntu atsinda mu kwandika icegeranyo, abenegihugu bakarira bagira bati : “Ivyo amasura yanje yavuze ntivyashizwemwo” ». Umushikiranganji aremera ko bagiye kubitunganya neza, uburyo bukaronderwa, bigashirwa mu ngiro.

title: I Makamba amazi ava ku mabati nayo arageramiye imitumba.
content:
Umwe muri bo agira ati : « abubatse haruguru yacu, bubatse amazu ya kijambere maremare, ashika hejuru. Amazi yose basurira ku mazu yacu. Atagikozwe cihuta, muzoza mwumva imvura yaduhitananye n’ayo mazu, duce duhitana abari hepfo y’ibarabara. Muzodusanga hariya mu mwonga. »

Uwutwara ikigo kijejwe inyubako OBUHA mu ntara ya Makamba, avuga ko amabarabara yo mu makaritiye agiye kwagurwa, yubakirwe n’amakanivo. Ariko asaba abanyagihugu, gushira mu ngiro ingingo zafashwe n’abajewe intwaro zo kwimba ibinogo mu mpangu amazi yoshikiramwo.

Harakwiriye yuko abo mu bisata bijejwe inyubako bakora ivyo bajejwe inzu yose ikagira aho ishira amazi avuye kunzu n’ingene uwo mugende wubakirwa.

title: Président Evariste Ndayishimiye yakiriwe neza mu gihugu ca DRC.
content:
Mu kiganiro yagiriraniye n’urwaruka rwo mu gihugu ca Republika Iharanira Demokrasi ya Congo, Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yongeye kwumvikana anegura ubutegetsi bwo mu Rwanda.

Evariste Ndayishimiye akaba yagize ati : »Nta kwinubana kuhari mu banyagihugu bo mu bihugu vy’akarere, indongozi nizo zibi…Abanyagihugu bo mu Rwanda bakwiye gutangura kwotsa igitutu [ubutegetsi bwabo]. Ico nzi co n’uko urwaruka rwo mu Rwanda rutoshimishwa no kuba « imbohe » mu karere. »

Prezida Ndayishimiye akaba yemereye urwo rwaruka rwo muri Congo ko azotunganya inama ihuza urwaruka rwo mu bihugu vy’akarere harimwo n’Urwanda ngo higwe ingene hotorerwa umuti ibibazo vy’umutekano biri mu karere.

Ku musi w’ejo, mu birori vyo kwimika Prezida Félix Tshisekedi, Evariste Ndayishimiye, Umukuru w’Igihugu c’Uburundi yarakomewe amashi n’abakongomani bari bitavye ivyo birori nk’umugenzi w’igihugu cabo yabafashije kugwanya « agasomborotso » k’igihugu c’#Urwanda.

title: Igiturire kiguma ciminogoza mu Burundi
content:
I Ngozi, bamwe muba polisi baracarya ibiturire: Abaporisi bakorera mu ntara ya Ngozi baragirizwa ko barangwa n’inyifato mbi harimwo kwaka ibiturire ku mabarara canke ku ma station atanga ibitoro,akaborerwe no kwiha akazi ko gufata amapikiki atawabibatumye. Ivyo bikaba vyemejwe n’uwurongoye igipolisi mu ntara ya Ngozi aho amenyesha ariko ko muri rusangi iyo ngeso iriko irakosorwa.

Umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu Martin Niteretse amenyesha ko adashimishwa n’izo ngendo za bamwe mu bapolisi n’inyamiramabi, akaba asaba ko amategeko yokwirikizwa uko yanditse kuko iyo ngendo icapfuza urwego rw’igipilisi.

Niteretse akibutsa abo bajejwe umutekano ko hari ivyaha bitababarirwa harimwo kwaka igiturire, ugufata ku nguvu, ukwica umuntu no gukora frode. Agahamagarira abapolisi bo mu ntara ya Ngozi kuvira hasi rimwe kugira bagwanye ayo mabi.

Ivyo bikaba vyavugiwe mu nama yahuje uwo mushikiranganji n’abaserukira abajejwe umutekano mu ntara ya Ngozi kuri uyu wa 4.

title: Imitego n’urwanko rw’abansi bawe birashobora kubatera kubona Imana yawe bikabatera gutinya
content:
HAR’IGIHE IMITEGO Y’ABANSI ITUMA BABONA IMANA YAWE.

» Kandi Sauli amenya yuk’ Uhoraho ari kumwe na Dawidi, arabitahura. Kandi Mikali umukobga wa Sauli yakunda Dawidi.1 Samweli 18:28″.

Iki gihe Umwami sawuli yari yipfuza uburyo yokwica Dawidi,ariko agambirira kumwica kubwenge.Amuha ikibazo atari yibaza ko Dawidi yokivamwo adapfuye.Amubwira ko kugira ngo amuhe umugore,adakeneye inkwano,ahubwo ashaka ubugabo ijana azoshahura abafilisitiya.1sam18:25

Dawidi yumva nisawa,kuko Umwami sawuli atamusavye inkwano(kuko ntanaho yari kuyikura).Dawidi rero aja kurugamba n’ingabo ziwe,yica abafilisiya amajana abiri,ubugabo bwabo abuzanira umwami Sawuli.Sawuli rero biramutangaza,kuko atabiziga,ahubwo yaziga ko Dawidi agiye yafadika,bazoca bamwica.Twasomye ngo kandi Sawuli amenya yuk’ Uhoraho ari kumwe na Dawidi,arabitahura.

Burya abandi(abansi bawe),abagutega imitego,iyo ugendana n’Imana,igihe kiragera bakabitahura.Bashobora kuba bari basanzwe bazi ko uyubaha,ariko batarabitahura.Niko vyagendekeye sawuli rero.Imitego yatega dawidi akayisimbuka,yamweretse ko Uhoraho ari kumwe nawe.

Abantu bashobora kuguharurira imisi,ariko ibintu bikarushiriza kuba vyiza.Bakibaza ko ivyawe atanakimwe kizoja imbere,ariko bagatangazwa n’ubuhinga bw’Imana kubuzima bwawe.

Abantu ntibabona Imana mubuzima bwawe kuko uyubaha gusa,ahubwo bayibonera no muvyo igukorera,no muntambwe iguteza.Ntibishoboka ko abantu batabona Imana mubuzima bwawe,nimba koko ugendana nayo.

Nivyo ibibazo turabicamwo,ariko nomuri vyo abandi bahabonera Imana yacu.Ni igihe abantu bibaza ingene ubayeho bikabasiga.

Imana izokwiyereka muburyo bumwe canke ubundi,bitume n’abatayizi bayibona,banabitahure,bikunze bamwe banakurikire inzira wafashe.Vyose bizoterwa n’ingene wihaye Imana,nayo ikivanga muvyawe.Muhezagirwe.

title: Mu Kayanza ubukene n’inzara bituma hibga ikintu cose karimwo n’ivyuma!
content:
Kayanza: Hari ubusuma bw’ivyuma bivugwa ko bumaze iminsi bwibonekeza ku mashure yo muri komine y’indero ya Kayanza. Bamwe mu bayobozi bamenyesha ko, mu kiringo kitarenza amezi 2, kw’ishure shingiro rya Karinzi hibwe amadirisha 8 y’ivyuma. Kw’ishure ryisumbuye rya Cukiro naho haharurwa amadirisha 12. Kw’ishure shingiro rya Kirema ho n’igiti camanikwako ibendera caribwe nk’uko bivugwa n’umuyobozi waryo.

Siméon Tuyubahe agira ati : « Abo basuma barondera ibintu vy’ivyuma. Bahereye ku cuma baminikako idarapo, hanyuma batwara ikonteri y’amazi n’ayandi ma tuyaux y’ivyuma. Baratwaye kandi ivyuma vy’intebe n’ama_bloc ciments bamenaguye baronderamwo ama_fer à béton, arya magufuri aremereye manini manini barayatwaye. Inyundo twakoresha nk’intebe zigize ikibazo barazitwaye, barasambuye ingoma twavuza aha kw’idarapo baronderamwo irya ngunguru. »

Abayobozi b’ayo mashure bibaza ko abiba ivyo vyuma baja kubigurisha ku munzane. Bamenyesha ko ikiro c’ivyuma kigurwa amafaranga ari hagati y’ibihumbi bibiri n’ibihumbi bitatu, bivanye n’ubwoko bwavyo n’urugero bigezeko mu gusaza. Mu ntango z’uku kwezi, buramatari w’intara ya Kayanza yasavye ba musitanteri guhagarika urudandazwa rw’ivyo vyuma mu makomine yose. Rémy Cishahayo yasiguye ko basanze ivyuma vya reta bigeramiwe n’ababishora.
