title: Umwanditsi wa BEBA Gidiyoni, Niyungeko Salvatori aravuye mu gacerere
content:
UMUHANUZI NIYUNGEKO SALVATOR YARI UMWANDITSI WA BEBA GIDIYONI ARAVUYE MU GACERERE ATI NI MWIHANE MWEZWE KUKO IVYO IMANA YAVUZE BIRASHITSE NI MUVYITEGE.

Niyungeko Salvator aturuka mu Ntara ya Makamba yari umwanditsi w’Umuvugishwa BEBA Gidiyoni. Niwe yadushikirije amabanga y’ivyo Umuvugishwa BEBA Gidiyoni yavugishijwe vyose ku gihugu c’Uburundi n’ayandi mahanga. Kubera yuko BEBA Gidiyoni atarazi kwandika, Salvatori Niyungeko niye yavyandika vyose akoresheje imashini batiye ku Misiyoni ya Pentekote. Vyose yabishikirije Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana. Yagize ati:Umuhanuzi BEBA Guidiyoni twagendanye imyaka 20 yari umurundi avuka mu ntara ya Makamaba akaba yari yarahungiye mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya kubera intambara yabaye mu gihugu c’Uburundi mu mwaka wa 1972. Yasengera mw’Ishengero rya Pantecote i GATUMBA muri Tanzaniya mugabo akagenda arashikiriza ubuhanuzi Uhoraho Imana yahora imubgira cane cane aburire Ihanga ry’Abarundi.Hariho abantu benshi bagiye barishimikiza imburi ziwe abandi bakazubakirako kugira ngo batange imburi zabo ku gihugu c’Uburundi.Umuvugishwa BEBA Guidiyoni ivyo yahanuye vyose vyagiye biraba mu gihugu cacu c’Uburundi uko yagiye arabitondeka kimwe ku kindi gushika ubu. Ivyo vyatumye n’uyu munsi abantu bose babona yuko yari umuvugishwa w’ukuri w’umurundi wenyene amaze kubaho. Uyu muvugishwa n’Imana yaratashe mu Burundi kandi abandi bakozi b’Imana ntibamwakiriye nk’umukozi w’Imana kuko bari bumvise imburi atanga. Ari mu gihu c’Uburundi ku gatumba iwabo mu ntara ya Makamba, yahavuye afatwa n’ingwara bamutwara ku bitaro bikuru i Makamba, biranka bamufatana urugendo ngo bamutware kumuvuriza mu bitaro bikuru i Bujumbura. Bageze mu nzira, Imana imubarira iti babgire bagusubize inyuma kuko utazokira utegerezwa gutaha kuko igihe cawe kirageze.Kuko bari bazi yuko ari umuhanuzi adasanzwe, baciye bamwumvira bamusubiza ruguru iwabo iyo yarasanzwe aba kw’itongo. Amaze gushikayo, Imana yamubariye ngo babgire ibigira bishike. Ico gihe mu 1992, amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu ntiyari bgabe. Iwe hama abantu benshi harimwo intwazangabo z’igisirikare ca kera bava za Bujumbura, Bururi, Rumonge, na ruguru baza iwe gusiguza. Yababgiye yuko hagiye kuba amatora kandi yuko umukuru w’igihugu azotorwa bo nyene bazoca bamwica. Ati:”ni mwamwica namwe nyene muzohona”. Imana iyo ivuze ikintu kirasohora. Niko vyagenze yaratowe baca baramwica. Intambara yabaye inyuma y’urupfu rw’umukuru w’igihugu Ndadaye Melchior yamaze imyaka irenga icumi mubo yahitanye n’abasirikare ba leta yico gihe barimwo.

Umuhanuzi Niyungeko Salvator akaba yari n’Umwanditsi wa nyakwigendera BEBA Gidiyoni agira ati ikimenyetso ca nyuma nk’uko Uhoraho Imana yavuze tuzobona yuko ishikije ivyo yasezeranye ngico kibonetse. Rero ni mwitegure kwakira amasezerano.Umwami Yesu Kristo abahezagire, Murakoze!Salvator Niyungeko Telefone +257 72408852

title: Amafaranga mu Burundi aguma anyika ngo yasubiriye kubura kandi.
content:
Umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye ntako atagize kugira ngo amafaranga y’igihugu agume muri banki ariko bisa n’ivyamutaye kuw’amazi. Yarahinduye inoti, arakura n’izindi mu bantu ( démonétisation) azana amafaranga mashasha mugabo biba impfagusa. Iryo bura ry’amafaranga y’amarundi ryaherekejwe n’ibura ry’ amafaranga mvamakungu. Mbere yahavuye atangaza yuko abahinga ba FMI na Bank Mondiale bamwagirije yuko ariwe Ivyo vyose bivako mu gukoresha nabi itunga ry’igihugu. Yahavuye apfunga yongera arapfungura umurongozi wa banki nkuru y’igihugu ahejeje kumusubiriza.

Mur’ivyo vyose President Evariste Ndayishimiye aguma yagiriza abantu atadomako urutoke yuko aribo banyegeza ayo mafaranga. Mwokwibuka yuko hasatswe kandi hagapfungwa uwahora ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, haravuzwe n’abandi bategetsi bahora muri leta ya Petero Nkurunziza mugabo yuko ataco bahanovye. N’ubu rero ngo amanoti yoba yasubiriye gukena. Uwanditse yagize ati: «

Ngo boba basubiriye kinyegeza inoti za 5000 na 10 000, ngo idorari naryo kwisoko yirabura rigeze kuri 4800

None ibi bikogwa nababa Hima?

Nitureke kwisamburirako burya abatakaje igihugu Imana yabahaye naho basenga, ntiba ikibumva.

Ndiko ndibaza, nkubu BRB yofata ingingo yogukura muri circulation inoti za 5000 na 10 000, inoti nini ikora ikaba iya 2000, nibazako abo bayanyegeza boturura.

Umuntu yonyegeza imiriyoni nki 100 za 2000, yoba arinda, kandi yohava ayagabura n’imbeba.

Abagura ibintu vy’amahera menshi nibahimirizwe barihe hakoreshejwe ama banki.

Kubaguzi batobato hakore: Ecocash, Lumicash, e-noti, IBBM+, …

Abantu bagabanye kugendana umuganda w’amahera.

Munyumve neza

Gukura muri circulation inoti za 5000 na 10 000 ntibisigura kuzitesha agaciro kazo. Ariko BRB ireka kuzirungika mu mabanko y’ubudandaji, uwugiye kubikura, bakamuha izabibiri gusa

Ayo mahera arundwa mu mazu, ninayo akoreshwa n’inkozi zibibi»

Mu kirundi bakunda kuvuga ngo urupfu n’impfane birajana kandi bakongerako ngo Uwo binaniye yikurayo ngo ikirago kiranyerera. Ibiriko biribonekeza muvyerekeye amafaranga mu Burundi ntahandi kw’isi twari bgavyumve kandi ntibatahura ingene amafaranga ava mu kigega c’igihugu agahoka, akayonga ntibamenye irengero.

Tubibutse yuko iyo mu bihugu vyacu ata mafaranga mva makungu ahari haca habira n’ibikoresho mvamakungu igihugu gikenera nk’imiti, ifumbire, ibitoro, ivyo gukora isukari, ibinyobga n’ibindi bigize ubuzima bg’igihugu. Abahinga bibaza yuko iryo bura mu mafaranga batororondera ngo mu bantu bayanyegeza kuko ntaco vyobamarira, mugabo boronderera muri politike mbi y’ubutunzi ikoreshwa n’ubutegetsi buhari.

title: Ibiraro 2 vyinjira muri Komine Gitanga muri Rutana vyacikiye rimwe kubera imvura!
content:
Muri komine Gitanga ibiraro bibiri vyahuza iyo komine hamwe n’amakomine ya Bukemba na Rutovu vyaracitse bivuye ku mvura yaguye ku muhingamo wo kuri uyu wa mbere . Nta modoka yinjira canke ngo isohoke mur’iyo Komine.

Ivyo bikaba vyatumye imirimo imwe imwe itagenda neza kuko ata muduga ushobora gushika ku mugwa mukuru w’iyo komine.

Musitanteri wa komine Gitanga Onésime Nkengurutse atera akamo abagira neza ko bobafasha gusanura ivyo biraro kugira imirimo isubire uko yahora.

Ikibazo kihari kiri n’ahandi hose ni ukwitaho ubgiza n’ubushobozi ( la qualité) y’amabarabara ari mu gihugu hamwe n’ibiraro hakongerwako kwama babisuzuma no kubisanura. Iyo ivyo bitabaye igihugu kija kwibuka kubogora ca sheshe. Ikibabaje s’uko ata buryo buba bubuze mugabo ni ugushaka guke bisongwa no kunyuruza itunga ry’igihugu.

title: Duza ugusenga kwawe kwumvikane mw’ijuru ico uri cose kuko igihe n’iki kandi ugire ubuntu.
content:
« Yar’ umuntu yubaha Imana akayitinyana n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose, yagirira abantu ubuntu bginshi, agasenga Imana ubudasiba. Abona yeretswe imbonankubone umumarayika w’Imana yinjiye i we hari nk’isaha cenda z’umusi: aramuhamagara, ati Koruneliyo. Na we amukanurira amaso, afise ubgoba, aramubaza, ati N’iki ga Mwami? Aramwishura, ati Gusenga kwawe n’ubuntu bgawe vyaduze biba icibutso imbere y’Imana.Ivyakozwe n’intumwa 10:2-4″

Uyu yari umugabisha w’ ingabo yitwa koroneriyo, ngo yarasenga, akagira ubuntu.Umumalayika aramwiyereka amubwira ko gusenga kwiwe no kugira ubuntu vyaduze bikaba urwibutso imbere y’ Imana.

Abantu benshi barasenga,ariko si benshi bagira ubuntu( bafise umutima wo gufasha abandi).Abandi nabo bagira ubuntu, ariko ntibasenga,ngo bubake ubucuti n’ Imana.

Amasengesho arimwo kugira ubuntu aranyaruka gukora kumutima w’ Imana.Kubera iki?

Kubera abo uhezagira nabo baraja imbere y’ Imana bakayishima,ati shimwa Mana kubw’ urya muntu wawe,…,wewe uba uri mubatuma Imana ishimwa.

Impfuvyi uba wafashije, abatishoboye uba washigikiye,abo bose bakaja imbere y’ Imana bakayishima,bakagusabira umugisha, Imana nayo ikumva gusenga kwabo,bikaba urwibutso.

S’ umugambi w’ Imana rero ko iguhezagira ugatera imbere wenyene,oyaa,ukwiye kuba umuntu agira ubuntu,afasha abandi.Koroneriyo mucubahiro ciwe ntiyigeze yibagira kugira ubuntu.

Abitwa abakristo bose, baramutse babigize intego, mw’ ishengero ntaworwara ngo abure uwuja kumuraba,ntawobura ico yambara mugihe hari n’ abafise impuzu batibuka ko bazifise kubw’ ubwinshi bwazo,ntawosonzera mubitwa benedata.

Imana iduhe umutima wo kubera umugisha abandi,kuko ni kimwe muvyo twashiriweho.Bibiliya niyo iduhanura ngo» Twame dukora ivyiza, ntiducobogore,kukw’ igihe ni cashika tuzokwimbura,nitutarambirwa.Abigalatiya 6:9″.

title: Abagize Leta ya President Evariste Ndayishimiye yagirizwa kutagira imigambi irashe yo guteza imbere igihugu
content:
Abihweza utuntu n’utundi babona yuko leta ya President Evariste Ndayishimiye yaje idafise imigambi irashe yo guteza imbere mu butunzi igihugu c’Uburundi.  Nk’uko biboneka, umukuru w’igihugu afata umwanya munini ariko aridoga canke ariko araja mu manama hirya no hino ntafate ingingo ziboneka zo guteza imbere igihugu. Uturorero yafashe umugambi wo kuzibira ibinogo mu mabarabara aho kuyibaka, yafashe umugambi wo kuvomera uturima two muci aho kugira imigambi yo kurima ibiteza umwimbu w’igihugu mu kuvomeza amapompo n’ubundi buhinga bugezweko,,yagize umugambi wo kworora inkwavu ku rugo ku rugo, atan’aho urashika yasimbiye ku borozi b’ingurube nabo. Ivyo vyose biboneka yuko ariko ariruka mur’ibi na biriya ariko yuko ari imigambi idashikana igihugu kw’iterambere.

Umushikiranganji w’uburimyi n’ubgorozi nawe mu nama yariko aragirisha ari kumwe n’abashikiranganji, uwo ikigega ca Leta n’Uwo umutekano n’iterambere ry’ama Komune, yavuze yuko urugo rwose rutegerezwa kugira nyabarega 2 kandi rugatera n’amabungo 3. Ivyo vyose vyumvikana neza mugabo ivyo sivyo bizoshikana Uburundi kuri ya mbono y’igihugu ya 2030-2060.

Hari umwenegihugu yiyumviriye uwo mushikiranganji agira ati: “amavoka arazimvye cane muri kino gihe.

Ivoca ribanguriye ritangura kwama hagati y’imyaka ibiri n’igice n’imyaka itatu n’igice.

Uwo mugambi wari gufasha igihugu, hamwe n’abahoze kurugamba waraburijwemwo kubera ukwikunda: abawishe ninabo batoteje abandi kugeza kino gihe.

None urugo rwose rwohimirizwa gutera ibiti bitatu vy’amavoka, umwimbu ntiwokwunganira igihugu?

Uteye ibiti bitatu vy’amavoka n’uwuteye amabungo atatu ninde yokwunguka?

ntakekeranya, ivoka rifise isoko ryagutse, kugiti ushobora gukurako ibiro 600 kumwaka, kandi igiti kiraramba gushika kumyaka 70

None ibungo ritanga umwimbu ungana gute kumwaka? Rimara ikiringo kingana gute?

uwoshaka kwunguka cane, yotera ibiti bitatu vy’amavoka hanyuma agatera iruhande amabungo akabitonderako”

Abarundi barakwiriye abarongozi bafise imigambi yizwe neza ku buryo igirira akamaro Umurundi wese uyu munsi n’ejo. Abobikora ni umurundi wese yoshigwa imbere agakora ivyo azi yanonosoye kandi vyemerwa n’ubuhinga bifitiye kazoza igihugu.

title: Umutumiro w’amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu c’Uburundi 22-26/01/2024
content: UMUTUMIRO W’AMASENGESHO YO GUSENGERA UBURUNDI N’ABARUNDIUmwami n’Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo n’ashimwe cane! Ihanga ryose twahamagariwe amasengesho y’iminsi 5 yo kuva kuw’IJURU bita kuwa mbere igenekerezo rya 22 gushika kuw’ABANTU bita kuwa gatanu igenekerezo rya 26 z’uku kwezi n’uyu mwaka nyene.Aya masengesho muyatumirire abantu bose, ababanyi, aboroshe n’abahambaye n’abari mu mashengero n’amadini atandukanye twese, twihane twezwe maze tuje imbere y’Imana dusengera amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Ihanga ry’Abarundi [ 2INGOMA 7:14]. Iyindi mitwaro ni:(1) Ugusambuze ibikorwa vy’abarozi n’ubushobozi bg’amangetengete mu gihugu cacu c’Uburundi kugira ngo ubugombe bg’Imana bgururuke ku gihugu;(2) Tuzosanganguza ibibi bitera inzara, ubukene, ukubura kazi n’akarenganyo kugira ngo Imana ishitse isezerano ryayo ry’Imigisha kubayo no ku gihugu;(3) Tusambuza urwanko, ishari, inzigo n’ibice biri mu bitwa abakozi n’abana b’Imana, ibiri mu miryango, mu babanyi no mu gihugu;(4) Tuzosengera urukundo, ubumwe n’ukwezwa mu bizera Yesu Kristo nk’Umwami n’Umukiza w’ubugingo bgabo bavavanure n’uburyarya;(5) Tuzosengera uburinzi kuri twebge no ku miryango yacu mu bihe bitoroshe igihugu cacu n’isi bigiye kwinjiramwo kandi tuzoshime twigina Uhoraho Imana yacu.Ku giti cawe, nawe urafatanye n’abera bose iyo minsi 5 wiyiriza usenga mukwifatanya n’amasinzi y’Abarundi bari mu gihugu no mu mahanga kugira ngo ugutakamba kwacu kuzohagurutse Uhoraho ku ntebe maze yiyizire kudutabara, nkuko yabikoreye ubgoko bgayo na mbere [KUVAYO 3:7-8], Amen!

title: Indinganizo y’imishahara n’ikoreshwa nabi ry’amafaranga ya leta navyo bituma igihugu kidatera imbere.
content:
Icambere mu gisata kijanye n’amagara y’abantu ikintu cangombwa nuko habaho ikorwa neza ry’akazi ko kuvura aban’igihugu hanyuma hakabaho kandi n’itunganywa neza ry’igisata kijanye nivyo kuvuzanya ivyo navyo bakabifashwamwo n’amazu asanzwe abijejwe.

Icakabiri nuko ukwo kuvura neza gufatwa mu mugongo n’ibikoresho vyiza bigezweho , hamwe n’abaganga babizi babinonosoye kimwe kukindi , abo rero bategerezwa kuba bakwiye kandi bafashwe neza.

Muri Parcem Burundi turibaza tuti ni gute amafaranga #Reta itoza aguma yiyongera ukwo umwaka utashe , n’amadeni agafatwa ariko igisata c’amagara y’abantu ntigitezwe imbere ngo gihabwe uburyo bukwiye.

Tubona ko hariho amahera abwirizwa kugabanywa mubisata bimwe bimwe kuko ajanwa mubintu ataco bizanira umusaruro igihugu ayo nayo ni nk’amafaranga ashirwa mu makopérative kumwaka kumwaka kandi atagenzurwa rikorwa ry’ingene yakoreshejwe, nk’ibijanye n’ingendo zifatwa n’abamwe mu bari mu banga y’igihugu, hamwe n’uburusho buhabwa abandandaza mu kwinjiza ibidandazwa kubuntu. Turavye mu mahera #Reta iriko irakoresha muri uyu mwaka hariho amahera arenga imiliyaridi ijana yarakwiye gushirwa mubisata bibikwiye.Ikindi twabonye ni amahera aja mu mishara y’abakozi bo hejuru mubushikirangaji butandukanye bagahembwa amahera menshi kandi bakaba ari benshi aho guhemba neza abakozi baja ku rubuga nkabo baganga baja kuvura umwenegihugu kuko nibo bazana umusaruro uboneka.

Kugira ivyo vyose bitoregwe umuti Parcem Burundi isaba ibi bikurikira:

Parcem Burundi ibonako igikenewe kugira abaganga bagume mu guhigu aruko bafatwa neza , kuko turavye umuganga imyaka amara ariko ariga tukihweza n’ico igihugu kimukeneyeko nawe ategerezwa kubironkeramwo akarusho. Nk’amafaranga yagenewe ubushikirangaji bw’amagara y’abantu angana n’imiliyaridi 172 , n’izindi 164 zizova hanze ucubona neza ko ico gisata kidafise uburyo bukwiye.Reta yari ikwiye gufata nka nkama ico kibazo , amafaranga agashirwa ah’akanewe , hanyuma hagaca habaho igenzura rikomeye ku bushikiranganji bwose ry’ingene bukoresha amafaranga buba bwahawe.

title: Imbuto z’ibikoti vyimbuka cane mu ntara zimwezimwe vyashitse mu gihugu
content:
Ni urwaruka rwo muri komine Kayanza umutumba #Kinyamukizi rugizwe n’abahungu 5 hamwe n’abakobwa 25 bahurikiye muri koperative « Mbegera bunini » batoye ubuhinga bwo kubangurira imyumbati ikimbuka cane ku buryo igiti kimwe gusa gishobora kuvako imyumbati iri hagati ya 70 – 100 igapima nk’ibiro 100 canke birenga bivanye n’uko wayikurikiranye mu kiringo kiri hagati y’amezi 8 n’umwaka umwe

Emmanuel Barukinamwo arongoye iyo koperative agira ati: « Twatanguye mu mwaka wa 2009, ico gihe twarima imyumbati yo gufungura gusa duca tubona yuko dukoze umugambi wagutse ko vyotugirira akamaro mbere n’abandi bakaharonkera akarusho »

Nayo ku bijanye n’ubuhinga bakoresha mu kubangurira iyo myumbati Emmanuel agira ati: « Dufata igikotikoti c’umwumbati usanzwe w’ikirundi tukagifatanya n’ikindi c’igiti citwa ikiraganyina (igiparipari, igitaraza) dukoresheje ubuhinga twize, mukuyitera naho twimba ikinogo gipima imetero kwadarato tugasukamwo ikivumvu c’umwavu hama tugashingamwo ca giti kibanguriye kimwe c’umwumbati usanzwe nico kija musi akaba arico gishorako imyumbati, hejuru naho hakaduga kimwe c’igiparipari, kandi usoromye imyumbati igiti uca usubira kugitera kwakundi nyene »

Kuva babitanguye gushika ubu, ngo baramaze kurima, amahegitari 9 mu ntara zitandukanye kandi n’ababanyi barahagirira akunguko kuko baharonkera akazi kuko hageze kurima bashobora gukoresha abakozi 200 bahembwa ku musi

Nk’uko Emmanuel abandanya abitwiganira ngo baramaze kuronka amashirahamwe yo mu #Burundi bakorana, abagurira imyumbati bagaca bayihinguramwo ifu ishobora no kuvamwo iyo gukoramwo imikate n’ibindi. Ngo bararonse n’isoko muri #Mozambique bashoramwo imyumbati, ndetse bakaba bimirije gukorana n’irindi shirahamwe ryo mu gihugu ca #Tanzaniya

Arongera agasaba Reta ko yobashigikira bagashikana iyo myumbati mu ntara zose no mu benegihugu bose, cane cane agahamagarira abari mu mashirahamwe, ko bokura amaboko mu mpuzu bakarima iyo myumbati kubwinshi kuko yunguka cane kandi mu mwanya muto ndetse ntinafatwa n’ingwara cane

Uwipfuza ko bamuha imivyaro y’ico giterwa c’imyumbati ngo yobegera bakavugana canke akakura Emmanuel asanzwe arongoye iyo koperative kuri +257 79 783 399

title: Ibitaro burubakwa bikuzura mugabo bikamara imyaka 7 bitaratanguta gukora bigahava bisambuka

title: Indero niyo nkingi y’igihugu ariko abategetsi b’igihugu barayitengagije
content:
Abavyeyi batesha abana babo ishure bagiye guhabwa ibihano mu ntara ya Kirundo, ivyo bikaba vyapfundikiwe mu nama yahuje abegwa n’igisata c’indero bose inyuma yo gusanga muri iyo ntara hamaze guheba abanyeshure barenga 6000 mu gice ca mbere c’umwaka w’ishure.

Buramatari w’intara ya Kirundo akaba yasavye ko abo bose bahevye baronderwa maze bagasubizwa mu mashure. Mukaporona Leocadie arongoye igisata c’indero mu ntara ya Kirundo amenyesha ko iyo ntara iza mukibanza ca mbere ku banyeshure bahevye amashure mu gice ca mbere c’uno mwaka.

Bamwe mu bayobozi b’indero mu makomine y’intara ya Kirundo bavuga ko vyoba vyavuye kukutnu reta itashoboye gutanga ibikoresho nkuko vyahora abandi bakabona ko vyoba vyavuye ku mugambi wa reta wo gufungurira abana ku mashure kuko haraho imfungurwa zitagiye ziraboneka ku gihe. Abandi bemeza ko bimwe mu bituma abana baheba ari bamwe mu bavyeyi bahebesha abana babo bakaja kubakoresha mu ndimo z’umuceri.

Umurundi wese yategerezwa kwumva yuko akozwe ku mutima no kwumva yuko abana b’Uburundi batitaweho bikwiriye. Ubgikosha bugoyagoya, abana baheba kwiga n’ibindi.

title: Ubuhanuzi buhambaye ku gihugu c’Uburundi ngubwo burashitse
content:
IMBURI N’UBUHANUZI: Evelyne NTUNZENIMANA BATAZIRA MUSUMARI ASUBIRIYE KWEREKWA IBINTU BIHAMBAYE KU BURUNDI: ISEZERANO RIRASHITSE.

Evelyne NTUNZWENIMANA yeretswe ingene amasezerano ku gihugu c’Uburundi agire ashike, ibigiye kuba vyose n’ingene vyose bizokurikirana. Biteye ubgoba.Uyo Evelyne Ntunzwenima ni umukenyezi w’umurundikazi yavukiye mu gihugu c’Uburundi, mu ntara ya Gitega muri Komone Mutaho. Yavutse kw’igenekerezo 5 z’ukwezi kawa kane (Ndamukiza) mu mwaka wa 1974. Kubera indyane igihugu cacu caciyemwo yahavuye ahungira mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya mu nkambi y’impunzi ya KARAGO muri Kibondo. Aho niho yaronkeye izina ry’iritazirano rya MUSUMARI kubera yari akerebutse, ari umuhizi akaba n’umukuru w’umugwi wakina umupira w’amaguru n’uwamaboko. Arazwi cane kuko yarabaye umukuru w’indero (Coordinatrice) aho i Karago mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya mugabo ubu atuye mu gihugu ca Amerika. Iryo zina ryiritazirano ryaramukurikiranye gushika naho umuvugishwakazi w’umunyamerika yitwa Desiree BROWN yamubgiye yuko yitwa musumali (Nail) nka wawundi bateye mu kiganza ca Yesu Kristo.Uhoraho yaramwihishuriye incuro nyunsi yongera amuha ubuhanuzi bginshi kw’ishengero no ku gihugu. Tuzoza turabashikiriza bukebuke. Mugiye kumwiyumvira kw’ihishurirwa yahawe mu mwaka wa 2012 ryerekeye amungane ane (4) yahawe n’Uhoraho Imana kw’ishengero ryose ryitirirwa Imana yo mw’ijuru. [1. Batereye amagara hejuru, umwe wese ni asame ayiwe; 2. Izere, uhinduke, wihane maze wandike ibaruwa ry’igisabo; 3. Ntuze wigere wigira kabizi kuko ntaco uzi; 4. Ntuze wigere uba umucamanza w’abandi.] Afise n’ihishurirwa ritangaje ryitwa E.D.C (Evaluation, Decision Conclusion). Atubikiye amabanga menshi y’ijuru muzoza murahishurirwa.Dufise imburi nyinshi yataze ku gihugu cacu c’Uburundi no kubindi bihugu tuzoza turabashikiriza co kimwe n’ubundi buvugishwa bginshi yahawe kw’ishengero.

title: Umukozi w’Imana Alphonse Niyonzima arasubiriye gutera akamo Abarundi ngo bihane kuko igihe c’ishitswa ry’amasezerano gishitse
content:
IMBURI N’UBUHANUZI BUHAMAGARIRA ABARUNDI BOSE KWIHANA N’UKWEZWA KUKO IBIHE BISHITSE.

Alphonse NIYONZIMA n’umwe mu bantu bagendanye na BEBA Guidiyoni kandi nawe yahavuye yerekwa ibintu bitari bike ku gihugu c’Uburundi.Imburi iburira umuntu wese yacokoye akanegura intumwa z’Imana zihamagarira Abarundi ukwihana no kwezwa mu kwitegurira kwinjira mu masezerano Uhoraho Imana yasezeraniye Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana ryi Burundi.Mu mwaka wa 2020 yaravugishijwe ati hasigaye igihe gito co gusemerera: « kwugarwa kwo gisemerera. »Ni umuhirwe uwamaze kwihana no gusaba kwinjira mu masezerano y’Imana.Uwaronse ubu butumwa bg’imburi akabgizera kandi akabusangiza abandi ari n’impera ikomeye n’atarambirwa akava ku rutonde.Haragowe uwahawe ubu butumwa akabucokora nkuko vyari bimeze mu gihe ca Nowa, nkuko yacokoye Mpwemu w’ubuntu.Uwahawe ibi Vyera vy’Imana akabiterera imbga n’ingurube zarabikandagiye kandi zizomutabagura.Musenge cane kuko imbga n’ingurube zigira zihindukirire abizera ukuri kw’ubuvugishwa bg’Uhoraho Imana mugabo ntaco zizobagira kuko Uhoraho Imana yaraziziritse.Uhoraho Imana yateje ibisazi izo mbga n’ingurube ni navyo bizotuma zihonera mu manga.Komeza ibicaniro vy’amasengesho mu ngo zanyu no ku mitumba iwanyu. Aho muri hose naho mu gendera hose mukomeze kwama musenga.Mugendane ubgenge muri vyose: Mu mvugo, mu ngiro no mu migenderanire n’abandi.Ongereza amasengesho menshi mu kubaho kwawe, wahora usenga rimwe ku munsi usenge gatatu, mu gitondo, ku muhingamo no mwijoro. Wahora usenga kenshi ni wame mu masengesho imbere y’Imana.Ucacure imigozi y’imitego ikuboshe yose, ube uwidegemvya ata vyaha bikuboshe canke ikintu cose cogukwegera mu caha.Rekurana n’ibintu vyo mu mubiri vyo kubuza umwidegemvyo bikagukura mu Mana. Hari ibintu nk’amatongo, amazu, imiryango n’ibindi, bireke bigende, babitware kuko Imana iraje kugushumbusha umurengera. ibintu vyiza utigeze umenya biri imbere.Radio ISEZERANO INTERNATIONALE y’Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana yarabashikirije imburi nyishi z’abahanuzi b’Abarundi n’abanyamahanga babura intambara y’Uhoraho Imana ije kurandurana n’imizi ikibi catse indaro mu gihugu cacu kuva citwa UBURUNDI. Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo-Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana ryarahaye akaryo ko kwihana, kwiyeza, kubatizwa no kwuzuzwa Mpwemu Yera Abarundi bose, abari mu mahanga n’abari mu gihugu kugira ngo ntihazogire uwugira ico yireguza kidafashe. Ubu ni ca gihe uwanyuma abishira mu ngiro kuko bugira bgire.Ubu naho yibukijwe ngo abibutse ibintu bikuru vyo kwitondera kuko ibihe bigeze.Ibintu vyihutirwa dusaba umurundi wese aho ari hose:

Abubatse musengere ingo zanyu: abafasha banyu, abana banyu n’imiryango yanyu. Ntihagire uwiyerereza kandi uwugiye kure atahe kare .Abimirije kugira ubugeni, mu musenge cane kandi musengere abo muzokwubakana mu menye yuko atari intumwa za satani kandi musengere uburinzi bg’abo mugiye kw’ubakana.Abantu mufata ingendo ndende, mu ndege, mu miduga, mu bgato n’amatereni, musenge cane imbere yuko mufata ingendo kandi musenge muri no muri ivyo bikoresho vy’ukwiyunguruza.Abavyeyi bibungenze musengere cane ibibondo biri munda kandi musengere n’ubugingo bganyu kuko satani yavyuye ingunza.Muntu wese wahawe isezerano wabariwe n’Uhoraho Imana atari bimwe vy’abavugishwa b’ibinyoma, mwirinde kwihumanya no kwiyanduza kuko Imana iraje kubishura muri iyi minsi. Hagiye kuba ibintu bibi cane ku bahumanije igihugu n’ishengero ry’Imana.IHANGA RYERA RY’IMANA risavye Abarundi bose bizeye ijambo ry’Imana ryanditse muri Bibiliya Yera n’iryavugishijwe n’abavugishwa n’Imana [2 Ingoma 20:20] yuko ABAKRISTO bose (1) duhuza imitima n’inama, (2) tubabarane, (3) tugire urukundo rw’abavukana muri Kristo Yesu. (4) Umuntu wese acire bugufi muginzi we, (5) muharire ababagiriye nabi kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana ari mw’ijuru akubonemwo umwana wiwe w’ukuri.Harageze yuko abantu bose bamenya yuko ivyari magera vyageranuye.Tugarukane igitinyiro c’Uhoraho Imana mu gihugu no mw’ishengero, abatandukanijwe n’ibi canke biriya basabane mbabazi, biyunge. Umwami Yesu Kristo yamamare!Numéro ya Alphonse Niyonzima +1 605 400-5580.

title: Uhoraho Imana agira ashitse isezerano ku gihugu c’Uburundi nk’uko yabimweretse mu 2015.
content:
UHORAHO AGIRA ASHITSE ISEZERANO YERETSE ABASAVYI N’ABASAVYIKAZI BIWE VUBA

Kw’iziina nitwa Irene Sheha. Nd’uwo mw’Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana. Nagira ndagusabe wewe ukunda gusoma ivyerekanywe wigore ufate akanya usome ivyo neretswe kandi nabonye.Hari kwigenekerezo rya 17/08/2015 zari isaha 4.15am( zubuca)Nabonye ndi munzira nduga ahantu hakadugo. Ngize gutrya nza mbona abagabo batatu (3) bambaye impuzu zera mubitugu, bari haruguru yanje batambuka n’amaguru munzira.Ibirenge vyabo sinabibona kuko bari kure yanje gato.Babiri (2) bagenda begeranye n’uwundi umwe (1)inyuma yabo gato.Uwo mugabo yagendera inyuma yabo naciye mbona akiriza ukuboko

hejuru yerekanisha ikimenyetso vubanavuba (anyarutsa) kurya kwabasirikare bakora.Nanje mbonye ivy’uwomugabo akoze naciye nipfuza kubona nokumenya ivyo yerekanye mu buryo nk’ubwo ivyarivyo,Kuko yaciye aguma ahagaze ahonyene abiraba.Kandi nabamwe bari imbere yiwe, ntibongeye kubandanya, baciye bahagarara baraba iyo yerekanishije ukuboko kw’iwe, kwerekeje m’ubuseruko.Ico gihe naciye nihuta ngo negereze ndabe ivyo yabonye kuko nibaza ngo ngirango abonye abagwanyi bateye nkahantu. Ndi hafi kubashikira naciye mpagarara ndaba iyo berekeje amaso m’ubuseruko.Yoooo Mwami wanje naciye mbona ibihambaye biteye ubwoba cane !!! Ndavye hejuru nabonye amafoto yabantu benshi cane, ntamenye igitigiri cabo, batonze umurongo, uhereye kubana batobato uko bagenda basumbasumbana, gushitsa kubantu bakuze. .Kandi icantangaje ntiyari amafoto nkamwe tumenyereye kubona afise amarangi , oya ntamarangi yarangwa kurayo mafoto,ahubwo yaramafoto adasanzwe,kuko ntabona ko yoba yacapishijwe n’ikaramu canke n’ikaramu yigiti canke zakaramu z’amarangi zimenyereye gucapishwa nkuko bisanzwe.Intimbatimbo yivyo bicapo yari yagutse nkaho umenga vyoba vyacapishijwe nurutoke.Icogihe navyitegereza ubwoba bwandengeye, kuburyo atako nobivuga.Nkiriko ndabiraba numiwe nivyo ndiko ndabona, nca numva ngo” kandi abo bantu bose nabapfuye bishwe muntambara zaheze canke zarenganye”.Kandi vyaboneka ko abo bantu bagira bahoregwe kuko benshi bishwe ataco bazira.Ngitekewe n’ubwoba nihweza ,naciye mbona ijambo ryanditswe haruhande yayo mashusho yabantu hejuru mukirere ngo “NGIRYO ISEZERANO RIRASHITSE”.Nongera kubona n’irindi jambo rigufi ryanditse mucongereza ngo” SEND” (rungika). Ubwo nyene nkirangiza gusoma iryo jambo rigufi nagiyembona vyabintu vyose naraba biri kure yanje mubuseruko, vyanyegereye naho mpagaze mukanya isase.Yoooo! Bimaze kunyegera ahondi ho ,ubwoba burantwikira no kurushiriza uko narindi .Icatumye ngira ubwoba kurusha, n’uko naciye mbona n’ivyo ntari nabonye, nkibiraba ubwambere, bikiri m’ubuseruko hejuru kure yanje cane.N’ukuvuga naciye mbona ari ikintu kidasanzwe kinini cane kandi kirekire gitembera gifise amapine matomato gisizwe n’irangi risa n’agahama (red),hejuru canditsweko ivyandiko.Icantangaje, n’uko nabona kincako kigenda, kandi sinumve n’aho gihinda, canke ngo gisume.Haba namba, cagendana ubwitonzi cane kitihuta, k’uburyo noshobora nogukozako ukuboko.Naciye nguma mpagaze aho nyene, ntangura kwiyumvira ngo hinge ndabe neza bino bintu vyanditseko ndabisome menye ico bivuga!! Ha ! Nkivyiyumvira umutima waciye uvyanka ubwo nyene ntangura kuvuga ndavyatura n’ijwi risohoka, n’ubwoba bwinshi ngo”EKA IBI BINTU NTIBINKWIRIYE KO JEWE NDABIRABA NGO NDABISOME KUKO AR’AMABANGA Y’IMANA!!!.”. Haleluya .Naciye nkebanura umusaya ndabisha k’uruhande ,nca nsigara ndabirabira hasi nakajisho kamwe ngo nsimbone ivyandiko biriko n’uko gikozwe, kuko sinabonye imbere ngo mbone n’umushoferi agitwaza.Erega ushima bitari ivyoroshe sinabonye numbarira ngo ntusome ayo majambo nagiye numva umutima umbwira ko bindengeye kurarika umutwe ngo nsome.

Ubwo rero niho n’arorera ico kintu kireruye ,AMABANGA Y’IMANA kirarengana ngihagaze hahandi nyene. Ico kintu si imodoka, si ibasi, si itereni ahubwo ni umukogote W’IMANA warureye AMABANGA Yayo .AmenIvyo biheze naciye mbona umugore aje ndamubaza ati, mbega woba unzaniye abana banje kombona hagira habe ibikomeye?

Nawe arishura ngo” ekaye kuko nanje atavyo namenya. Ubwo nyene naciye nihuta ngo simbe ndabatore. Nduze imuhira kuzana abobana naciye mbona intambara ikomeye yamaze gutangura. Nta muntu nabona ariko aragwana ahubwo nabonye imipanga iteye ubwoba cane yizunguriza nkakurya kw’imibanga ya kajugujugu. Iyomipanga ibiri yasa nibara ryagahama(ritukura) canke (red) iyindimipanga ibiri yarera(white).Yooo! Navyo nti vyari vyoroshe sinabonye kajugujugu, canke ngobone uwoba ariko akoresha iyo mipanga. Ariko ico bikoze iyo mipanga yari yururutse hasi gushika aho itema igatongoza no hagati mubitoke.Ndabibonye ndatewe nubwoba kandi bituma nsubira inyuma gatoya, nibaza abobana bari aho imipanga yatanguye gutema. Ubwonyene Naciye ngarura agatima nibuka muvyahanuwe ko abativanze nivyikigihe ubuhingiro buri K’UHORAHO gusa. Ndavuga ati kumbure iyo m’ipanga irabasimba .Inyuma yaho naciye mbona ahantu hari akayira kikirundi gasa nakakera ubwatsi bwoharuguru n’ubwo hepfo buhura bugafukereza iyonzira, nca ntibira muriyonzira ndaryama. Wamugore twavugana ncadamubona agihagaze ndamurya akara ati, “Reka kuguma uhagaze raba aho utibira nawe”. Yaciye araba aho aryama muri yanzira nyenye. Ndimuriyo nzira ndyamye, nubitse inda ntangura gusenga nsaba IMANA ko yondokora ngo naho ningenda nzembone rya Sezerano. Ubwo nyene naciye nikoma nariko ndasenga ninginga IMANA Amen!Igice Ca KabiriMaze kwikoma naciye ngwa mugahundwe n’ivyo mbonye, ncamara umwanya nibaza ivyobintu akokanya nyene nca mfata akanya kogushima IMANA kuvyo neretswe nokubaza ati “None ga MANA UHORAHA ko numvise harimwo ugushitsa Isezerano, kandi hakaba hariho n’ abandi dufatanije inzira ija mw’ijuru ,sinoshobora kubamenyesha ivyo nabonye”? Inyuma yivyo nca mfata akanya kokwandika ivyo neretswe. Mpejeje kuvyandika nca numva ko nkwiye gufata akandi kanya kogusenga.Nuko nongera nsaba IMANA kwakundi kwambere nyene. Ndavuga ati “Kandi nivyaba bikwiye ko benedata babimenyeshwa, vyombera vyiza umpaye ikimenyetso cerekana ko nkwiriye kubivuga bose bakabimenya”. Ndagije nca nongera ndaryama kandi. Aho hari cumi nazibiri zigitondo(6 am). Ubwonyene IMANA yacu IHORAHO Ntiyatevye kwishura. Naciye mpabwa agatiro nza numva umukozi W’IMANA Pasteri Alphonse Niyonzima ariko arasemerera cane kw’iradiyo Ijwi Ry’Ubuhanuzi Ninzamba y’iherezo avuga ati “Hariho abo IMANA yagiriye ubuntu bahabwa amabanga Y’IMANA none turabahaye akanya bavuge ivyo beretswe, nca numva Ijwi ryumugabo ntamenyereye kumva kw’iradiyo Ijwi ry’ubuhanuzi n’inzamba y’iherezo,ariko aravuga nanje niteguye kuvuga ivyo neretswe,nca ndikoma.

ubwo rero naciye menya neza ko mpawe uburenganzira bwo kubimenyesha abandi. Ubwo butumwa n’ubu mur’iki gihe 2024, buriko burabiragira. IMANA IHORAHO ,ihabwe icubahiro imisi yose Amen.Hakaba hari ico ubaza inumero zanje ni +(61)470177119email:irene.shehe1@gmail.com

title: Abarongoye uburimyi bakwiriye kwijukira ibiterwa bishasha mu gihugu kugira ngo bagwize umwimbu.
content:
Hari ishirahamwe ryitwa « JIT MAT UGANDA LIMITED » rigiye kuza mu Burundi rizorima amasaka yera ryongere ryubake n’ihinguriro ryayo. Bivugwa n’umushikiranganji ajejwe uburimyi. Prosper Dodiko amenyesha ko bazorima kijambere kandi ko n’abarimyi bazokorana bazobaha imbuto n’ifumbire bongere babakurikirane. Umushikiranganji Dodiko aremeza ko imashini zo kurima zatanguye gushika. Yongerako ko abazokwitabira umugambi bazobagurira ikiro c’amasaka ku bihumbi 3.

Uwuserukira iryo shirahamwe mu Burundi avuga ko ayo masaka azovamwo isukari n’imfungurwa z’ibitungwa. Bazokora kandi umwavu hamwe n’ivyo bita ‘Ethanol’. Ethanol ngo bazoyishora hanze kugira baronke amahera mvamakungu. Ku bwiwe, abarundi nibatashobora kugura isukari yose, bazoca baza barayishora no mu bihugu bibanyi. Asigura ko bategekanya kuzohingura amatanoni amajana atanu ku munsi. Amenyesha ko bazanye umutahe w’imiriyoni 160 z’amafaranga y’amanyaburaya.

Umukuru w’igihugu avuga ko ashimishwa n’uko abagwizatunga bariko baraza mu gihugu arongoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye abona ko bizotuma umwimbu uzoca uduga. Hari kuri uyu wa gatanu, i Gitega, igihe yariko aragirana inama n’aborozi b’ingurube bari bavuye mu gihugu cose.

title: Burundi: Intara yose yoba ifise ingene itoza ikori bidahuye n’amategeko y’igihugu canke!
content:
Gitega: Umukiriya wese yinjira mw’ihoteri abwirizwa kuza aratozwa 5 % yiyongera ku giciro c’icumba yarayemwo (Taxe de consommation sur l’hébergement), ayo agaca yegeranywa, agashirwa muri #OBR mu minsi itarenga 15 y’ukwezi gukurikira ukwo yatojwemwo, ico gihe kirenze mwene ihoteri akabihanirwa ». Bishikirizwa na Jean de Dieu Nimbona, ajejwe gusuzuma itororokanywa ry’amakori n’amatagisi mu kigo OBR, i #Gitega. Ivyo akaba yavyibukije kuri uyu wa 11/01/2024 mu nama Buramatari w’intara ya Gitega Venant Manirambona yari yakoranije abantu bose bakora ibikorwa vyo kwakira ingenzi, abafise inzu z’uburaro, z’uburiro n’iz’ubunywero, mu nyubakwa z’ishure ry’ubuvuzi Paramédical ry’i Gitega.

Dieudonné Nzohabonayo, aserukira Ubushikiranganji bw’ubudandaji, i Gitega: « Amazu y’uburiro, amahoteri, ububare, bategerezwa gukora bafise impapuro zitangwa n’ubwo bushikiranganji zerekana ko bazwi n’amategeko »

Bamwe mu bashikirije ibibazo bagize bati: « Gutoza amakori n’amatagisi ni vyiza. Ariko nuko ibirangurwa bitagaragara. Igihe cose dushoye ibitungwa dutozwa amatagisi ariko imvura iguye, tunyagirirwa aho… »

Abadandaza ibinyobwa nabo bati: « Ko turondera vyangombwa ariko ab’amabutike bakabandanya badandaza n’ibinyobwa, kandi batabifitiye uruhusha nkatwe, bakadutwara abakiriya, ibituma dukorera mu ruhombo… »

Kuri ivyo bibazo, Buramatari wa Gitega yamenyeshe ko ivyo vyose abajejwe intwaro babifashe mu minwe

Nayo Jacques Nduwimana arongoye komine #Gitega aca asaba abubaka amahoteri kubandanya biyumvira no kuduza inyubakwa nziza cane, haboneke n’iy’inyenyeri zitanu kugira Umugwa mukuru wa poritike ukomeze guhindura isura

title: Abarimyi b’ipampa baridogera leta yuko ibagurira kw’ideni igateba kubishura.
content:
Abo barimyi b’ipampa ni abo ahitwa Rukana muri komine Rugombo mu ntara ya Cibitoke bavuga ko haheze amezi arenga ane bacuruje ipampa muri #COGERCO kandi bari babwiwe ko bagiye guhabwa amafaranga yabo mugabo amaso agahera mu nzira.Abo barimyi bababazwa no kubona mu kwezi kwa kigarama umuyobozi wa COGERCO yari yabijeje ko amafaranga yabo mu misi cumi bazoba bayaronkejwe. Ariko gushika ubu ata ni yambu.

Bakamenysha ko ayo mafararanga ariyo yabafasha mu kuriha amafaranga y’ishure y’abana ubu n’abana birukanywe ku mashure kubera batakironka uko babarihira. Basaba Umukuru w’igihugu kubishuriza amafaranga y’ipampa. Muri COGERCO basaba abo barimyi kurindira bihanganye kuko ikibazo cabo kizwi

title: Bazura amagufa y’abapfuye kugira ngo bongere bagurishe amasandugu yabo
content:
Haraye hafashwe mukibumbu (Kayokwe) kuruno w’Imana igenekerezo rya 07/01/2024/mu nzu yitwa ko ikora ivya pompe funèbre yitwapompe funèbre umugenziyuwitwa Felix batazira Bébé akorana nuwitwa Bertrand murayo munyanga ama cercueils biboneka ko yazuwe nkuko muvyibonera kugira azosubire kugurishwa

Abajejwe umutekano bamaze kuronka ayo makuru ko iyo nzu ikora amanyanga nkayo baciy baja kuharaba basangayo ayo ma cercueils ubu bariko bagira enquetes

Nimugihe hari imva yaheruka kubomoka inyuma yukwezi kumwe bayikoze, umuryango ukaba wagarutse kuyikoresha ubwa kabiri ico gihe uwari yayikoze Bertrand yanyegeye

title: Ubuhanuzi bg’ikuri burabaho kandi bugiye gushika.
content:
Abashakashatsi barazi kugira ubushakashatsi kandi bakabushira ahabona maze bakitwa ibihangange mw’isi. Ariko ivyo bavuga usanga Abarundi baba babizi imbere y’igihe naho ataho biba vyanditse canke ata biharuro bakoresheje.

Ishirahamwe AL rirashobora kubura urupfu rw’umuntu atakwihenda kurimwo. Abashakashatsi bo muri Danemark no muri Amerika bashizeho système yitwa LIFE2VEC ishobora kwerekana yuko umuntu agiye gupfa kandi ibice 75%.

Ibisa n’ivyo turabifise mu mico y’ikirundi ivyo bita agasema kandi ababigendereje bakavuga yuko ari ukuri. Akarorero, igihuna kije kuvugira mu rugo iwanyu muramenya yuko hariho impfu zimirije. Hariho n’utundi dukoko dukwega inda bita ibisabanyama turinze tuza mu rugo iwanyu mumenya yuko ikigandaro cinjiye. No mu gihugu hariho ibimenyetso biba maze abenegihugu bakamenya yuko ari agasema k’abategetsi. Ivyo navyo ni nka nyamugigima, ikigoyi, uruzuba… Kuva kera hamye habaho na ba kamenyi, abahanuzi na ba karosi barota inzozi bakabona n’ibindi bamenya yuko iminsi y’umuntu iharuye!

Mu gihugu cacu hariho ibintu vyinshi vyavugishijwe kandi hariho n’ibimenyetso vyinshi bidahumuriza. Abasenga ni mwihane mwezwe musenge kugira ngo Imana itabare igihugu cacu. Ico mwomenya n’uko uku kwezi ari ukwanyuma kandi turi mu matariki ya nyuma yo gutabarwa. Ni mwitegurire urukiza ruvuye k’Uhoraho Imana.

title: Itangazo ku migwi y’abasenzi intandukanye: mwiyubare mur’iyi minsi mikuru.
content: Umwami n’Umukiza Yesu Kristo ashimwe! Nk’uko twabavuniye akagohe mu mwaka uheze, ubu hoho murushirize kwirinda. Mubarire abari ku bicaniro bibange cane kandi bavuge make mur’ ibi bihe.-Abasenga mu mpisho babihebe kiretse umuryango usengera mu nzu iwabo.-Abaja gusengera ku misozi babihagarike,-Abasenga mw’ijoro babihagarike,-Abagenda kuja gusengera mu bindi bibanza ku migoroba babireke,-Abantu bose bakorane abajejwe intwaro ku rwego rw’umutumba babizi.Mugihe abandi bazoba bari mu minsi mikuru irangiza umwaka mweho muzobe muri i muhira musenga Imana mushima yuko agaseke kayo gashitse mur’ibi bihe.Umwami n’Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo yamamare!

title: Burundi, irabica bigacika ariko abantu bagatinya kubivuga kandi n’ububisha bukiyongera.
content:
Mu gisagara ca Bujumbura muri Kamenge hari umuntu yahitanywe n’ikigoyi. Ni umuntu w’umugabo biboneka ko afise imyaka iri hejuru ya 50, yatowe ikiziga mu gatondo ko kuri uyu wa 19 Kigarama 2023, neza na neza imbere ya Station #Top7 muri karitiye #Mirango ya zone #Kamenge, muri meri ya Bujumbura

Nk’uko twavyiganiwe n’abari ngaho bikongera bigashimangirwa n’umukuru wa karitiye Mirango, ngo vyatanguye k’umugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 18 Kigarama aho babona uwo mugabo aryamye kuri rond-point y’aho bita « iwabo n’abantu », niho bamubaza iyo ava nawe aca avuga ko avuka muri Zone Kinama yo muri meri ya Bujumbura nyene

Muri ako kanya babonye aremvye, haca havamwo umwe yegeranya amahera yo kumushikana muhira, ariko birakekwa ko uwayegeranije ataco yahavuye amufasha ahubwo yaciye amuta mu nzira arigira!

Abamubonye mw’ijoro asa n’uwuri ku mpfiro batwiganiye ko bagerageje kumuhembura bakoresheje amata n’umukate ariko birangira acikanye

Nibaruta Evariste umukuru wa Karitiye Mirango, ari kumwe n’abajejwe umutekano banyarukiye gushika ahatowe ico kiziga kugira ngo bakore icegeranyo, akaba yatumenyesheje ko ariko ararondera impapuro zisabwa n’amategeko kugira ngo batware ico kiziga mu buruhukiro mu kurindira ko abiwabo bamenyekana, narirya uwo yitavye Imana atabimuranga yari afise

title: Abarundi barakwiriye kumenya ico bapfa n’Uhoraho Imana.
content:
Utubazo twa Mwigisha Aimé Parfait Niyonkuru ku Mana.

« Uzōgeza ryârí kūntangāza Mâna? Ufata Ibihúgu bitâgushize imbere, birōngowe n’ábahakanyi, bakorá ryā vumwe ryâtuma urígita Sodoma na Gomora, ukabihūnda ama $£€ (amafaranga y’agaciro), igitoro kikîsēsa, ikizíme kikaba umuganí, impêmbo y’umukózi ikamútūnga n’úmuryāngo, mberé akanásāguzakó ku kwêzi.

Mugábo, aho ihânga ryâgushize imbere, ahó Indōngōzi wîtōreye ucîye ku Bênegíhugu zigukûnda, zikwâmbaza, zikagúkorera ijoro n’úmurāngo, igitoro kikaba umuzi w’íbuye? Umushahara ntŭbe ukíbumba abawúhēmbwa, abagānga bakômoka bakaja kuvūra mu bihúgu vyâguhāye umugôngo.

Ubwo, kumwe wabígirira Yobú, ntiwaretse Shetani ngo itugerágeze kugira urabe igipīmo c’ úkwêmera kwâcu, twēmânga dúshize amânga? Cânké wewé uboná i bwìína bw’imitíma yâcu, hari icó ukemá ukwêmera kwâcu? Ndîzeye,ko tutarí nka ryā hănga wavúga ubícīshije ku muhanūzi Isaya 29:13 ngo : « aba bāntu banyegereye n’ákanwa kăbo gusa, bakāninaharīsha iminwa yâbo gusa, mugabo imitíma yâbo bâyīgije kure yānje cāne » ( Ce peuple m’honore de la bouche et des lèvres, mais son coeur est éloigné de moi). Mu gihe ukurí kwōba arí uko, twōba túryāmbaye.

Ntaho dukūra ububāsha bwó kugusaba insíguro (comptes) z’úko tubayého, mugábo utwêmerere Mâna twībaze igitúma umēngo ikibânza twăguhāye, intâhe tugushìíngira, amasēngēsho tugutŭra ntibihūye n’ímigisha turōnka, kiretse túbifashe mu yindi ntâhūro nyúrabwênge (philosophie). »

Dr Aimé Parfait Niyonkuru ni umwigisha wa kaminuza, ni umuhinga mu bijanye n’amategeko. Utu tubazo yadushize ku rubuga rwiwe rwa X

title: Abarundi bari mu bantu batubaha abajejwe umutekano wabo
Mwari muzi yuko umuduhe w’ibiraya biboze ugarika umuntu.
content:
Mu Burundi hagize iminsi havugwa abantu bicana hakoreshejwe uburozi, isumu, amangetengete n’ibindi gushika n’aho sentare y’igihugu yagiriza uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere gushaka kwica umukuru w’igihugu akoresheje amangetengete. Bikaba vyari bisanzwe binugwanugwa yuko Président Petero Nkurunziza yicishijwe isumu. Hari n’abandi benshi mu ba généraux n’abandi bategetsi tuzi barusimvye!

Abarundi bariyambitse ibara no mu makungu. Harageze yuko duhindura abantu n’ibintu!

Akamoto k’ibiraya biboze nako nyenye ni isumu ku muntu. Biduhuka umunuko witwa « Solanine » wica kubi. Umuntu atangura gutakaza ubgenge hanyuma agaca apfa. Iyo bakugaburiye ibiraya biboze, umeneka umutwe, ukadawha, ugacibgamwo, ingingo zigahagarara (paralysie) hanyu ugasezera isi. Muze muririnda kurya no kunywa ivyo mubonye vyose na cane cane mur’iyi minsi hibonekeza inzara mu gihugu.

Nti duhakana yuko abantu bahana ishano ku buryo butangaje ngaha mu gihugu cacu, ariko hariho bamwe barya ivyo kurya bibi «Intoxication alimentaire » kubera kutabimenya, kubera isuku rike canke n’amagara yabo umubiri ntiwigwanire; hanyuma bigaheza bikavugwa ngo bamuhaye uburozi. Umuntu wese akomeze gusuzuma neza ivyo afungura.

title: Umutima w Umwami Dawidi war’umeze gute?
content:
UMUTIMA WA DAWIDI

« Maz’ umwami Dawidi arinjira, yicara imbere y’Uhoraho, aravuga, ati Mwami Uhoraho, mbega jewe n’inda n’indesho, n’inzu yanje, nar’ iki, kubona wagiye unzigama gushitsa n’ubu?2 Samweli 7:18″

Aha n’igihe umuvugishwa Natani yabwiye Dawidi ko Uhoraho azokomeza ingoma yiwe ibihe vyose.Ariko kandi Dawidi yari yipfuje kwubakira ingoro Uhoraho,nawe amubwira ko izokwubakwa n’umwana wiwe.

Dawidi yar’afise umutima utangaje.Mubuhangange bwiwe bwose nk’umwami,ntiyigeze yibagira kure yavuye,n’uwahamukuye(Uhoraho).

Bibiliya ivuga ko Dawidi yar’ umuhizi w’inkomezi(1samwel16:18),ariko ntiyigeze aha agaciro ko ubwo buhizi aribwo bwamuha kunesha.Yaravuze ati jewe n’inda n’indesho,…,nari iki kuba wagiye uranzigama gushitsa n’ubu?

Benshi Imana ibagiriye neza,ni bakeya bokwivuga ngo jewe n’inda n’indesho,nari iki…,ahubwo baba bageze aho batangura kwereka abandi ko nabo basigaye bakomeye,…Nibakeyi kandi bibagira ubuhizi bwabo(ubwenge bwabo,abo bazinanye batumye bikunda,abiwabo bifise,…),bakavuga ati Uhoraho yagiye andokora(anteza intambwe).

Ikindi,Dawidi no mubuhangange bwiwe nk’umwami,yar’agifise umutima wo kurondera Uhoraho.

Benedata,umuntu akunda Imana ntamwanya wo gusenga yobura,n’ubwo yoba ajejwe amabanga angana gute.Ngira ntamuntu afise amabanga menshi nk’umwami,ariko Dawidi uwo mwanya yar’awufise.

Umwanya w’Imana ushobora kugabanuka birumvikana,ariko ntushobora kubura,nimba koko ifise ikibanza cambere .

Umuntu ashobora kuja kukazi asenga,agataha asenga,agasenga ari muri douche,…iyo yose n’imyanya abavuga ko atamwanya bafise bokoresha.Kuko igikora kumutima Imana s’ugusenga uhumirije,ahubwo n’umutima uyirondera.

Dawidi yari yibuka iyo yavuye,n’uwahamushikanye(Uhoraho),kandi yagumye ar’umukunzi w’Uhoraho,kuko yar’afise umutima umurondera.Natwe dukwiye kugira umutima nk’uyo wa Dawidi,nawe azoshishikara adukomeza muvyacu no mubacu.Muhezagirwe. Muhezagirwe .

title: Abategetsi b’igihugu c’Uburundi bahisemwo kubesha kugira ngo bahumurize abenegihugu aho gutuma bihorera
content:
Vyose vyatanguriye mu kigege c’igihugu aho ubugenduzi bg’ikigega mpuzamakungu bgagirine umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye kuba ariwe yasahuye amafaranga mvamakungu y’igihugu. Ukwagiriza ico caha rikaba ryakurikiye ihindurwa ry’inoti z’igihugu c’Uburundi. Yagirijwe ubgo busuma, hakurikiye ipfungwa ry’umukuru w’ico kigega c’igihugu. Inyuma y’ibura ry’amafaranga y’agaciro n’amafaranga mu gihugu, ntihabujije yuko Abarundi baguma babona ingendo zitwara uburyo bginshi z’umutambukanyi w’umukuru w’igihugu, mbere n’izumukuru w’igihugu we nyene n’abamugendanira.

Ivyo vyose bikurikirwa n’inzara y’ibifungurwa yibonekeza mu gihugu cose kuko ibisumwa bizimba cane canke bikanabura. Si ivyo gusa, igitoro kirabura mu gihugu cose, ishirahamwe rihingura isukari SOSUMO rirugara, ishirahamwe rihingura ibizuku ONATOUR rirugaye, abantu bafise n’ivyo guteka barabura n’aho bagurira amakara.

Abantu bagiriza umukuru w’igihugu yuko aho gufata ingingo zibereye ari wa muntu aguma yidoga nk’uko womenga akora mumashirahamwe adaharanira inyugu za politike canke nk’uko umengo n’uwo mu migambge irwanya umugambge uri ku butegetsi nk’uko atazi ico ajejwe. Ikindi giteye amakenga n’uko intwazangabo itwara ihonguriro SOSUMO yemeza yuko iryo shirahamwe ritahagaritswe n’ivyuma vyapfuye, ngo ryahagartswe n’imvura yabaye nyinshi kandi ko abantu batogira ubgoba ngo kuko bazoguma babazanira isukari mvamakungu. Bati none ko igihugu atamafaranga y’agaciro ahari iyo sukari avuga azokura hanze azoyigura iki! Bati ko dufise amafoto yerekana ibimashini vy’iryo hinguriro atwara vyapfuye, abesha ngo bimwungure iki canke vyungure iki igihugu! Bati ko dufise amafoto yerekana imirima y’ibikaju yatwawe, ubgo iyo iba urugo rwiwe rwari gutwarwa n’umuvo ntiyari kuba yarukingiye! Ibinyoma bavuga ngo ni vyinshi mur’iyi nkuru. Kuber’iki ibikorwa vy’amahinguriro nk’aya bitazezwa abantu bavyigiye, babifitiye ubuhinga kandi bazi bakanakunda ivyo bakora!

Ibikorwa vy’ihinguriro ry’isukari SOSUMO vyarahagaze nk’uko vyemezwa n’abashikiranganji babiri, uwujejwe uburimyi hamwe n’uwo ubudandaji. Basigura ko vyavuye ku mvura nyinshi iriko iragwa muri ino minsi yatumye imirima y’ibikaju itwarwa. Babishikirije, kuri uyu wa mbere, bariko barishura ku makenga y’abashingamateka bibaza ko hoba hari icinyegeje inyuma.

Umushingamateka Pascal Gikeke yabajije umushikiranganji ajejwe uburimyi ati : « Nyakwubahwa mushikiranganji muri SOSUMO ibibazo bihari ni ibibazo nyabaki? Umuyobozi mukuru ayirongoye yaravuze y’uko bahagaritse ibikorwa kubera imvura. Ubwo koko ni kubera imvura yatumye isarura muri SOSUMO rihagarara canke hari ikindi coba cinyegeje inyuma? »

Prosper Dodiko yishuye yemeza ko imvura ariyo yabujije iyimbura ry’ibikaju kubera ko imashini zica zinyika, zikabura uko zibandanya. Ku ruhande rw’ubudandaji, umushikiranganji ajejwe ico gisata avuga ko ababishoboye barekuriwe kuzana isukari bayikura hanze y’igihugu. Marie Chantal Nijimbere asigura ariko ko haca haba ikibazo c’amafaranga mvamakungu.

title: Ibiriko biraba mu gihugu c’Uburundi ni ibiki? Ni bande bakwiriye gusengera igihugu?
content: «Abarundi twese dusenge cane twirukane idayimoni ibuza iterambere ry’uburundi kuko iyo habonetse akantu kose kotuma dutera imbere, haca haza izindi nguvu ntazi zica zibuza (…) iyo poroje ica ipfa, igaca ihagarara . Nkubu ntimubona ko turiko twirukanga ngo Nickel dutangure exploitation yayo, umuyagankuba Rusumo Falls ntiwaje? Harya muzoza mubona izindi nguvu zivuze ziti stop ntahomuja! Tudasenze rero ntibikunda» Niko Perezida Ndayishimiye yabwiye abari bitabiriye ivyo birori vy’umwaka wagenewe umutangakori. Abasenga Uhoraho Imana n’abavugishwa bobo s’uko babibona yuko ari abadayimoni ahubgo Uhoraho Imana niwe yimanukiye gutondeka ibidatonze, kuzibirira imigisha abanyakibi bikumakumirako vyose gushika ashikije isezerano ku gihugu c’Uburundi. Kwitirira ibikorwa vy’Imana abadayimoni ni igicumuro ciyongera ku bindi n’abatozakori sibo basengera igihugu. Ngo ko mwanse kwihana inkota y’Imana izokubita birya nyene mw’ishimiriza vyose, yongere iririke n’abana banyu [Ezekiyeli 21:3]

title: Iyiza kurisha ihera ku nama, ni igihe co gusengera Uburundi.
content:
Abategetsi b’ubu bigenza nka « Société Civile » canke « Opposition Politique » ntibazi ico bajejwe. Ils dénoncent l’injustice sociale et les détournements kandi aribo nyenye n’imiryango yabo babikora kugira ngo bahume amaso Abarundi.

– Nyakwigendera Jérôme Ndiho yavuga yuko turwanya igisoda c’ubgoko bumwe, yari imvugo « Langage politique acceptable » mugabo muvy’ukuri twarwanya akarenganyo «L’injustice sociale »

None itandukaniro hagati y’intwaro zacu na za ntwaro twagwanije, n’uko barya bari abatutsi natwe tukaba turi abahutu, ivyo gusa! Hamwe twonezerwa vyonyene n’uko dutwarwa n’abahutu bakaba aribo baducura bufuni na buhoro bakica, bakiba, bakangaza, bakarenganya… tukabireka uko twoba turi « Des traîtres ni moins ni plus »

Uburundi burakeneye abagabo n’abagore bavuga ukuri kandi bakakugendera, abahungu n’abakobga bakunda umurundi wese bakamubungabunga ntihagire uwusubira kwicwa kubera yanse kubabera igitwazi. Aho niho Abarundi tuzokwikukira.

title: Mu Burundi wewe uri mu buhe bgoko?
content: Hariho ubgoko butatu bg’Abarundi mukwiriye kwiyubara. Imana ikwiriye kubaha ubgenge bgo kubana nabo. Abambere ni abantu babi bakora ibibi gusa. Abo ubasanga hose mu kibano, mu kazi mu masengero no mu buzima bga misi yose. Ubugira kabiri n’abantu bikunda. Abo ibintu vyose bavyihererezako, ntibanezwe igihugu, abrenganywa, abakenye, abapfa canke ibishikira Abarundi. Abo ubasanga ahantu hose. Ubundi bgoko bg’Abarundi ni abantu ataco banezwe, ba ntirumveko n’abadashobora kugira uwo botabara. Abo bose bari no mu nzego zose z’igihugu. Dutegerezwa kugira ubgenge bgo kubana nabo. Ubgoko bugira kane tutavuze n’ubg’abakunda igihugu bagashobora no kucitangira kuko bazi yuko Imana yakibaraze ngo bagikorere. Abo basabga guhaguruka kugira ngo bamire ayo yandi moko atuye mu gihugu.

title: Twinjiye mu masengesho ahambaye y’iminsi 7 yo gusenyura inzitiro za Yeriko y’Uburundi, ingo wifatanye natwe.
content:
URUGENDO RWO GUSENYURA INZITIRO Z’I YERIKO MU BURUNDI

Isenyurwa ry’inzitiro za Yeriko ryabaye ikimenyetso c’ishitswa ry’isezerano kw’ihanga rya Isirayeli. No mu gihe ca none kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana igushitseko ivyo yakuvuzeko, ibanza gusenyura ibimeze nk’imisozi biri imbere yawe nkuko inzitiro zi Yeriko zari zihagaze imbere y’ubgoko bg’Imana.Mu gihugu cacu c’Uburundi, hariho abantu benshi bazi neza yuko igihugu gifise isezerano cahawe n’Imana. Mugabo hariho n’abandi kubera inyungu zabo bwite bagerageza kurihakana no kuryankisha Abarundi ngo ni ibintu bitabaho. Isezerano iyo ryahawe Ihanga, kutarimenya canke kurihakana ntaco bihindura k’Uhoraho Imana kuko hari abo irihishurira bakaryemera maze ikajana n’abo bemeye. Hariho ibishika mu gihugu, abantu bakirigwa baridoga ngo ibi na biriya birabuze mbere ababarongoye bakagerageza inzira zose bagasanga ntizishika kubera baba batwaye ibintu vyose mu bgenge bgabo gusa basize Imana inyuma canke bayitanze imbere.Abantu ntibatahura igituma ubutunzi butifashe neza, imico y’abantu igatera itituka maze ivyo bigakurikirwa n’ubukene, inzara, ibura ry’iki na kiriya. Ivyo bitera abantu gufungura nabinabi, ukwivuza nabinabi, ukwiyunguruza nabinabi bakanata icizere ca kazoza kuko baba bafise amagara adafashe. Umuntu iyo atabona iyo aja aca afatwa n’umwiheburo. Umwiheburo nawo utuma abantu batari bake baja kurondera amasumiro bakomokera mu mahanga. Abokoreye igihugu bagasanzara bakangara, abatari bake bagasumirwa n’impwemu ya nyamwihebuza yohava inabatuma kwiyahura.Urazi ingene bibabaje kubaho utazi ingene uzogaburira umuryango, ingene abana bazoja kwiga, ingene uzovuza uwurwaye canke ukama wibaza igituma udafise aho kuba heza nk’abandi! Urazi kubaho uriwe n’uwogutunganirije, uwokurenganuye akaba ariwe akurenganya, uwofashe ingingo ngo ubeho neza akaba ariwe agufatira ingingo zo kugukandamiza!Turagomba kunesha ivyo bigeragezo mu guhamagara Uhoraho Imana ngo ize itabare Abarundi twese. Nti dushobora kwihanganira kuguma mur’ivyo bibi iyi myaka yose ataco dukoze kandi mw’Ijuru dufise Imana ishobora vyose, natwe mu gihugu turi Ihanga ryubaha Uhoraho Imana. Turagomba yuko igihugu c’Uburundi kiba intara ikukira ubgami bg’Imana mw’ijuru.Inkuru y’ingene Yosuwa yarongoye Ihanga rya Isirayeli kuja gusenyura ibisika vy’i Yeriko iratwigisha cane ingene dushobora kuva mu bigeragezo vy’igihugu kubera Uhoraho ari Imana y’ukwizigirwa kandi ari Umwami ahambaye. Ivyashikiye Abisirayeli vyari ishitswa ry’Isezerano rihambaye Imanayarabasezeraniye kugira ngo binjire mu gihugu c’Isezerano nkuko natwe yadusezeraniye Uburundi butemba amata n’ubuki.Mose atarapfa, yari yarabasezeraniye yuko Yosuwa ariwe azomusubirira mu kurongora Abisirayeli kugira ngo abashikane mu gihugu c’isezerano. Bahejeje kujabuka uruzi Yorodani, Yeriko carico gisagara ca mbere bategerezwa kubanza gufata. [Yosuwa 6:1-27]Mur’iyo nkuru dukuramwo ubumenyi nyamukuru buturongora kumenya ingene twokwizera kandi tukongera tugashika ku gukira ivyago vy’ubukene n’akarenganyo vyugarije Ihanga ryacu mur’ikino gihe. Hariho n’ibindi vyinshi Imana ishobora kudutabara kuko burya imyenge y’inzu imenywa na nyeneyo.Inzitiro canke ibisika vy’i Yeriko ni ibihe?Nkuko tubisanga mu gitabo ca Yosuwa, Yeriko carico gisagara c’abanya Kanani, abisirayeli bashikirako bahejeje kujabuka Yorodani rubanje gukama bakajabuka hanyuma rugaca rusubira guterana. Ico gisagara cari kizengurutswe n’ibihome vy’amabuye binini kandi birebire bikingira ico gisagara ku buryo ata muntu n’umwe yashobora ku vyurira ngo ashike hejuru ngo ashobore kwinjira canke ngo asohoke ico gisagara. Inzugi zinjira mur’ico gisagara zari zugaje ibihindizo kugira ngo ntihagire umunyesirayeli canke uwundi mwansi abinjirana. Kw’ihanga rya Isirayeli, iki cari igihe gihambaye co kubona yuko koko Isezerano Imana yabahaye ribaye ukuri naho bari barabonye ibindi bitangaza nko ku kiyaga gitukura, nka manu mu bugaragwa, nk’inzoka y’umuringa, nk’igicu cabamurikira mw’ijoro kikabakingira izuba ku murango na yorodani ikama imbere yabo. Ivyo bari barabibonye mugabo bari bakeneye kubona igitangaza co kwinjira mu gihugu c’Isezerano nyezina kugira ngo bive mu buvugishwa bibe ukuri kwo mu buzima bgabo bga minsi yose. Ubgo ntavyo ubona nk’ibisika binini bikomeye n’inzugi zugaje ibihindizo vyivyuma mu gihugu, mw’ishengero no mu buzima bgawe? Imana iragiye kubisenyurira hasi bicike umukungugu gusa mu kanya gato. Na twebge hari ibihambaye Imana yadukoreye mugabo turagomba kubona ishitswa ry’amasezerano nyezina.Ibisika vyi Yeriko vyarundukiye hasi gute?Imana yari yabariye Yosuwa ingene ari bu bigenze, ico bakwiriye gukora kugira ngo ivyo bihome bihomvoke bitume abisirayeli banesha Yeriko kugira ngo ibe iyabo. “Ku munsi ugira indwi, bazunguruka igisagara incuro ndwi, abaherezi bariko baravuza inzamba. Wumvise barandiriye mukuvuza inzamba, barira abantu bose bihe akamo; aho rero izo nzitiro zizoca zisenyuka umwe wese ace yinjirira aho atumbereye.” [Yosuwa 6:4-5]. Uko nyene niko vyagenze.minsi itandatu, bazungurutse Yeriko rimwe rimwe ku munsi, abaherezi bareruyeisandugu y’Isezerano kandi bafise n’inzamba ariko mu gacerere ntangere. Ku munsi ugira indwi baca babigenza nk’uko babariwe, za nzitiro za Yeriko zica zirasenyuka nabo baca barinjira biba birabaye.Kubga Yosuwa, abaherezi n’ihanga ryose bari kumwe, biyumvira yuko ivyo bintu Imana yababariye ataho bihuriye n’ubuhinga bgo kurwana intambara yo gusenyura ibihome vya Yeriko, ariko Yosuwa yatumye abisirayeli gukora ico Uhoraho Imana yamutumye ataco barengejeko. Kubera isezerano Imana yahaye ihanga yitoranirije no gukora ico yategetse, inzitiro zi Yeriko zarasenyutse ku munsi ugira indwi baca barahanesha ku buryo bg’igitangaza.Ihanga ry’Abarundi rirazi yuko rifise Isezerano ry’Imana ku gihugu no kw’ishengero. Ingorane rifise ni ukudashaka kumenya uwufise ivyo yavuganye n’Imana ngo rimwumvire mu kubikurikiza maze inzitiro zisenyuke. Bamwe bose bashaka kwigirira utuntu twabo. Imana ivuze iti ni mwizere, mwihane, mubatizwe, mwezwe maze mwuzuzwe Mpwemu Yera, bamwe baca bagira bati mw’idini iwacu ivyo ntibabiha agaciro. Abandi bakibaza yuko intambara itogenda uko Uhoraho Imana abivuga bakagomba kuyirwana uko bavyumva, ivyo navyo bigatuma ihanga ry’Abarundi riguma muri sokwe ni ruze navyo bikatera kuguma rizunguruka mu bugaragwa bg’inzara, ubukene, akarenganyo, uguhunga igihugu n’ibindi. Burya biracagora umurundi gukurikiza neza ico yabariwe. Naho aba yakibariwe n’Imana aca ashaka kugikora uko acumva canke gukuramwo inyungu ziwe bgite. Turacakeneye kwigishanya kwubaha itegeko, kwubahiriza ibgirizwa no gukurikiza ikintu uko gitegerezwa kumera.Hariho ibintu indwi vyotwigisha kw’isenyuka rw’ibisika vyi Yeriko.

title: Abarundi boreka gufungura ibiterwa bidatanga imbuto kugira babeho neza mu gihugu cabo
content:
Dufatiye akarorero ku bigori, harabaho ibigori bisanzwe bifungugwa n’abantu, harabaho ibigori vyagenewe kugaburira ibitungwa n’ibigori  bahinguramwo igitoro( biocarburant). Urabishije amaso, ivyo bigori vyose birasa.

Turabire hamwe ibi:

Imbuto ni ikigwanisho

Abahinga baribanura imbuto, bavyiga igihe kirekire, kandi bibatwara uburyo bg’inshi, ibigo bibakoresha bibahemba amahera menshi, iyo utabahemvye ayakwiye baguhendako bariko barakora.

Ibihugu vyatunganije neza igisata c’uburimyi, usanga ahakoregwa ubushakashatsi kumbuto, ari mubigo vyagisirikare, mubigo vyigendereza, n’amazina y’abashakashatsi babo ntamenyekana.

Iyo rero habonetse imbuto nshasha, bashiraho n’ubuhinga bgo kuyicungera:

Bageze kurugero ruhanitse, kuko ubu barakora imbuto zihonya izindi.

Itanguriro 1:29 Guca kubiri n’ico Uhoraho Imana yashinze ni ugukwega umuvumo mu gihugu.

title: Umutumiro w’urugendo rw’iminsi 7 yo gusenyura inzitiro za Yeriko ku Burundi
content:
UMURUNDI WESE ARATUMIWE MU RUGENDO RWO GUSENYURA INZITIRO Z’I YERIKO KU GIHUGU C’UBURUNDI

Mwese muratumiriwe mu masengesho adasanzwe yo gusenyura inzitiro za Yeriko mu buzima bg’Ihanga ry’Abarundi. Ayo masengesho azotangura kw’igenekerezo rya 24 gushika kurya 30 zuku kwezi. Isenyurwa ry’inzitiro za Yeriko ryabaye ikimenyetso c’isitswa ry’isezerano kw’ihanga rya Isirayeli. [Yosuwa 6:1-27]Natwe ihanga ry’Abarundi nk’abahawe isezerano n’Uhoraho Imana ry’Uburundi butemba amata n’ubuki, igihugu kizotwara umuvyuro n’ikanguro, reka twumvire Uhoraho kugira ngo Uhoraho asenyure ivyigize imisozi n’ivyugaje ibihindizo vy’amabuye, vyazibiye imigisha yacu, Abarundi dutabarwe.Mwese murahawe kaze mur’ico gikorwa c’iteka ku gihugu cacu. Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo yamamare!

title: Abategetsi b’igihugu boba bafata ingingo bataravye ingaruka mbi na nziza zigira ku gihugu n’abenegihugu.
content:
Abaja gupagasa bemeza ko bahitamwo kuza baguze ibintu, batinya kwinjirana amashiringi ku butaka bw’Uburundi no kwagirizwa ko bakora akazi ko kuvunja amafaranga. Bamenyesha ko hari n’abikika mu kiza bakavunja uko bashaka ku ruhande rwa Tanzania. Basaba reta gutorera umuti ico kibazo.

Buramatari w’intara ya Makamba aremeza ko Abarundi n’Abatanzaniya bagenderanira. Tantine Ncutinamagara avuga ariko ko ico kibazo kizotorerwa inyishu n’inzego zo hejuru zafashe ingingo.

title: Leta yibga kuko isamara canke babigira babizi: Umuntu umwe usanga afise amashirahamwe atsindira amasoko yose.
content:
Ingwano yo kugwanya ubukene ntawoyitsinda atabanje kugwanya abatera ubukenetwihoze ibiriko biraba ubu dufate akarorero ku ntwaro ya Président Nkurunziza n’umugambi yazanye wo gutera amavoka.

Umuhinga w’indimo yaryogoye ati nyabuna ivyo mukora ntivyumvikana kuko ntaho bizoshikana uwo mugambi, baramutumyeko mw’iperereza baramupfunga maze bamukura mu kazi gutyo baba baramuzibije atagitabara. None inzego zikorera bande? Igihugu zo gushika a hehe? Abarundi dukiriye kwikubita agashi. Abica igihugu ni aagiywara.

title: Umwungere Denise Bucumi Nkurunziza yarabaye umuvugabutumwa rurangiranwa
content:
Denise Bucumi Nkurunziza, yahoze ari umutambukanyi w’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi akaba n’umwungere wo mw’ishengero ry’urutare (Église du Rocher); ubu asigaye ari bitumwako mu makungu.

Inyuma yo gutumwako kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana mumashengero yo mu ntara zitandukanye mu gihugu cacu c’Uburundi, yaratumiwe kuvuga ubutumwa mu bihugu vyo hanze. Mu ntara za Amerika, mu bihugu vya Koreya y’ubumanuko na Ostraliya kandi ariteguye no gushika n’ahandi kure.

Imana iyo iriko irategurira ibihambaye ihanga ryayo, harabaho ibimenyetso biboneka bitangura kwibonekeza. Ivyo vyose nivyo gushimira Uhoraho Imana.

title: Umuntu wese yihanye ivyaha akezwa areme naho yoba ari mu bihe bigoye
content: Aho uri hose n’ivyo urimwo vyose umenye yuko Uhoraho Imana akubona kandi aguhozako Ijisho nimba warihanye ivyaha ugahitamwo kwama ugororotse kuko iryo niryo sezerano twahawe.

title: Umuvugabutumwa Kris Ndikumana yarabiciye biracika i Duwala mu gihugu ca Kameruni.
content:
Yatanguye yigishiriza ubutumwa bgiwe ku mbuga ngurukana bumenyi, kubera gusengera abantu bagakira ingwara ashika aho abantu bamutumira mu mashengero iwabo, ubu ageze aho akora ibikorane bikitabga n’amasinzi y’abantu. Imana ikomeze kumuha imbere.

Abitabiriye ico gikorane bavuze yuko batanguye kwumva inyigisho ziwe kuri telefone, hanyuma bakazicisha ku maradiyo. Bongeyeko bati arasengera abantu bakaronka ibitangaza abandi bakihana ni naco gituma bitabiriye igikorane yateguye. No mugihugu c’Uburundi yari yateguye igikorane mubari bacitavye harimwo abari bavuye mur’ico gihugu.

Imana ikomeze guhabga icubahiro.

title: Abarundi turakwiriye kwitaho impongore Imana yaduhaye muri Ruvubu.
content:
Amakuru dukesha abegereye iryo shamba uruhande rw’abarimyi ruridogera abajejwe iryo shamba risanzwe ari n’uruhongore kama rw’ibikoko kuko ibikoko bigwiriye mwo nk’imbogo vyona imirima ihegereye kubera iryo shamba ritazitiye

Ariko abacungera iryo shamba bo barabeshuza abavuga ko ukwo kwona imirima bigwiriye mw’ino minsi bakemeza ko bishika gake. Bo bamenyesha ko ubu bafise ikibazo c’uko uruhigi rwasubiye kwiyongera muri iryo shamba. Aha ibikoko bibangamiwe ngo ni imbogo zidasigaye inyuma. Ibi mu mpera z’umwaka ngo bikorwa kubera kwitegurira iminsi mikuru irangiza umwaka, bagatanga akarorero ko nko mu ndwi iheze hishwe imbogo zibiri zabonywe ibisigarira kandi hari n’izindi zitaramenyekana iyo zagiye mu gihe umwaka wari uheze atazizimiye nk’uko abo bacunga ishamba babandanya baimenyesha

Umwe mu bacungera iryo shamba yamenyesheje ko ubwo bugizi bwa nabi butungisha ababukora kuko imbogo 1 ishobora gutanga ibiro 1000 vy’inyama.

N’aho umuntu wese kwibaza yuko urwo ruhongore ari itunga rusangi.

title: Wabatijwe umubatizo nyabaki?
content:
WOBA WARABATIJWE UMUBATIZO W’UKURI? CANKE WARASUTSWE!

Mu bantu bari mw’isi bizera Imana n’ijambo ryayo ryanditse muri Bibiliya Yera, bamwe bizera ivyo bigishijwe kandi babariwe n’abantu, abandi bagashika kure kugira ngo bige barabe ico ijambo ubgaryo rivuga ndetse bakanasenga basobanuza Mpwemu w’Imana kugira ngo bamenye ukuri kwose. Umubatizo w’ukuri ni kimwe mu bibazo bibaza kubera yuko umubatizo n’ikintu gihambaye.Kuvyerekeye umubatizo, hariho amashengero adaha agaciro nagato umubatizo, ntibabatize namba, n’abandi babatiza uko bo nyene bibaza yuko vyoba vyiza mukworohereza abantu no ku nyungu zabo. Uwo mugwi wa kabiri urimwo ababatiza inzoya n’abakuze mu kubasuka amazi ku ruhanga mu kibanzabategekanije aho mu rusengero. Hariho n’abandi babatiza mu mazi menshi mu kidengeri bikoreye n’abatwara abizera ku ruzi bakababatiza mw’Izina rya Data, n’iry’Umwana n’irya Mpwemu Yera.Ukubatizwa vyatanguranye n’umuvugishwa Yohana Umubatiza, akabatiza umubatizo wo kwihana ivyaha no kubiharirwa mu kin jana ca mbere witwa uguhumanurwa. [Luka 3:1-3] Uwo Yohana nyene niwe yagize ati: “…Jewe ndababatirisha amazi mugabo uwuhambaye we azobabatirisha Mpwemu Yera n’umuriro.”[Luka 3:16-17]Aho yavuga Yesu Kristo.Yesu Kristo nawe mukwigisha intumwa ziwe yazibariye ati:”Jewe nahawe ububasha bgose mw’ijuru no mw’isi. Genda mukwire isi yose, mwigishe amahanga muyahindure abigishwa, mubabatiza mw’Izina rya Data, irya Mwana n’irya Mpwemu Yera, mubigisha kwitondera ivyagezwe vyose, umve ndi kumwe namwe iminsi yose, gushika ku muhero w’isi.” [Matayo 28:18-20] Uwo mubatizo niwo amadini n’amashengero menshi ahagazeko mu kubatiza abizera babo.Umwami Yesu yabariye abigishwa biwe ibintu bitanu bihambaye cane mur’iri tumwa gukora, umuntu wese agomba gukorera Imana yotegerezwa guhagararako agashikama. Navyo n’ibi:

Mu kinjana ca gatatu, umupatiri yitwa TERUTOLIYANO yaciye avuga ngo ubutatu bugizwe na Data, Mwana na Mutima Mweranda. Uwo nyene ni nawe yazanye ivyizegwa vy’igipagani vyo gusabira abapfuye n’urumenyetso rw’umusaraba rwo kwikora mu gahanga, ku mutima no kubitugu ngo urasenze. Yanatanguje n’umubatizo wo kudimba abantu gatatu mu mazi hataraza uwo gubasuka amazi ku ruhanga. Uko niko bahinduye umubatizo mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo wakoreshwa mw’ishengero Umwami Yesu yashizeho bawusubiriza umubatizo w’ubutatu warusanzwe ukoresha n’amadini y’abapagani.Inyigisho z’ubutatu zishinze imizi mu migenzo y’igipagani yo kuva ku gihe bubaka umunara wi BABELI, i SHANARI hafi y’uruzi EUPHRATE inyuma y’umwuzure wabaye kuri NOWA. Ico gihe Imana yayoberanije indimi zabo batangura kuvuga indimi nyinshi [Itanguriro 11 :1-4] KUSHI yari umwana wa HAMU, umwuzukuru wa NOWA umusavyi w’Imana [Kuvayo 10 :1-6] yafashije umuhungu wiwe gutegura umugambi wo kuganza isi yose bakoresheje ubugambanyi bgo gukora idini ry’umwana wiwe yitwa NIMURODI. Niwe yatanguje iryo dini ry’umugararizo ryo gusenga izuba aca atanguza n’igisagara ca BABULONI. [Itanguriro 10 :8-10 na 11 :4] Bise umunara wi Babubuloni ijambo risigura “urugi rw’ijuru” ariko Imana yoyo yawise BABELI risigura « kuzazanigwa. » [Itanguriro 9 :1] Imana yayoberanije indimi zabo baca barasanzara mu bice bitandukanye vy’isi [Itanguriro 11 :8-9]Kubera Nimurodi yarazi yuko abantu batinya Imana ya Nowa, yari yashinze idini ryo gusenga satani mu mpisho bakavuga yuko basenga ibintu bitatu: “umuriro, izuba n’inzoka.” Yaciye arongora nyina amuvyara yitwa SEMIRAMISI aca yitwa Umwami wi Babuloni, nyina nawe yitwa umwamikazi wi Babuloni nyene. Ico gihe baratanga ibimazi vy’amaraso y’abana nkuko abasenga satani babikora n’uyu munsi kuko batanga ibimazi vy’amaraso y’abantu. Shemu umuhungu wa Nowa akaba na se wa Nimurodi, yaramufashe amwica amucagaguyemwo uduhimba kugira ngo abere akarorero abantu bose bakora ibizira bagasenga satani. Kubera yacitse ubunywenywe hariho abivugira ngo NIMURODI yariyahuye.Wa mwamikazi Semiramisi yari nyina wa Nimurodi akongera akaba umugore wiwe, yaciye asambana aribungenga, avyara umwana w’umuhungu maze amwita TAMUZI. Aca abesha abantu ngo Nimurodi apfuye yaciye aja kuzuba maze izuba rica rirasira umuco uwo mugore vyatumye yibungenga ati mu bisanzwe ni Nimurodi agarutse avuye ku mana-zuba. N’uko rero bakoresheje ijambo ubutatu muri Babuloni abantu bagasenga Nimurodi, Tamuzi (Umwana na Semiramisi (Nyina). N’uko rero Semiramisi yavugako Nimurodi ari Imana Zuba, Tamuzi akaba ari umuhungu wa mana-zuba nawe akaba umugore na nyina wa mana-zuba kandi yuko bose bategerezwa gusengwa nk’imana-zuba imwe: UBUTATU. Muca mubona ingene BIKIRAMARIYA yinjijwe mu kwemera kw’abatu.

N’uyu munsi niko ibintu bimeze, satani akoresha ikinyoma, ibinyegezwa, amayeri n’urujijo maze abantu bakamusenga batabizi, bibgira ngo bariko barasenga Imana y’ukuri. Ahantu hose muri Babuloni hari ibishusho vy’uyo mugore Semiramis batazira kandi “umwamikazi w’ijuru” [Yeremiya 7: 16-20] ateruye umwana wiwe Nimurodi, nkuko mubona ibishusho vy’umugore ateruye umwana uyu munsi bavuga ngo ni Mariya ateruye kana YEZU. Ikimenyetso ciwe kwari ukwezi, ica Nimurodi naco cari izuba akongera akitwa BAYALI. Aho niho havuye ubutatu. [Abikolosayi 2 :9]Kiliziya Katolika mu manama yayo ya NISEYA mu mwaka wa 325, ya CONSTANTINOPLE mu mwaka wa 381, TOLEDO mu mwaka wa 675, LATERANE mu mwaka wa 1215 na Council yi FLORENCE mu mwaka wa 1431-1449 yashizwe isutse ico cizerwa c’ubutatu bgeranda y’ubupaganimu vyizerwa vy’aba-Kristo. Amashengero nayo yitirirwa Yesu Kristo yagiye ariyonkora kuri Katolika agumana ico cizerwa c’igipagani mu vyizerwa vyayo. Ubusanga muri:-Britannica Encyclopedia, 11th Edition, Volume 3, page 365 – Handitse yuko umubatizo mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo wahinduwe ugirwa mw’izina rya Data n’irya mwa n’irya mutima mweranda mu kinjana ca kabiri.-Canney Encyclopedia of Religion, page 53 – Handitse yuko ishengero rya mbere ryabatiza mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo gushika mu kinjana ca kabiri.-Hastings Encyclopedia of Religion, Volume 2 page 377– Handitse yuko ibatisimu yakorwa mugukoresha amajambo “Mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo” gushika mu gihe ca Justin Martyr, ku rupapuro rwa (page) 389.-Catholic Encyclopedia, Volume 2, page 263 – Ngaha abanditsi bose baremeza yuko kubatiza mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo vyahinduwe na Kiliziya Katolika.-Schaff – Herzog Religious Encyclopedia, Volume 1, page 435 – Haranditse yuko Isezerano rishasha ryose ryemeza umubatizo mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo wonyene.-Hastings Dictionary of Bible, page 88 – Yanditse yuko umuntu wese ategerezwa kumenya yuko rirya zina ririmwo atatu ryo muri [Matayo 28:19] ritigezwe rikoreshwa mw’ishengero ryatanguye kw’isi. title: Isabato Yera n’Isangira Ryera: mwame mwubaha ivyagezwe vy’Uhoraho.
content:
Ibgirizwa ry’Imana n’ijambo ryose ryahumetswe n’Imana ryoba ari iryanditswe muri Bibiliya canke iryahishuwe na Mpwemu Yera. Imana itategetse gukora ikintu ntimugukore muba mucumuye.

Nk’uko mubizi kandi mwabiteguye, mwame mugendera ku rutonde rw’Uhoraho Imana mutaretse ngo ibasige muyihendere inyuma canke ngo muyisige muyigendere imbere. Mwame mwiyubara kugira ngo mugendane n’Imana.

title: Ijambo ry’Imana rirabuza abizera kwita abantu ba se mu Mpwemu bakabikorera ico.
content:
Hariho ibintu vyinshi ubona mw’isi y’ impwemu ugatahura yuko abizera binjiranywe na satani ntibabimenye. Ijambo ry’Uhoraho Imana rivuze ryihanikiriza abantu kudakora ikintu kuko ari kibi, baca bagikorera ico kandi bakagishimangira.

Mur’iyi minsi uzokwumva mu mashengero yitwa ay’abakizwa bavuga ngo « DADDY » Semama yote! Igisha ! Vugishwa! Preach! Prophetise ! Abantu bose bakabigira agahararo ( umudeli) mu mashengero iwabo ukamengo ntibazi yuko bariko barakorera ivyaha mw’ishengero.

Vyatanguye kera aho katolika yinjiza bikiramariya mu bumana muri kiliziya. Ni naho ivyo kwita abantu b’inyama n’amaraso ba so vyatanguriye. Ngo Papa, Padiri, Father, Père, Data, Daddy,… ivyo vyose abizera bakwiriye kumenya iyo izo mpwemu zituruka.

Mu cete intumwa Pawulo yandikiye Timoteyo yamwise umuhungu wiwe, ubgambere kubera yari akiri muto mu myaka y’amavuka, ubugira kabiri yari akiri muto mugakiza kuko yariko aramumenyereza. [1Timoteyo 1:2] Pawulo yarise abana biwe na Onesimu [Filemoni 1:10] na Tito [Tito 1:4], ariko amasinzi n’amasinzi yose yabariye (yavyaje) ubutumwa bose ntabita abana biwe. Ijambo umwana yarikoresha kubo akunda kandi bakoranye imirimo y’Imana nk’uko n’uyu munsi umuntu akuze ashobora kwira urwaruka ariko arigisha, abo ariko aramenyereza abana biwe kubgo urukundo abafitiye. Ivyo ntaco bisa bisana no kwita umuntu w’ inyama n’amaraso so wo mu mpwemu. Ntugakore ico caha.

title: Isirayeli ya 1 yaratewe kenshi kubera kutumvira, Isirayeli ya 2 ihigire icigwa.
content: Agataka ka Isirayeli kamye kabamwo Abayuda kuva mu myaka yi 2000 imbere yuko Yesu Kristo avuka (IK). Imana niyo yabahaye aho kuba kuv’ico gihe.1900 IK: Aburahamu yatoranijwe n’Imana ngo abe se w’iryo hanga.1900 IK: Isaka, Umuhungu wa Aburahamu yabaye umurongozi wa Isirayeli.1850 IK: Jakobo, umuhungu wa Issac, aba umurongozi wa Isirayeli.1400 IK: Mose akura aba Isirayeli muri Egiputa abasubiza iwabo muri Isirayeli.1010 IK: Umwami Davidi yunze imiryango 12 y’Abisirayeli abagira Ihanga rimwe.970 IK: Umwami Solomo, umuhungu wa David, yubatse urusengero rwa mbere rw’Abisirayeli I Yersalemu.930 IK: Israyeli yagabuwemwo ubgami bubiri, ubgami bga Isirayeli n’ubgami bgi Buyuda.800 IK: Hahagurutse abahanuzi bafise ubutumwa bg’Uhoraho Imana.722 IK: Ubgami bg’Abisirayeli bunyagwa n’aba-Assyria.605 IK: Ubgami bg’Abayuda bunyagwa n’abanye Babuloni.586 IK: Urusengero rwaSolomo rwasenyuwe n’abanye Babuloni.539 IK: Abanye Perse banyaga ubgami abanya Babuloni kandi bihagira na Isirayeli.538 IK: Abayuda basubijwe muri Isirayeli bavuye mu mahanga.520 IK: Urusengero rwasubiriye kwubaka I Yerusalemu.450 IK: Ezra na Nehemiya baranaguye ibitari bike.433 IK: Malakiya asozera imyaka y’ubuhanuzi.432 IK: Umugwi wanyuma w’abayuda utaha uvuye mu mahanga.333 IK: Abagiriki bihagira inganzabami y’abanya Perse.323 IK: Inganzabami y’Abanyegiputa n’Abasiriya yihagira Isirayeli.167 IK: Aba Hasmoni bihagira Isirayeli, Abayuda barongorwa kwabo.70 IK: Aba Romani bihagira Israyeli.20 IK: Umwami Herodi yubaka urusengero ubugira gatatu.6 IK: Yesu Kristo avukira i Betehemu. Imyaka iharurwa Yesu Kristo Aravutse(KA)70 YA: Aba Romani basenyura urusengero.Inyuma y’aho, hari abajanywe nk’inyagano n’Abaromani, aba Byzantine, ab’Arabu, n’intambara z’imisaraba zakozwe na kiliziya Katolika; mugabo muri isirayeli bagumye bahaba gushika mu mwaka wi 1948 (YA) ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryemeje igihugu ca ISIRAYELI, Ihanga ry’Abayuda.

title: Abarundi bagiye gushikirwa n’ivyo batinya kubera bataye Imana bakayivuga ku munwa gusa.
content:
Uhoraho Imana yo mw’ijuru n’Imana itameze nk’izindi mana zizwi mw’isi. Yo ni Imana Uyivuze mw’izina yumva ikumviriza ico ugira uvuge hanyuma ikakwishura.

Abarundi icaha ca mbere bakoze n’uko bama bayivuze bakayivuga ku karimi gusa kandi ntihagire n’amajambo meza bavuga. Bakavuga yuko bayishize imbere mugabo bakayihakanisha ibikorwa vyayo. Ico ni icaha abarongozi bakoze kandi kigiye gutuma Imana ikubita abungere maze intama zisanzare. [Matayo 26:31]

Ivyaha bindi bikorwa n’abategetsi b’igihugu ni ubusambanyi, ukuragiza, ukurogana, ubusuma, ukwimbana mu mizi, urwanko, ugusukana, ukwipfurizanira ibibi n’ukubesha abenegihugu ngo babitayeho kandi bitayeho inyungu zabo gusa.

Ng’ivyo ivyaha bikuru bikuru Uhoraho Imana agira abahore kubera yuko banse kubiheba ngo bihane.

title: Le Burundi vers la recolonization par le Vatican. Quelle erreur!
content:
Une commission mixte Église catholique et Gouvernement se penche sur la mise en application de l’ Accord Cadre entre le Saint Siège et la République du Burundi sur les matières d’intérêt communque sont: Santé, Éducation, Associations des Laïcs , Développement….Pour rappel, cet Accord cadre ratifié il y a plus de 10 ans, feu président Nkurunziza n’a jamais voulu ou eu la volonté de le mettre en application. Le Président Evariste Ndayishimiye en difficulté dans la gestion du Burundi cherche un soutien de l’Eglise Catholique. Faut-il avoir un espoir qu’il en sortira une voie de sortie de la crise Socio politico économique et sécuritaire ? La composition de la commission mixte apporte une réponse. C’est non car tout se décide au sein du cercle restreint du CNDD-FDD qui n’est pas représenté dans la dite commission par de vrais décideurs. Le président Evariste Ndayishimiye cherche à faire des yeux doux à l’Eglise Catholique juste pour avoir le soutien de cette dernière fortement influente au Burundi. La situation de crise ne changera pas pour autant. Les Burundais continueront à souffrir comme ils sont aujourd’hui suite à la gestion avec une très grande légèreté du Burundi, à l’incompétence notoire des décideurs de premier rang, au manque de vision et à la crise de leadership visionnaire, empathique, compétent, rassembleur, patriote, responsable.

Les burundais doivent savoir prendre la destinée de leur avenir en mains propres.
