title: Umukuru w’Inama nshingamateka yavuze ibihushane bikomeye
content:
Abarundi benshi baritiranya kuba umunye politike no kuba umubeshi canke mahindagu. Ico ni ikimenyetso ku bantu baba batazi iyo bariko baratwara igihugu. Ibi bifatiye ku cegeranyo wa mugwi w’igihugu CVR wama uriko uratanga. Ubgambere warakoze icegeranyo, inama nshingwamateka n’inama nkenguzamateka ziremeza yuko mu Burundi mu mwaka wa 1972 habaye ihonyabgoko. Mu cegeranyo naco carawe gitanzwe, uwo mukuru w’inama nshingwamateka yivugiye ngo leta y’Uburundi nisabe imbabazi ku mabi yakozwe mu 1972. Iyo mvugo ikaba ifahuye n’iyaambere.

Umuhinga umwe yaciye yandika at: Abatwara igihugu c’Uburundi womengo ntibazi iyo bariko barerekeza igihugu.

Hariho amayeri menshi yo kizimanganya ihonyabgoko harimwo no guhenda Leta ngo yasavye imbabazi mu kibanza c’abarikoze canke kuryita ubgicanyi busanzwe. Abarongozi b’igihugu cacu barakora akantuk’ubusamazicanke ko gusamaza Abarundi nko kuvuga ngo:

Ibintu vyo guca iruhande ukuri burya bizokwega akarambaraye mu gihugu. Abarundi barakeneye inzira yo kuva muvyo baciyemwo kugira ngo bahangane n’ibindi bibazo bihanze urunganwe rw’uyu munsi. Uko baguma bazunguruka iruhande y’umuti w’ ubgicanyi bakanapfukapfuka ibi na biriya niko baguma begereza ubundi bgicanyi bubishe kandi nabo nyene butazobaziganya naho batabibona. Ico kibazo gikwiriye kuba mu nzira.

title: Ubutumwa bg’abenegihugu ku barongozi b’Uburundi
content:
Mu kiyago Abarundi bagiranira bariko barayaga, hariho uwo base bakunze ivyiyumviro vyiwe kandi barabishigikira mbere barahava basaba yuko hari uwoshikana ubutumwa bgabo imbere. Yari yagize ati: »Hariho abagenzi banje batumvikanye kubera impavu zidakenewe ko ndazivugira ngaha.Umwe ngo yabwiye uwundi ati:<< Jewe nahawe n’umutwe wanje wewe reka kumpohotera wahawe nuko uzi kurasa gusa>>.Uravye akahise tuvuyemwo abazi kurasa badukuye habi kuko igisoda categerezwa gukungwa nikindi. Ntawobibatuka. Igisoda kizana umutekano. Mugabo ntigifasha kwiyumvira iterambere. Iterambere rizanwa nabiyumvira kugira abenegihugu bongereze umwimbu, bagire amagara mazima, amabarabara meza, aho abantu baba heza, guteza imbere ikigega ca Reta biciye mu ma taxes n’ibindi nibindi.Iterambere ritangurira k’undongozi mu mitwe ipanze kandi bakunda igihugu. Ngukunda igihugu, kubwanje s’amajambo, gukunda igihugu n’ugukunda abenegihugu. Uwupanze kwironderera akanoti naho womuha ibigana gute ntaterambere azana? Abahutu bafashije kuzana amazi iwabo, amatara bangana gute? Nibaza ko ari bake.

Ntiwogendera mu kimodoka kinin uca mw’i mabarabar ryaboze, ntitwobura imbuto zirobanuye ukora muri ISABU, umbwire ko uri incabwenge. Incabwenge nyayo niyiduza abandi basagiye gupfa nugukira.

Amashure araguha ubumenyi mugabo ntakwigisha ubwenge. Utagiye mw’ishure naho wogira ubwenge ukagira ubumenyi buke ntushobora kubona kure: vyose ni magirirane. Uwutinze menshi akora ivyashoboye igihugu iyo gipanze. Jewe nibaza ko arizo ngorane dufise ubu kubera akahise k’abahutu bagumye baganzwa. La gestion de la rébellion est en principe différente de la gestion des affaires d’État et du développement. Ndazi neza ko tumaze kuronka abantu bafise ubumenyi bwo mw’ushure no hanze yaryo, n’ubwenge bwo kubaho (l’intelligence) abo nibo dukwiye gushira imbere kugira batubere indongozi. Abandi bakore ivyo bashoboye.

Umwihwezo: Ibintu bimeze uko biri uyu munsi kubera yuko mwirukanye incabgenge maze mutangura gukora ibitari ivyiwanyu. Abantu bose bakwiriye gukora ivyo bigiye, umwe wese mu buhinga, mu mwuga yanonosoye akongerako ubuntu n’urukundo rw’igihugu.

title: Ijwi rya Goliyati rigiye kuzimabgana mu matwi y’Abarundi
content:
IJWI RYA GOLIYATI.

« Nuk’ uwo Mufilisitiya, uko bukeye uko bgije, akama aseruka ahibonekeza, abasomboroza, kumara imisi mirongwine.1 Samweli 17:16″

Uyo dusomye ni ikigatanya bita Goliyati.Yari umurwanyi w’umuhizi wo mubwoko bw’abafilisitiya.Yar’ikigatanya giteye ubwoba kuburyo amajambo yiwe yo gusomborotsa abisilayeri yatuma bihebura,n’umwami sawuli nawe akihebura.« 1samweli 17:11 »

Twasomye ngo « uko bukeye uko bwije,uyo mufilisitiya yama aseruka ahibonekeza,abasomboroza,kumara imisi mirongwine ».

Uko niko ijwi rya Goliyatimubuzima bwacu rimera.Goliyati ni igicantege.Nk’uko yaseruka kubisirayeli uko bukeye(mugitondo),n’uko bwije(kumugoroba),ninako abadayimoni b’urucantege bakunda kubigenza n’ubu.Baza mugitondo(wikanguye ukumva wibukijwe ikibazo kikuremereye,ukavyuka wihebuye),bakongera bakaza uko bwije(kukagoroba),kugira ngo uryamane ukwiganyira,ukwihebura.

Ayo majwi y’abadayimoni,aza mugatondo kugira atume wirirwa ubihiwe,akagaruka kukagoroba kugira urare ubihiwe wiganyira.

Ikindi,Goliyati ntiyaserutse rimwe canke kabiri canke gatatu,yabikoze imisi mirongwine yose.1samweli 17:16″.

Bivugwa ko iyo ikintu ugikoze imisi mirongwibiri n’umwe gihinduka akamenyero,amadayimoni rero ivyo arabizi.Abisirayeli kumara imisi mirongwine bihebura,biganyira,vyari vyageze igihe kwiganyira aba aribwo buzima babayeho.Nk’uko n’ubu,bitewe n’ikibazo umuntu amaranye igihe atagisubizo,kwiganyira usanga vyaramuhindukiye ubuzima,kubw’ijwi rya Goliyati(ry’abadayimoni b’urucantege).

Ariko rero, ijwi rya goliyati ntawoshobora kuricecekesha we ubwiwe,kubwo ugutahura canke kubwo kwiremesha.Uzosanga n’iyo ubigerageje bidakunda,rirongera rikagaruka.

Ibihumbi vy’abisilayeri bari kumwe n’umwami wabo,ntivyakunze ko ijwi ry’uwo mufilisitiya ritabatera kwihebura bose.Umwe wenyene niwe yabishoboye.Dawidi niwe yatesheje agaciro ijwi rya Goliyati,kubw’Imana yiwe.

Ijwi rya Goliyati ntakindi kiricecekesha,ricecekeshwa gusa n’umuntu ashikamye mukwizera Imana yiwe.

Dawidi vyarangiye anesheje goliyati,ariko ntiyabishobojwe n’ubuhizi asanganywe,canke n’abamutera intege,yabishobojwe n’ukwizera Imana,bituma nayo imanuka,iramushigikira,iramuneshereza.N’ubu niko bikimeze,Goliyati aguca intege azotsindwa n’ikwizera Imana yawe.

Umwami Yesu Kristo yamamare hose.

title: Abarundi baguma bubakira igihugu cabo ku manga y’amoko, ibinyoma, ukubesheranira, ubusuma, ugupfungana….
content:
Uburundi ntibushobora gutera imbere Abarundi ubgabo badahindutse ngo n’uburongozi buhari ngo buhinduke. Mu gihugu hariho abari imbere y’abandi badafise imbono y’igihugu muri kazoza, n’iyo bayivuze bakabivuga ku karimi gusa kuko ibikorwa vyabo vyerekana yuko ataho Uburundi bgoshika.

Abantu benshi bashira imbere igitsure, ingimba n’ububisha nk’uko aribgo buhizi; bakibagira yuko urukukundo, ubuntu n’ubugwaneza arivyo vyonyene bashobora kwubakirako igihugu c’iteka.

Abandi bigisha urwanko, amacakubiri n’ukwisahiriza hagati yabo gushika naho uwushizwe mu mabanga aca yibaza yuko ba mushize mu kibanza co gusahura no gutemvya igihugu ku rwenge.Ku bantu bakunda gushira ubgoko canke amaronko imbere, hari uwatubariye yukoUbgoko bubi bgihonyakandi twese turazi yukoUwohora imbga gusutama yozimara zose. Aho yariko arishura uwavuze ngo ni bice ibihemu biri mu bahutu canke biri mu batutsi nk’uko imvugo z’abantu ziri.Umuhinga w’umurundi umwe yagize ati:“Nibaza yuko muri iki gihugu cacu c’Uburundi tudakeneye kwica ababi, kwica abagwaye mu mutwe canke kwica ibihemu. Jewe ndaba iyo twavuye ( ubgicanyi bgabaye bikorwa hagati y’abatutsi n’abahutu, n’ubgakozwe hagati y’abahutu bicana ubgabo kuva mu mirwi irwana mw’ishamba gushika bamaze no gushika mu gihugu), nogira nti kirazira gusubira kwica mwenewanyu umuhoye icarico cose harimwo n’ububi bgiwe. Uti kuki? Nokwishura nti ni nde ari mwiza ko twese tuzinanye!Ico sico nagomba kuvuga ariko. Nagomba gushika kur’iki:»Kubera ibihe igihugu caciyemwo, ingene twakuze, ivyo twakuriyemwo n’ivyo turimwo ubu, Abarundi bakwiriye kwigishwa, kurerwa, gutunganywa no kubohorwa kugira ngo igihugu kigire amatanguriro mashasha mu ndero, mu butungane, mu kibano, mu butunzi, mu ntwaro,… »Ivyo vyo gukubura, gufyeta, gusafisha,… bizomara abo mwari mukwiriye gukingira kuko habuze urufatiro n’ivyitegererezo ku masinzi y’abarundi.Ngira nti muzi igisumanyenzi mu buryo bg’impwemu kiri mu gihugu kubera (a) bahowe ubusa, ubgoko bgabo bakicwa nabi bagatabga mu mashamba n’ibinogo rusangi, (b) abana bakuze arimpfuvyi, barerwa n’abapfakazi, bakuriye mu buhunzi babona abandi babayeho neza, (c) Abantu bakuze bazi yuko ubuzima ari ukwibako, ugukora ikibi, ugusahura, ukubesha,… kugira ngo igihugu gikire hakeneye ubuhinga, impinyanyuro, ukuvura imitima n’abantu bafise ishaka atari ugukubura.

Umuntu ashitse ku butegetsi adafise imbono y’igihugu, aca arondera  babahanuzi ico bamubariye kikaba ico. Ntazi kwiyumvira ngo ahitemwo iciza n’ikibi, mbere kenshi aca aja mu banyamafaranga canke bamwe bagumije igihugu mw’ihumbi akaba aribo bamubera abahanuzi. Bagize bati:

title: Imburi ku Barundi: Hagira habe ikintu giteye ubgoba hanyuma haze impore itari bgigere ibaho
content: Umumarayika w’Uhoraho yongeye abonekera uwundi mukozi w’Imana aramubgarira ati:“Ubu nyene, hagira habe ikintu giteye ubgoba mu gihugu, kizokurikirwa n’ibindi bibi vyinshi ku buryo abariko ikimenyetso co gupfa bose bicwe kuko inkota y’Uhoraho irabanguye. Ivyo birangiye hazoba umunezero udasanzwe, aho atawuzoba akirira ngo arakenye, ngo arashonje, muzobaho mu amahoro, mu mutekano, murye muhage, mubeho neza, mube aho mushaka, murye ivyo mushaka, nta nzara, nta n’ubukene.Maze muzotamba munezerwe, mutazire Imana yabakuye mu bihe bigoye muti warakoze Mana, integuro yawe Mana ni nzoza. Muzoba mw’Ishengero ryiza muzokoraniramwo ata mpwemu mbi izoba irimwo, ata ba dayimoni bava i kuzimu bazongera kugaruka mur’iy’isi kubatera kuko Imana izoba yavumuye , igahezagira ikongera ikaza kwibanira n’ubgoko bgayo mur’iki gihugu.Hazoba umunezero mu rusengero, nzoba ndikumwe namwe mutazire Imana munezerewe. Muzobgira abo mu bihugu vyo hanze mubahe inkuru zabaye mu Burundi kugira nabo bakizwe. Hazokizwa benshi kugira nabo ntibazohure n’ayo mahano hiyo murivyo bihugu bitandukanye nkayo Uburundi. Mu bihugu navyo bizofasha u Burundi, hazoza imfashanyo nyinshi, n’abakuru bari muri mwebwe bazokwirikirana iryo tunga riva mu bihugu vyo hanze kandi nta numwe azorisasagura kuko igitsure c’Imana kizoba kiri ku barongozi.Muzohora mutazire Imana ngo uri mwiza Mana, warakoze kuko watuzigamye mu bihe bikomeye cane, kumwe wajabutsa abanyegiputa, waratujabukije Mana ikiyagagitukura, warakoze kudushikana muri Kanani yo mw’isi, mu Burundi bg’Isezerano, warakoze.”Uwo mu malayika w’Uhoraho ahejeje kuvuga ivyo yaciye yigira, uwo mukozi w’Imana asigara wenyene, aca aravyandika, Amen!

title: Imana iraje gushitsa isezerano ku gihugu no kw’ishengero ry’Uburundi
content: Hanga Ryera ry’Imana mwihanye mukezwa mukaba murindiriye isezerano ry’igihugu co mw’ijuru n’isezerano ry’igihugu c’Uburundi, Umumarayika w’Uhoraho yururutse kuvugana n’abo yatoranije agira ati: « Iryavuzwe riratashe, Ihanga ry’abera rigire rishike muri ya masezerano y’igihugu n’ishengero mwahora mwumva. »Yongeyeko ati: « Mugira mwinjire muri ca gihugu mudatevye. Ni musomere Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana ryose ZABURI ya 45 yose bamenye igihugu binjiyemwo»Ati: « Ko mwasemereye ngo bihane bakanka kwumva, nguyo umumarayika murimbuzi aragabirije, ari kwirembo ryabo kandi agira akore icamuzanye. Mweho ni mwunwa amarira n’amaborogo, muze mwihorere. Ni mwumva inkuba zasirana, mukabona, mukabona imiravyo n’imisozi ipfunduka umwotsi muze mumenye yuko n’imivo iriko iratemba. Umwe wese aze agumye ico yakiriye, asenge kuko ni iryavuzwe rishitse, amen »

title: Abarundi barahahamutse, bakeneye abarongozi babahumuriza atarababatera ubgoba.
content:
Burya n’uko Abarundi twamenyereye kworosha ibintu. Iki kibazo c’Abarundi bahunga igihugu kiva no ku burongozi bubi,, kirahambaye cane. Ubonye umwenegihugu arinze ahitamwo (1) gutekera agashambara (2) gusohoka inzu yiwe akayugara (3) akagenda ( kwomoka) abundabunda ahungira mukindi gihugu, kugira ngo aje kuba muri turi turya dukambi tw’impunzi n’abana biwe.Ivyo bintu ntitukabifate ibisanzwe. Haba hariho umururazi uri mu mitima y’abantu, utaravye uburemere bg’imvo bavuga. Barinze bavuga umutekano muke, inzara n’ibiciro bibandanya biduga izo mvo zirakwiriye kugira ngo umenye icuka kiri mu gihugu naho benshi babirenza amaso.

A. Mu minsi iheze twarabonye imirongo y’urwaruka rurondera impapuro z’inzira ngo rwomokere mu bihugu vyo hanze. Benshi twivugiye ngo ni bagende kwagura akarere igihugu caraze. Iyo ni imvugo y’abategetsi batagira intumbero n’imbono y’igihugu (vision):-Kubera yuko urwaruka nirwo Burundi bg’ejo, nizo nguvu zigihugu. Nibo bakwiriye kwigishwa amashure y’ubgenge, amashure y’imyuga mbere n’uwuri hanze mu rwaruka rugakurwayo rukaza gukorera igihugu kugira ngo gitere imbere.

B. Imbere ya 2015, mwarumvise abantu benshi bahungiye mu bihugu bibanyi ngo bahunze kubera ubuhanuzi bgavuzwe n’umunyarwanda yitwa Gakwaya Bernard, abandi bavuga yuko bahunze inzara. Abatazi ubgo buhanuzi uko bgavuga bgagira buti:« Gen Adolph azokwica Président Petero Nkurunziza, abo kwa Président Petero Nkurunziza nabo bace bica Gen Adolph, intambara ice ihera aho »Hahunze hafi 120.000 mu gihe mu gihugu hari amahoro y’umudesekara. Uca ubona imitima y’Abarundi aho igeze. Abantu bakwiriye gusomorwa imitima.

title: Murashobora gutanga umuco ku bantu bishwe muri 2000 mwoshobora gutanga umuco ku bishwe mu binjana vyarangiye!
content:
Turakunze kubona amatangazo y’umugwi ushîzwe kunywanisha Abarundi no kurekuriranora uvugako uzogédera Abarundi bari mu gihugu iki canke mu ntara iyi y’igihugu bakegeranya ivyo abantu bavuga mugabo bikagarukira aho kuko n’icegeranyo batanze ku vyabaye muri 1972 kikemezwa n’inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka cabaye impfabusa. None ubgo butunzi mukomeza gukoresha n’ubg’iki?

Ubu uwo mugwi utanguye kwiga ivyashikiye Uburundi mu kinjana ca 17 na 18 kandi utanashobora gutanga umuco ukwiriye ku ngene Général Adolph Nshimirimana n’Umukuru w’igihugu Petero Nkurunziza bapfuye umwe mu 2015 uwundi mu 2020.

Hari uwanditse ati: Abantu benshi bibe tête mu kabirerwe k’ubutegetsi, amafaranga n’ivyubahiro gusa.Uwuraho yakunda kuvuga ngo arahabona ( ekenge) ba murashe mu jisho barya nyene ryaka riva mu karere yakuriyemwo. Niwe yazanye ivya kirapanze.Nta n’umuntu n’umwe n’ubu aramenya abamugandaguye n’ababatumye uko vyagenze kuko ababikoze nibo nyene botanze umuco.Uwundi nawe ngo yishwe n’uko umutima wahagaze, ukamengo haruwupfa umutima ukaguma ukora!None vy’ukuri Abarundi bazoguma babaho imyaka yose mur’ibi? Ku ntwaro za kera vy’aku no ku ntwaro zanyu tugume dukurikira ubgije !Abantu baguma bimbana, babesheranira, bicana, bapfungana, bangazanya n’ayandi mabi…Umwenegihugu agakubitirwa kwemera ivyarivyo vyose bije n’ivyo azi neza yuko ari inzira ataho ishika…! Beneco baguma bahunga bongera bagaruka atar’uko ibintu bitunganye mugabo kubera amagiro. Harakwiriye impinduka mu Barundi hakajaho abarongozi b’indyamunyu bahagararira ukuri, igihugu kikubakwa ku rutonde n’abanyamahanga bazipfuza kuza kwibera iwacu.

title: Inkuru ibabaje kuba généraux mu basirikare n’abapolisi bo mu Burundi
content:
Umviriza inkuru iraho y’umu général araho. Sinoyemeza kuko nivyo nabwiwe. Yoba ari inkuru igana akariho mi bahutu.Uwo mu Général yakuye mushikiwe ruguru amuzana kuba iwe. Aramurihira amashule aratsinda. Amaze gutsinda ararondera akazi arabura. Aho musaza we ntaco yamufashije muvyo kurondera akazi mugabo aguma amuha indaro nk’umwana mu rugo.Uwo mukobwa abonye yaburaniwe, musaza wiwe ari Général aguma amurabisha amaso, murazi ico yakoze? Umviriza uko vyagenze.Yaragiye afata CV yiwe ayiherekeza na lettre d’accompagnement. Ariga signature ya musaza wiwe neza arayisinya mw’izina ry’uwo musaza wiwe. Dossier ayijana ahantu. Bayibonye akazi barakamuhaye.Haheze iminsi musaza wiwe amubajije uko vyagenze aramubwira. Ngo ntaco yavuze.Ibaze namwe. Uwo mukobwa iyo aza kuba ari umu maîtresse wiwe ntaba yaramufashije kuva kera? Umuntu ananirwa kuronderera mushikiwe wumva hari murundi yofasha turetse kutwereka impete n »ubutunzi afise?Uwo muntu narabajije uwo yafashije kugira aduge, wapi!Tudahendanye kugira mwene wanyu adashobora kuduza abandi harico bifasha. Yaduze wenyene mu muryango kandi azovaho wenyene. Iyo ngeso siyo. Uwo mu Général ndindiriye ko akukuruka nzomwibarize ninaba nkihumeka ico yamariye abandi. Ubu sinomwubahuka yondugika mu mpimba. Umuhutu arungika uwundi, ananirwa kumufasha, gufungwa biroroha.

Umusomyi yagize ati: »Abo nibo imiliyoni 13 z’Abarundi zizeyeko urukiza! » Uwundi amwishura ati: « Haravumwe uwizigira umwana w’umuntu, urukiza rwacu ruri k’Uhoraho. »

Uwundi aca amwishura ati:

Uvuze ukuri nk’ukurima ariko Imana ikoresha abantu.Muri 1993 iyo tudahaguruka ngo duteshe abansi mukwemera gusesa amaraso yacu, gupfungwa, guca mu mahwa, mu bunyerere, kwemera gusonza no kugenda gusa, n’ubu umwana wanyu aba ameze nk’ivyana vy’ingurube mu gihugu ciwe.None Imana yarakoze kiracamwo ariko raba aho igihugu bakigejeje. Mwa bantu mwe! Birakwiriye kuva mu majambo bikaja mu ngiro tukikubata agashi.Inyuma y’imyaka 30 gusa kirasubiriye kuzungazunga.Reka tuje ku mavi tuzoveyo tugarukanye ijambo ry’ihumure.

title: Abarundi baranyazwe habura gitabara mu 1972 kandi n’ubu bakiriko
content:
Irabire amazu bagiriye rusansuma mu 1971 hanyu mu 1972 beneyo bakicwa uretse abaciye mu rw’imbga kazi bagahunga, bose ivyabo bikanyagwa urukombamazi. Impfuvyi n’abapfakazi bagasigara bipfumbereje. Aka gatabo k’impapuro 67 kanditsemwo amazina y’abantu banyazwe amazu, imiduga n’ibindi hakurikijwe intara, ama komine, amazone n’imitumba mu bidahara no mu gihugu hagati.

Abategetsi b’Uburundi aho gufata ibintu mu minwe ngo bubakire ku kuri ibintu vyose babishire mu kuri kuko ukuri kubohora baca birondera abahanuzi bataribo babasuka.

Hari uwanditse ati umuntu wacu ari ku butegetsi akaryoherwa n’ibirori niko bigenda. Aca arondera abamuryosharyosha babahanuzi ico bamubariye kikaba ico. Bagize bati:

1. Mu Burundi nta moko ahari nawe abisubiramwo uko nyene.

2. Abakoze ihonyabgoko barashaje nawe abisubiramwo uko nyene.

3. Ihangiro rya Leta yanyu si ukwemeza ihonyabgoko nawe abishikiriza uko nyene.

4. Fata Bunyoni niwe akorana n’aba FDRL, yanyegeje amafaranga, igitoro, isukari, ifumbire,… baramwimba mpaka bamwishe canke bamushize mwibuye.

5. Aba (déplacés) impuzi z’imbere mu gihugu ntaco zishe, abahungiye hanze nibo bavamwo imirwi itera igihugu, bibagira yuko aba déplacés aribo bakorana na sinduhije, bakiruka ku mpunzi ziri hanze.

Intwaro zacu umengo zifise ikirengeti ku maso ntitugomba kubona ukuri ngo tukwicarire gukize igihugu. Abantu beza bashobora kugira akamaro bigizwayo umwe wese akazana uwiwe bataravye ineza y’igihugu

title: Amakosa 10 yagirizwa Président Evariste NDAYISHIMIYE.
content:
Hariho Abarundi bakunda umukuru w’igihugu cacu c’Uburundi Evariste NDAYISHIMIYE. Mugabo nk’uko nawe nyene avyivugora, hariho n’abandi bamutorako amakosa muvyo akora n’ivyo avuga. Hari uwagize ati none ntafise abamuhanura bo muyagira ayavugwa, uwundi yagize ati haraho mwoca mubipfa ugahitamwo kwihorera. Amakosa 10 bamwagiriza rero ni ibi:

Umukuru w’igihugu canke uwundi muyobozi wese abikwiye, ntakwiye gushira ahabona ibishobisho vyiwe. Haba mu mvugo canke mu ngiro. Iyo bimeze uko, kenshi vyerekana ubwoba afise. Kutigirira icizere, tutibagiye kwerekana inguvu n’ubushobozi buke bimuranga mu kazi kiwe.

Umukuru w’igihugu adafata ingingo zibereye mu kanya zikenewe, ntaco aba amariye ico gihugu ayoboye. Ahubwo n’icago kidasanzwe. Bwa bwoba buranga NEVA, nibwo bwamugize igikanganyoni mu kibanza arimwo. Ni naco gituma avuga amajambo menshi kurusha ibikorwa vyo mwitirirwa. Ahandi, abakuru b’ibihugu biyubashe, bakwiye ico cubahiro, bavugisha amaboko kurusha umunwa. Ngira nico gituma bamutaziriye Kirogorogo.

Umugabo w’inganzwa ntanarimwe aba atekanye mu mutima canke mu mutwe. None yoyobora neza i gihugu gute? Neva iyaba yoshoboye kuhabera Umugabo abushitse, yotanze imihoho, agakinjura k’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu. Kuko iryo Shiga ryiwe rishobora kumukwegera akarambaraye, akabura imbwa n’imbwebwe. Araja muri kahise katari akakure cane, yiyibutse aho abatambukanyi ba Ben Ali (Tuniziya), Robert Mugabe (Zimbabwe) canke Ferdinand Marcos (Philippines) bashikanye ubutegetsi bw’abanega babo!

Kuyobora igihugu, s’umukino nka kurya abantu bakina ikibuguzo, amakarata canke batera agapira. Bisaba kuba ufise abahanuzi b’ijunja n’ijambo, bakunda i gihugu n’abakibamwo, bikura ijambo batariye umunwa. Umuyobozi adakikijwe n’imvugakuri, asa n’igitutu ciwe cibereye aho gusa. Uwo ni Neva ku gasozi. N’iwe yihera akazi abagenzi b’umuryango wiwe gusa. Ataravye ubumenyi n’ubushobozi bwabo. Adatandukanije ubuzi bwa poritike n’ubuzi bw’ubuhinga. Ingaruka yavyo, n’aha u Burundi bugeze unomusi.

Munyifato yiwe, NEVA afise ubunenge bukunda kugira abakeha bwenge benshi. Ntazi kwicisha bugufi. Ntazi kumviriza umuntu ngo ategere neza ivyo amubwiye. Canke ngo yishire mu kibanza c’abandi, kugira arabe ingene yotorera inyishu ibibazo bibahanze. Nuko adasiba gutuka abategetsi bamwe bamwe k’umugaragaro, yishavuje, imbere yabo batwara, ababwirako akazi kose bajejwe, agiye kukikorera! Mwumva aratahura neza amabanga ajanye n’intebe avyagiyemwo? Ntakuntu na kumwe yoba umutegetsi mwiza yitwara uko.

Kuyobora igihugu n’ibanga rikomeye, utegerezwa kubangira ingata. Bikenewe uracigura. Vyanka, ugatanga imihoho, kugira ntubandanye uba isoko ry’umwaku n’akaga mu gihugu. Muri bwa bujuju bumuranga, Neva yironderera amaronko yiwe gusa n’umuryango wiwe. Ninavyo bimutuma agaya abarundi bimwe birenze urugero. Ukamengo abamwumviriza n’abamuraba, nibo batagira ubwenge! Amatongo y’ikebera mu gihugu cose, kenshi akoresheje igitugu, amazu agura mu gisagara ca Bujumbura muma miriyari atarazwe na se canke yatsinze muri LONA, akayagura atumye abandi bantu bamwegereye, amahera atoza ku nguvu mubikorera utwabo, abarundi canke abanyamahanga bakeyi basigaye bataromoka, birasigura neza ubusambo bumuranga. Ubu atunze kurusha inzego zose z’igihugu ziri hamwe. Hari uguhemuka gusumba uko?

Kuva yaramutswa igihugu, Neva yariyugaranye mu Burundi, nka kumwe kuwahoze ari Sekuru, aherutse kwikokomora. N’ubwo akunda gufata ingendo hanze y’igihugu, ni gake cane amaze kuja mu gihugu bamutumiye, kugira banagure canke bakomeze umubano mwiza hagati y’u Burundi nico gihugu. Aja mu manama batumira ikivunga abakuru b’ibihugu, nawe arimwo. Cokimwe nabitwa ko bagendeye u Burundi. Abandi baza kunyungu zabo, kenshi zidahuye neza n’izacu nk’abarundi. Bidasigura ko baba bashigikiye reta ya Neva.

Igihe Neva yafata i gihugu, yazanye icivugo gitangaje, « reta vyeyi, reta nkozi. » Arongerako ati « umufuko wose uronke amahera, umunwa wose uronke icurya. » Umuntu aravye agaheza u Burundi bugezemwo, Neva akaguma acira izo nkonda imbere y’abarundi bigorewe ay’ikivumvu, umuntu abisomamwo akagaye katagira izina. N’ugucurira abarundi bishwe n’ubukene, inzara n’agahinda, bitewe ahanini n’ubutegetsi bubi bumaze igihe. Niyo abarundi bose bopfa bagahera, Neva n’abiwe bagasigara, biraturaba twenyene. None tuzokwiyahura tubona gushika ryari? Asigaye abwira abarundi ko turi ibijuju, yaheza tugakoma amashi. N’inde yaturoze kweri?

Umuntu aravye ubukene, imyikomo n’agahinda biranga inzego nkuru z’igihugu, yokwibaza iyo u Burundi bugana, mugihe cose Neva azoba aburamutswa? Haba munzego z’Ubutungane, Igisirikare, Igiporisi, Igendereza, Reta, Inamashingamateka, Nkenguzamateka, tutibagiye mu bimenyeshamakuru, vyaba ivya reta canke ivyigenga, vyose bimeze nk’igiti catewe n’umuswa. Neva abikora nkana, yabiteguye. Ivyo abikora kugira izo nzego ntizimushengeze canke ngo zisubize Ibintu mu buryo. Abari murivyo bisata bihambaye mu buzima bw’igihugu, ntaho bataniye n’abandi barundi isinzi babuze ayo bacira nayo bamira, kubera ubwo butegetsi bubi, budashoboye kubaka ikintu na kimwe kizima, kirama. Ubutegetsi bubesha ngo bwashize imbere Imana, kandi umengo bwihaye Sekibi.

Abarundi batari musi y’umuriyoni, ubu babarizwa mu mvuto ataco bazira, mu buhungiro hanze y’igihugu, canke barataye akaranga kabo nk’abarundi, bitorera kwibera inyuma yicabibarutse, imisi yose basigaje kw’isi. Ako n’agahombo kadasanzwe ku Burundi. Nyaburya murabo bantu, hagwiriyemwo urwaruka n’izindi ncabwenge zikomeye. Bamwe bashobora guterera agacumu k’ubumwe, mubijanye n’ukubogora u Burundi, abarundi bagasubizwa izina n’iteka mu makungu.

Umuntu abiravye neza, ikosa ntirikiri irya Neva n’abo bafatanije mu gucura bufuni na buhoro igihugu cacu n’abakibamwo. Ibintu bibandanyije uku, tuzoba twakunze aya mahano reta ya Neva yadushizemwo. Hariko hararengerana cane ko u Burundi butabagwa. Ntihagire rero uwo dusubira gutako ishavu.

Ubutegetsi mugusenyuka, hakoreshwa ababurimwo, bakaza barafata gihuti huti, ingingo bazi nezako arizo gutoteza umuntu muto.

Intumbero yizo ngingo kuba ari ukugira abenegihugu baje mumwiheburo, kugira umwe murabo ariko arafata izo gingo ababgiye ati ja mwibaraba canke fata ibigwanisho, dukureho abo babarenganya bace bavyumva ningoga

Ariko Rindira turabe ayo BUYENZI, BWIZA, JABE, NYAKABIGA…bagiye kubona

title: Umupolisi w’igihugu yafashwe arapfungwa kubera yavuze ukuri
content:
Umupolisi Jérôme Niyonkuru araye ijoro rya kane mu gasho muri PJ. Bibiliya yiwe n’akadarapo agendana barabimwatse.

Uyu musi inyuma y’umutaga Caporal de Police Chef Jérôme Niyonkuru yarengutse irya mbere imbere y’inyamiramabi (OPJ) kuri Police Judiciaire (PJ). Bwari ubwambere arengutswa kuva afashwe ku wagatanu uheze. Jérôme Niyonkuru yanditsweko icaha co « gutyoza inzego z’igihugu ». Bamubwiye ko ejo azoja kuburana ariko ntibamumenyesheje aho azoburana nk’uko twabimenyeshejwe na bamwe mu nzego z’umutekano.

Abipfuza gushigikira umuryango wa Caporal-chef Jérôme Niyonkuru mushobora guca kuri Ecocash : (+257) 71 548 639. Iyo nomero yanditswe kuri Niyonkuru Jérôme.

Ifatwa rya Jérôme Niyonkuru ryagenze gute ?

Caporal-chef Jérôme Niyonkuru yafashwe ku wagatanu uheze (4.8.2023) ahejeje gutanga ubutumwa ku bapolisi bagenziwe ko bohagarika kurya ibiturire kubera Imana itemera abarya ibiturire. Umwe mu babikurikiranye yaduhaye ido n’ido ryavyo :

« Ahajeje kuvuga ubutumwa baciye bamufata bamwuriza imodoka y’igipolisi, bamucungisha abapolisi batatu, bamujana ku bitaro vy’abagwaye mu mutwe benshi bita kwa Legentil kugira bamusuzume ko yoba akomeye. Bagezeyo, kubera abaganga bari bamaze kumenya ayo makuru yiwe, ntibavyitayeho ivyo kumupima. Abamujanye bahava bararambirwa basubira inyuma. Bamushikanye mu gipolisi, baramwatse ibikoresho vyose vy’akazi, hanyuma bamwinjiza agasho kuri PJ. Ico gihe ntibamweretse umutahe umufata kandi ntibamubwiye icaha yakoze. Mwomenya kandi ko abamufashe bamutwaye Bibiliya yiwe be n’akadarapo yahora yama agendana. Ku bijanye n’akazi, kugeza ubu nta canditse kirasohoka kumwirukana mu gipolisi. Uyu musi inyuma y’umutaga niho yahavuye yumvirizwa na OPJ aca yandikwako gutyoza inzego z’igihugu. Ariko ni nde atazi mu Burundi ko abapolisi barya ibiturire ? Abategetsi bamaze kubivuga bangana gute ? »

Inkuru y’ifatwa rya Caporal-chef Jérôme Niyonkuru irababaje abarundi benshi mu mihingo yose y’isi. Ni benshi babandanya kutwandikira ko bipfuza kumufasha. Ijambo yavuze ni abarundi benshi baryiyumvamwo kubera baruhijwe n’ibiturire.

Imana ibandanye kumurinda.

Inomero ku bashaka gushigikira umuryango wa Jérôme Niyonkuru :Ecocash : 71 548 639 yanditswe kuri Jérôme Niyonkuru.Lumicash : 69 971 056 yanditswe kuri Jérôme Niyonkuru.

Uko abantu bo vyita kwose n’amategeko bovuga ngo barakurikiza yose, igihugu cacu gitunganijwe nabi kuva mu mitima yabantu gushika mu butegetsi bgabo.

title: Ubushikiranganji bg’indero mu Burundi burahangitse.
content:
Bigenda gute ngo igihugu gifise inzego zikwiriye gihangike indero yo mu mashure yaco imyaka n’iyindi ikarengana, leta igatanga uburyo bukwiriye abana ntibige bishemeye kandi hakabaho ibihumbi n’ibihumbagiza vy’abigisha bahembga batabaho imyaka n’iyindi! Akamaramaza nagasanze mu gihugu cacu.

Nk’uko biri mu nkuru yaciye ku rubuga ubushikiranganji bw’indero bwatangaje ko bufise abakozi ibihumbi mirongo umunani (80.000 enseignants)

Muri abo 80.000 harimwo ibihumbi bitatu (3.000) bahembwa badakora, n’abandi 300 bafise matricule imwe, 440 bafise numéro ya téléphone imwe, 570 bafise numéro ya karangamuntu imwe, 40.000 bafise numéro ya compte imwe

Dukoze ibiharuro dusanga ubushikiranganji bw’indero busigarana abakozi 80.000-(3.000+300+440+570+40.000)= 35.690

Muri babakoziibihumbi mirongo umunani bose (80.000 enseignants) abari kukivi ni ibihumbi mirongo itatu na bitanu n’amajana atandatu na mirongo icenda (35.690 enseignants)

Muti none abo bandi ibihumbi mirongo ine na bine n’amajana atatu na cumi (44.310 enseignants) bari hehe???

Inyishu:Abo 44.310 ntibabaho.

A. Muti yakozwe na bande??B. Vyagenze gute??

Inyishu

A. Vyakozwe n’abo muriministère de la fonction publique, hamwe n’utundi tugwi tuva mu bushikiranganji butandukanyekuko ayo manyanga ari mu bushikiranganji nka bwose

B. Mu kubikora babikora uku gukurikira:

Buri mwaka musanzwe muzi ko ubushikiranganji bw’indero butanga akazi ku bigisha bashasha n’imiburiburi abigisha igihumbi.Muri ico gihumbi ministère de la fonction publique ica iha nk’abigisha 200 canke 300 hanyuma abo 700 canke 800 basigaye bakaba abacishwa kuruhande mbere bakitwa ko bari kukivi kumbe ntibanabaho.

Ugasanga ubushikiranganji bw’indero bwama bwatanze ivyegeranyo ko hariho ikena ry’abigisha ariko ugerageje kuraba igitigiri c’abigisha gihari ugasanga barira busema.

Igituma usanga umengo barira busema n’iki gikurikira:

Ufashe ca gitigiri c’abakozi bibaza ko bahari (80.000) ugaca n’imiburiburi umwigisha umwe umuha abanyeshure 60 usanga mu Burundi hoba hari abanyeshure imiriyoni zine n’ibihumbi amajana atandatu (4.600.000 élèves). Harya twakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo kuko harihó n’ishure rimwe usanga rigizwe n’abanyeshure 150.

Aho abiga za kaminuza ntibarimwo

Mu vy’úkuri uca ubona ko igihugu cahatikiriye kubwo kwibwa.

Muti none igihugu coba kihahombera amafaranga angana gute?

Dufashe ko umukozi umwe ahēmbwá make yoba ahēmbwá 250.000 tukagwiza na babakozi 44.310 dusanga igihugu gihombaimiriyaridi icumi n’umwe n’imiriyoni mirongo indwi n’indwi n’ibihumbi amajana atanu : 11.077.500.000Fbu)buri kwezi.

Tutibagiye ko aho abahembwa ayarenga 500.000 Ari nka bose.

None ga muvyeyi wacu Evariste Ndayishimiye ubu wokora ibishoboka vyose aya mahera igihugu gihomba buri kwezi akagaruka mu kigega ca leta ubona twokwirirwa turaja gusinyisha abadandaza ikori ry’umurengera kandi nabo barya ikiremve bacirasheko??

Mw’ibike neza aho ni mubushikiranganji bw’indero gusa. Iyumvire hamwe mubushikiranganji bwose mwobikora uko??

Icishe igihugu cacu uvuze ukuri bakwita umugumutsi, umwansi w’igihugu n’ayandi mazina

Muti none hokorwa iki??

Ivyokorwa ni vyinshi

Impamvu mvuze umugwi wigenga n’uko iyo hakozwe rusasuma hanyuma ubushikiranganji bw’indero bugaca buyicisha muri fonction publique, haca hakorwa bwabufyitirizi hanyuma ya manyanga akagumamwo kuko nk’uko twabivuze muntango nibo babikoze mbere.

Nivyagenda gurtyo amanyanga azogabanuka.

Ubu butumwá turasavye bushike kure hashoboka igihugu cacu kireke kuguma cicwa n’abogikijije

title: Abarundi barakinisha uburozi n’ubumara buhagaze kubgoko bg’Abahutu n’Abatutsi.
content:
Mu nama bakoze yo kuraba yuko ibitigiri vy’ubgoko vyokwisungwa bose basemereye bagira bati: « Mubambe mubambe n’amaraso yiwe azodukoreko n’abana bacu » . Iryo ni iryungane abantu basemere kugira ngo Yesu yicwe ku musaraba kandi bari bazi yuko atacaha yakoze. Abarundi bavuze ibintu bisa n’ivyo bashigikira ngo ibitigiri vy’amoko bigumeho.

Hari uwanditse agira ati: « Umuntu yatowe hisunzwe ubgoko, azokwigera yemerako bikugwaho? Abadashaka kobivaho, ntimubonako bashigikiye amasezerano ya ARUSHA? Abadashigikiye Amasezerano ya ARUSHA ariko bipfuzako kwisunga ubgoko bigumaho, basaba ko ibiharuro 60%-40% bihinduka bikaba 85%-14%-1% »

Abarundi bari mu bantu baguma bakokeza umuriro mu gihugu cabo batabizi mu gushigikira umutimabgenge wo kudasa mu moko « le renforcement de la conscience et différenciation éthnique » kugira abana b’Abarundi bakura bazi yuko bafasa kandi ariko bazogabura n’ubutegetsi. Ikindi citongerako ni ugushimangira yuko ubgoko ubu bumenya yuko umwe angana n’abana 7 bo mubundi bgoko nk’uko ibitigiri bingana nkuko bibonekera mu gusangira ubutegetsi. Ivyo vyitwa ( l’inégalité ethnique)

Mu gushigikira ivyo vyiyumviro ntibabura imvo zidafasha bishimikiza. Ivyo vy’uko Abarundi barinda guharurana ku moko bikwiriye kuzimangana, abana b’Abarundi bakavuka bangana kandi bagahabga amahirwe amwe imbere y’amategeko. Umurundi wese akwiriye kuvuka ari umurundi kandi akitabgaho mu buryo bgose bushoboka.

title: Ivyaha 70 Uhoraho Imana yagiriza Ishengero ry’i Burundi.
content: IVYAHA 70 BIKORWA N’ABANYESHENGERO B’I BURUNDIAbanyamadini n’amashengero bafashe ishusho y’isi bayinjiza mw’ishengero ry’Imana. Ivyo abapagani bakora mw’isi ni navyo usanga mu mashengero. Abungere bataye intumbero y’ishengero yo kuyoborera intama gukorera ijuru no kubaho neza mu gihe bakiri hano kw’isi, bahinduka abikorera utwabo maze amashengero aba nk’ivyibare vyabo vyo kurondera ubuzima n’ivyubahiro. Abakozi b’Imana benshi binjiranwe n’ubugunge n’uburyarya batangura kubesha abantu gushika naho babeshera Imana. Ishengero rimaze kubona ubuhemu n’intege nke z’abakozi b’Imana, naryo ryataye ivyizerwa maze ntiryaba rigitinya Imana. Bose bahavuye bakoresha ubgenge na kamere kabo bigiza kure Mpwemu w’Imana baba bacitse abahinga mu gukora no mu kunyegeza ivyaha.Mu gihugu cacu c’Uburundi twabonye yuko hari ivya vyaha 50 bikorwa n’abarundi ni navyo usanga mw’ishengero. Ikibabaje kandi giteye intuntu n’uko Uhoraho Imana yagiriza abanyamadini n’amashengero ivyaha 70 kandi yuko ari naco kimumanukanye kuza gukubura no kurandura. Abitwa ngo bashize Imana imbere nibo bakweze uburake bg’Imana Isumba vyose ku gihugu, abitwa ngo bakorera Imana nabo nibo aho kubera umugisha igihugu bakizaniye umuvumo. Harageze yuko Ishengero ry’Imana ryisubiza agateka.IVYAHA 70 BIKORWA N’ISHENGERO RY’I BURUNDI1.Ubusambayi—Matayo 5:27-28, 32; 19:9, 18; Mariko 10:11-12; Luka 16:18; Abaheburayo 13:4; 1 Abikorinto 6:9-10; Mariko 7:21; Yohana 8:1-11 No Kurenga ibigo—1 Corinthians 5:10; 6:102.Ishavu no gushangashirwa—Abigalatiya 5:20; Abanyefeso 4:26, 31; 6:4; Abikolosayi 3:8; Yakobo 1:19-20, Matayo 5:22 73. title: Amasezerano y’Ihanga ry’Abarundi: ivyiza 15.
content:
AMASEZERANO IMANA YAHAYE IGIHUGU C’UBURUNDI

Abarundi ni Ihanga Ryera ryatoranijwe n’Uhoraho Imana rihabga isezerano ry’intahava. Aya masezerano y’Uburundi yanditse muri Bibiliya Yera nk’uko umuhanuzi Yesaya yabihishuriwe muri [YESAYA 19:18-25] mu mwaka wa 700 imbere y’uko Umwami n’Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo avuka. Ubundi buvugishwa n’ubuhanuzi bwa mbere ku gihugu c’Uburundi bgavuzwe mu mwaka wa 1935, umwaka amashengero ya pentekoti yatanguzwa mu Burundi n’abakozi b’Imana bari baje bava mu gihugu ca Suwedi. Ico gihe niho umuvugabitumwa URI yavuze yuko Abarundi ari ihanga ryatoranijwe n’Imana. Ubundi buvugishwa bgasaba Abarundi kwisonzesha, kwiyeza no gusenga cane kuko ari Ihanga ryatoranijwe, bgavuzwe muri Myandagaro mu 1968 mu gikorane c’Amashengero ya Pentekoti cari cabereye i Mugara. Inyuma yaho hari n’abandi bavugishwa baturuka muri Tanzaniya, Congo, Isirayeli, Ubudagi, Ububiligi Amerika n’ahandi bavyeretswe.Ubgacu Uhoraho yaduhishuriye vyinshi ku masezerano n’ibitabo biruzura kandi n’uyu munsi iyo dukoranye Mpwemu w’Imana arururuka akavugana natwe akabitwemeza. Imana idusaba kwihana ivyaha vyose, ukugororoka n’ukwezwa kuko igira ishitse ayo masezerano. Ibikurubikuru biri mw’isezerano Uhoraho yahaye Ihanga ry’Abarundi ni ibi:

title: Ivyaha 50 bikorerwa mu Burundi.
content: IVYAHA 50 BIKORERWA MU GIHUGU C’UBURUNDI ABARUNDI BAKWIRIYE KWIHANA.Muri Bibiliya Yera tuhasanga ivyaha bishika 667 abantu turi mw’isi dukora. Burya ihanga ryose rifise ivyaha risangiye n’ayandi mahanga n’ivyaha ryiharije. Ugomba gusengera igihugu c’Uburundi hari ivyaha bidasanzwe utegerezwa kudomako urutoke. Imbere yuko tuvyerekana tubanze inzira 5 zokwirinda icaha.INZIRA 5 ZO KWIRINDA GUKORA ICAHAKuba umu-Kristo, bisigura kwama duhunga icaha. Ariko nti bibuza yuko tuba abanyantegenke mu bihe bimwe bimwe. Kugira ngo twame tunesha, dutegerezwa kwama twumvira Mpwemu Yera kuko niwe wenyene adushitsa ku kugorororka kwose. [Yohana 16 :13] Kugira ngo wirinde icaha, hariho ibintu 5 ukwiriye kumenya:

title: 25/07/23: Umunsi wo kwihana n’Ukwezwa. Ifatanye n’amasinzi y’Abarundi.
content: IHANGA RYERA RYEGERA IMANA YERAN’iteka rihambaye kubona twiswe n’Uhoraho abantu bayo, abatoranijwe, Ihanga Ryera kandi tukaba twahawe amasezerano. [Kuvayo 19 :10-11]I. Kwegera Imana bisaba kuba waratoranije ugashirwa ukwa wenyene.Imana yabariye Mose ati genda ku bantu ubabarire biyeze uyu munsi n’ejo, bamesure impuzu zabo, umunsi ugira gatatu ushike biteguye. Kwitegura kubonana n’Uhoraho kugira ngo ugire ico umubariye utegerezwa kubanza kuba wihanye ivyaha, wejejwe mu mutima kandi no ku mubiri, ku mpuzu usa neza nk’uwurengutse i butware. Mu yandi majambo ni ukuba utunganye gose mu mutima, atajwi rikwagiriza ikibi wirengagije. Utegerezwa kuba uri agahore, uri ukwa wenyene, ata gasembga n’amarabaga. Ukwiyeza ni ugukura ibirohe mu mutima wawe ukabaho atacaha na kimwe cinyegeje muri wewe. Abantu benshi basengana ivyaha bakahakura imivumo n’urupfu.Imana ibariye abantu bayo ngo biyeze mu mitima bateko bamesure n’impuzu zabo bisigura yuko abantu biyeza mu mpwemu bagatako bakiyuhagira no mu mubiri ubuhumane bgose. Uwuriko arihumanura yigirwa kure ibintu vyose abantu bavuga, ivyo bumviriza, ivyo baraba, ivyo basoma eka n’ivyo bashobora kuba bambara vyobahumanya. Ugomba kuba mu bgiza bg’Imana utegerezwa kweza mu mubiri no mu Mpwemu ukaba uwera koko.Muri [Yakobo 4:8-10] hatubarira ibintu 4 dutegerezwa gukora kugira ngo twitegurire kuba hafi y’Imana. (1) Gukaraba neza binasigura kudasubira gukora ivyaha, (2) Kwuhagira umutima wawe binasigura guhindura ingendo zawe n’ingene wiyumvira, (3) Kubabazwa n’ivyaha wakoze ukamenya yuko icaha ari naco catumye umukiza ababazwa, (4) Kwicisha bugufi kugira ngo tube nk’uko Imana ishaka.II. Kwegera Imana bisaba kuyitinya, kuyubaha no kuyikunda.[Kuvayo 19:12], Imana isaba abantu bayo kutarenga akarimbi bashingiwe impande zose kuko no gukora ku musozi Imana ihagazeko arapfa. Abantu bategerezwa kumenya yuko Imana itandukanye n’abantu kandi yuko kugira ngo uyegere utegerezwa kubikora nk’uko ijambo ryayo ribivuga. Nta kubifata ibisanzwe. Kubera amashengero yafashe ivy’Imana nk’ibihunda hadutse akaga.III. Kwegera Imana bisaba ukwirimbura ukiyumvira utuje.Uca umenyako ata yindi nzira woshikira Uhoraho udaciye muri Yesu Kristo kuko niwe nzira n’ukuri n’ubugingo [Yohana 14:6]. Niwe muhuza w’Imana n’abantu [1Timoteyo2:5] Mu maraso yiwe niyo twerezwa ivyaha vyacu [Abaheburayo 10:10]. Umwami Yesu Kristo Yamamare hose!

title: Uhamagariwe kwifatanya n’Abera bose amasengesho y’isi yose yo gusengera amasezerano y’igihugu c’Uburundi
content:
Turi kw’igenekerezo rya 24 ukwezi kw’indwi umwaka wi 2023. Abizera Imana b’Abarundi aho bari mu gihugu cacu c’Uburundi no kw’isi yose, aho bukera batangura amasengesho yo kwisonzesha batarya kandi ataco banywa; azomara iminsi itanu kuva kw’igenekerezo rya 25 gushika kw’igenekerezo rya 29 uku kwezi. Ingo wifatanye n’Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana.

Uwudashoboye kwisonzesha iyo minsi itanu azohora yiyiriza inzara. Uwufashoboye kwiyiriza azohora agira ico anywa ku mutaga afungura mw’ijoro. Uwufashoboye Ivyo vyose azokora amasengesho mugabo afungura. Ntihagire uzogira urwitwazo rwo kudafatanya n’abandi mur’ayo masengesho yo kwitanga.

Abitavye ayo masengesho bose bazotangura kwihana n’ukwiyeza hanyuma umunsi ugira kabiri kuzoba ari ugusengera igihugu n’amasezerano Imana yagihaye, umunsi ugira gatatu tuzosengera imitwaro y’abantu itandukanye, umunsi ugira kane ube uwo gusengera Ishengero ry’Imana mu Burundi hanyuma umunsi wa nyuma w’ayo masengesho ube uwo gushima Uhoraho Imana, twigina intsinzi. Mwese musidukane n’iyonka tuzokwamamaze Umwami Yesu Kristo. Amen!

title: Mwitabire umutumiro w’ijuri wo gusengera igihugu no gusengera imiryango yanyu.
content: ABIZEYE UHORAHO IMANA BATEGEREZWA GUHAGARARIRA UKURI MU GIHUGUNta murundi w’umutima yokwigira sindabibazwa kuvyerekeye igihugu ciwe mu kwinyegeza muvy’Imana. Ijambo ryose rije ribakebura kandi rihamagarira guhinduka, kwezwa no gutungana bama bagerageza kuritoramwo ikosa no kuryankisha abandi.Nyen’icubahiro umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi n’abamufasha, birirwa barasemerera yuko abantu bohindura ingendo, indongozi zitegeka nabi zikikubita agashi, abanyonora itunga ry’igihugu bakabiheba, abacamanza bakihanura, kuko ivyo bibi nivyo bitera ubukene inzara mu gihugu.Uretse yuko ako kamo karaba cane indongozi z’igihugu, abubaha Imana bategerezwa gufata iyambere kugira ngo impundu n’amerembe bisamirane igihugu no mu mahanga. Ariko siko biri kuko abarongoye amadini n’amashengero benshi aho guhimiriza abantu ngo bahinduke bihane bezwe, basha coba, bagatinya ukuri, indimi zabo zikagoba. Hari n’abinyegeza mu migambge bagafadikanya n’abanyakibi, n’abatware barya ibinure vy’intama mu gushigikira ibiturire, abahohotera abandi n’ayandi mabi. [2Petero 2:17-22]Twebge nk’abubaha Uhoraho, abizera Umwami n’umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo, dutegerezwa kwerekana ubushobozi bg’amasengesho. Dutegerezwa kuba imboneza zitwara urumuri rw’ukuri, amahoro n’iterambere mu gihugu. Umwami Yesu yadutumye kuba umunyu w’isi n’urumuri rw’abantu. [Matayo 5:13-16]Iyo Ihanga Ryera rihamagariye abantu bose gusengera igihugu twicishije bugufi mu kwiyeza n’ukwisonzesha, amasinzi y’Abarundi bari mu gihugu n’abari mu mahanga barayitabira, harimwo abaganza igihugu n’abajejwe umutekano kandi abantu benshi barahabohokera bagatabarwa. Hari abakira ivyaha, abakira ngwara z’umubiri n’abo Uhoraho akiza ivyago bitandukanye.Ariko rero bigatangaza kubona imparurwa zifise imigenzo y’amadini ziterekwa ayo amasengesho ategurwa n’Abera. Abarongoye utwo tugwi bohejwe na Satani, bagerageza gutesha abizera kuja mur’ayo masengesho. Babesha ngo (1) Ntituzi icicaro c’abateguye ayo masengesho, (2) Abo bayateguye nta kintu baduha, (3) Abo basenga batyoza leta, (4) N’ukugwanya Leta (5) Mube musengana ubgenge, (6) n’utundi tujambo tw’urucantege twotirimutsa abatazi ibanga ryo gusengera igihugu n’amasezerano yaco. [Abigalatiya 4:16]Mu gihugu cacu hari amadini n’amashengero ashika 850 ariko uko agwira niko n’ivyaha bigwira bikazana umuvumo ku gihugu. Ni murengere ayo mabohero yo mu mpwemu, mube abidegemvya muri Kristo Yesu kugira ngo muhagararire ukuri mubone gusengera igihugu n’ico Uhoraho Imana yakivuzeko. [Abaroma 8:7-21]

title: Nti murwe mu mosha y’abatinya amasengesho bagasenga uruheyiheyi.
content: URAHAMAGARIRWA GUSENGA AYA MASENGESHO NTURWE MU MOSHA“Gusenga ngo ntimurwe mu mosha” ni ijambo Umwami n’Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo yabariye abigishwa biwe igihe yariko arasengana umubabaro kuko igihe ciwe co kubabazwa cari cimirije [MATAYO 26:41-42]Nk’uko mwabibonye, Ijuru ryatumiriye Abarundi bose guca bugufi bakihana kugira ngo basengere igihugu n’ishengero ry’Imana kugira ngo Uhoraho atabare nk’uko yabisezeranye. Hatanzwe urufatiro mu [2 INGOMA 7 :14] na [LUKA 10 :19].Hariho imirwi y’abanyamadini n’abanyamigenzo batazi yuko Abera b’Imana bama kira mwaka bafata indwi yo kwisonzesha basengera igihugu c’Uburundi n’amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yakivuzeko. Uyu mwaka amasengesho azomara iminsi itanu, kuva kwigenekerezo rya 25 gushika kw’igenekerezo rya 29 uku kwezi. Ntimwoshwe n’abatabitahura kandi bibaza yuko boyatesha abandi. Ntihagire uwugutesha kwifatanya n’Ihanga ryose ry’Uburundi gusengera igihugu cawe.Muvyo abo bahagarara ku tuntu twabo aho kwifatanya n’Abera bose bitwaza bavuga ngo:Kwisonzesha iminsi itanu yose ni myinshi. Yesu yisonzesheje iminsi 40 n’amajoro 40 atarya atanywa. [Matayo 4 :1-11] Ugusenga wisonzesheje bibohora benshi kuko vyirukana abadayimoni [Matayo 17 :21] Eka noneho kubera intege nke hariho abasabga kwiyiriza gusa n’abandi bashobora kugira ico barya canke banywa kubera amagara yabo.Gusengera igihugu ngo ni ivya politike. Abo bari mu migwi yitirirwa izina ry’Imana, bakama bakoresha Bibiliya Yera mugabo ntibazi isezerano riri muri [2 INGOMA 7 :14] Guca bugufi no gusengera igihugu Imana igatabara. Abantu b’Imana nibo bategerezwa guhagarara mu gihengeri c’igihugu.Kuvuga ukuri ngo ni ukurwanya Reta. Satani yarateye mu mashengero abanyaga ukuri, abasukamwo icoba no kwiyorobeka ngo nikwo gutungana. Abana b’Imana bategerezwa kwemanga yuko icera cera n’icirabura cirabura kuko niho bazokiza ishamvu Imana yabahaye. Ukuri kutavuzwe n’abubaha Imana ntikuzovugwa n’abapagani. Bibiliya iratubgira yuko kumenya ukuri biduha ukwidegemvya [YOHANA 8:32] kandi yuko kubgenge Imana yaduhaye twongerako ukuri. [2PETERO1 :5-8].Abana n’abadakijijwe ngo ntiboja mu masengesho yo kwitanga. Mu gihe nk’iki ni abo munzu bose mbere n’ibitungano birubahiriza icagezwe c’Uhoraho nk’uko vyagenze i NINIWE [YONA 3:5-9]. Abubaha Imana n’abo mu nzu zabo bategerezwakwubaha Uhoraho [YOSHUWA 24 :15].Ufise ikibazo twandikire maze twamamaze Umwami Yesu Kristo twese!

title: Ntubabazwe n’abagusuzugura
content:
IMANA IRASHOBORA KUKWUBAHISHA AHO WASUZUGURIWE.

« Yamar’ amaherezo, igitigiri c’Abisirayeli kizongana nk’umusenyi wo ku kiyaga, udashobora kugerwa ku ngero canke guharurika. Kand’ ahantu babgiriwe, ngo Ntimur’ abantu banje, ni ho nyene bazobgirirwa, ngo Mur’ abana b’Imana nzima.Hoseya 1:10″.

Akeshi aho umuntu yababariye ninaho Imana imwubahisha.Dusomye ngo kandi aho mwabwiriwe ngo ntimur’abantu banje,niho muzobwirirwa ngo muri abana b’ Imana nzima.

Yosefu yararenganijwe,ajanwa mumvuto ari muri Egiputa, ariko muri Egiputa nyene niho yashiriwe hejuru aba uwakabiri kuri Farawo.

Dawidi yarahunze ava i bwami kubwo gutinya ko sawuli amwica,ariko aho nyene i bwami niho yubahiwe, aba umwami akomeye mugihe ciwe,Imana imwandikishiriza amateka akivurwa gushika n’ubu.

Moridekayi yasuzugurikiye i bwami,ari umuzamu,ariko igihe kigeze aho i bwami nyene niho yubahiwe,nawe ahinduka uwo gutanga amategeko.

Imana iyo igihe kigeze araguha agaciro kandi uri mubakakwimye.Mumuryango wirengagirijwemwo,mukazi,mukibano,n’ahandi hose ushobora kuba waragiriye ikibazo.

Iki nico ciza co kugendana n’Imana.Iragerageza kuburyo ikumara umubabaro watewe n’ivyagukandamije, kuburyo uhindukira ukavuga ati iyo ataba Imana ntivyari gukunda.

Rero mumibabaro tugenda ducamwo turi kumwe n’ Imana,yo iba izobirangiza neza.« Aho mwabwiriwe ati ntimur’abantu banje, niho muzobwirirwa ati mur’abana b’ Imana nzima ».Muhezagirwe.

title: Igituma Umukuru w’igihugu ca Congo D yipfuza yuko Ingabo z’Uburundi zonyene zoguma muri ico gihugu
content:
Général-Major Sibomana Ignace niwe ahagarariye umurwi w’abasirikare ukora isuzuma y’ivyakozwe n’inteko za EAC

Kuri uyu wa kabiri, igenekerezo rya 4 Mukakaro 2023 niho umurwi w’intwazangabo urongowe na General-Major Ignace Sibomana watangura igikorwa co gusuzuma ko inteko za EAC zaranguye ubutumwa bwo kugarukana umutekano mu buseruko bwa Congo nk’uko bwari bwazihawe n’inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu vya EAC.

Iyo ntwazangabo isanzwe kandi ari icegera c’umukuru w’ingabo zirwanira ku butaka mu Burundi amenyesha ko ico gikorwa kizorangira ku wa 08 Mukakaro. Avuga kandi ko bazogendera uduce twose turimwo abasirikare ba EAC hamwe n’uduce tukiri mu minwe ya M23.

Ingingo yo gusuzuma ivyakozwe n’igisirikare ca EAC ikaba yafatiwe mu nama igira iya 21 y’abakuru b’ibihugu yabaye ku wa 31 Rusama 2023 yabereye i Bujumbura.

Ni inyuma y’aho umukuru w’igihugu ca Congo arahiye ko ico gisirikare ca EAC kitigeze kirwanya aba M23, ko ariyo mpamvu gitegerezwa kuva ku butaka bwa Congo muri uku kwa gatandatu guheze.

Prezida Tshisekedi akaba yavuga ko n’imiburiburi abasirikare bakwiye gusigara ari abavuye i Burundi gusa. Akaba mbere yaciye asaba inteko zivuye mu muryango SADC ko ari zo zoca ziza gusubirira iza EAC.

Bikaba bitegekanijwe abo basirikare bazova ku butaka bwa Congo mu kwezi kwa Nyakanga 2023 inyuma y’iryo suzuma.Twobibutsa ko kuva mu kwezi kwa Rusama 2023, abategetsi batandukanye bagumye bavuga ko igisirikare ca EAC ataco kiriko kirafasha, ko kitarwanya abarwanyi ba M23 ko kandi gifitaniye imigenderanire idasanzwe na M23.

Ku wa 13 Rusama 2023, icegera c’umushikiranganji wa mbere ajejwe imigenderanire n’ayandi makungu akaba yavugiye ku mugaragaro ko izo nteko zananiwe.

title: Mu gihugu haravugwa cane ihindugwa ry’inoti z’amafaranga y’amarundi
content:
Abantu benshi baguma bahanahana utureresi tw’amajambo yavuzwe n’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi kuvyerekeye guhindura ibikaratasi ababitse amafaranga menshi mu mazu yabo. Impande yo gusakaka mu mazu y’abategetsi bamwe bamwe bakoranye cane na Président Nkurunziza ngo barondera gufata ayo mafaranga babitse mu mazu hanyuma iryo saka rikaba rishobora kuba ritatoye ayo mafaranga, Ibanki Nkuru y’igihugu yatangaje yuko ihinduye inoti z’ibihumbi icumi n’izibihumbi bitanu.

Bikaboneka yuko izo ngingo zifatwa ari inyinyurana ry’abafise uburyo bginshi batazwi neza hamwe na leta y’Uburundi. Umuntu arahava akobaza ati ni nde ahungukira ni nde ahahombera. Benshi bavuga yuko ingingo nk’izo abenegihugu batazungukiramwo abandi bati dutegereze turabe iyo bigarukira.

title: Inzuzi zirageramiye amazu y’ abenegihugu ahatari hake.
content:
Amazi y’ uruzi #Ruzibazi arabangamiye amazu yo ku gacimbiri #Mabāho ko ku mutumba #Magara ya kabiri. Ni muri komine Bugarama muri Rumonge Province .

Ayo mazi aguma satira inkombe z’ urwo ruzi zigaca zisiduka. Vyatumye amazu ashika atandatu asenyuka, bene yo barimuka, baja gusembera.

Urwo ruzi rwataye inzira rurageramiye imihana ishika itandatu. Ababa muri ako gace basaba abajejwe gukingira ibidukijije muri iyo komine gufata ico kibazo mu minwe.

Butoyi Berchimas aserukira ikigo #OBPE muri komine #Bugarama aremeza ko ico kibazo akizi. Amenyesha ko hariko harategurwa gutera ibiti vy’ imisuna n’ ibindi bishobora gushigikira inkombe z’ urwo ruzi mu ntumbero yo gukinga.

Ariko, uwo ajejwe gukingira ibidukikije yibutsa ko abanyaguhugu bokwama bibuka ko hari imetero zitubakwamwo ku nkengera z’ inzuzi.
